author: {'steamid': '76561198288567904', 'num_games_owned': 37, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 146, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 146, 'last_played': 1615735914}
review: I played the game outside of steam, but came here to leave a review. I'd like to say I didn't play the pre-Ascension atlas (which they did bring back a form of it). Overall its an okay game. Character creation is doesn't leave you unsatisfied, but creating your divine form does. When you get your divine form they have (currently) four form: divine, demonic, mechanical, and plant. The only varation from other players is mearly colors. So another player and I transform into a divine form we will have the same face, hairstyle, and clothes just different colors. How can you give such a good character creation but a terrible divine form. I don't want to look like the same person next to. Especially when you have like five people with the same faces just different colors. It just feels like a copy and paste, and whats worse is you're stuck with which ever form you pick. Sure you can change the colors but thats it. The color change doesn't give you much freedom either, its just a set of pre selected color combination. Going over to the class, I'd have to say its really grind heavy or you can skip it over with money. It will be obvious when compared to those who didn't spend any money. Combat is good, and I like how you can change class mid combat as long as you have the faith (energy) for it. Moving onto the story, they have these episodes that actually tells a decent story, but after completing them it gets harder to keep up with the story when you have several quests that have no relevance to it. When you do catch up to the main story you have to wait a while for the next update, by then you have forgot what happened and are told some event is happening, but are left wondering why it is happening. It sucks that you are stuck fighting as a hero, like I'd like to be able to join the enemy or fight other players not in a tournerment but as a faction. The whole premise of the story is to play as a god, but you can't interact with your followers other than sending them to collect faith (energy to transform) and artifacts. Like it would be nice to have a a temple a housing where wooshipers can appears with their problem. The player would them be able to choose to help or not, and not helping would have you loose a followers and intern power, cause at this point of the game the followers are just numbers that say you are stronger. Overall its an okay game, I wouldn't spend hours of my time on this, when there are other better games, but I would recommend it if you want to have something keep you busy.
developer_response: Thanks for the detailed feedback, we make regular updates and will keep the points you raised in mind.

author: {'steamid': '76561197995377700', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 3219, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3077, 'last_played': 1617474305}
review:
I don't typically review games, but I cannot recommend this one.  It is a beautiful lobby-based MMO with a fluid class system and interesting mechanics.  The unfortunate truth is that the player population isn't even remotely large enough to support new players.  There are a few instances while leveling where you need to find a group to complete certain activities.  Unfortunately, no one does them.  Reddit and posts will say "Find a Pantheon (guild)"; but they don't run them either.  

It's a fun game where you can get a solid 20 or so hours from, but beyond that the gaps are far too significant to think about devoting any kind of large amount of time to.

author: {'steamid': '76561198301824353', 'num_games_owned': 143, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 30, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 30, 'last_played': 1651917357}
review:
[b] please ignore the played hours on Steam, I played this game on my.games [/b]
I played this a few years ago and I liked it. The gameplay was kinda good and the graphics where cool. I then quit the game because I wanted to play other games with my friends and came back two weeks ago and it was bad. I had to make a new account because I lost my account data(this isn´t the games fault and wasn´t the bad thing) so I had to start again. 

[b] Here is what made me write this review. [/b]

The early game is soooo boring. 

You don´t get to try out all the classes at the training hall anymore, instead you can just try the 3 classes that are available for new players.

Those 3 classes are the most generic and boring classes for an mmorpg that I can think of (Paladin Tank, Priest Healer, and Frost Mage DD). I remembered that there where so much more classes that where all so much cooler but I couldn´t try them anymore and there was little to no sign of them existing, just the holos in the training hall(that you cant interact with) and the other players that are playing that class.

I also remembered a cool and really big skill tree, where you could select a class and actively work towards unlocking that class, this was great and also one of the coolest Skill Trees I´ve ever seen. Thats also gone.

I have no Idea how to unlock the other classes now but from what I could get as Informations from searching online, It´s a grinding simulator with a little bit of gameplay between the grinding - or you can pay money to make it an actual game.

[b] [u] 0/10 bad game don´t download! [/u] [/b]

review:
Played Skyforge years ago, loved the Ascension Atlas system. Came back to find they removed it and replaced it with linear WoW-like progression and no build flexibility. Also you start with one tank, one support, and one DPS class and unlocking any other will take 10-20hr of gameplay or a cash purchase.

Ugh. Why did they do this? Hard pass.

review: I played this game a few years ago and enjoyed it.  Unfortunately I could not remember my log in so I used Steam to do it for me and had to start over.  The great thing about this game is that it seems to have only gotten better with age.  The instances are fun and you do not need to worry about someone else stealing your kills or items.  The story seems really solid as well, though I will admit I have not gotten all the way through the story yet, but I do enjoy the game over all!

review:
Schönes MMorpg mit dem schurken oder Bogi? HAHAHA 
Darfst erstmal 50 stunden rein grinden in dem game bis du eine gescheite klasse spielen darfst
wie bogi schurke ect.
am anfang hast du drecks langweilige klassen lichthüter als support
pala als tank und kyromant als dmg dealer. 
es gibt verschiedene abschnitte also open world gibt es nicht alles linear. also bedeutet
1. quatschen labern und langweilen
2.Welt anklicken wo gerade die''coole'' mission ist 
3.einen gang durchlaufen wo monster spawnen die dann umklatschen und dann zurück
4. langweilen und deinstallieren.

Naja das Kämpfen hat im proloug noch spaß gemacht aber weil mir einfach keines dieser klassen zu gesagt hat absolut langweilig.
verstehe nicht wieso man standart klassen direkt am anfang wählen kann...

review:
374 hours in, and not even close to the end game material.
Don't get me wrong - it is a time sink, but if you get the right pantheon(guild) and you enjoy versatile classes - you have nothing to lose.
I'd avoid PVP if you hate pre-made pvp groups annihilating poorly formed groups.
Other than that - give it a go if you have a spare few hundred hours.

author: {'steamid': '76561198062535713', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 52, 'playtime_forever': 894, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 894, 'last_played': 1615187761}
review:
So I was looking for a nice mmorpg to get into and gave this one a try.

Umm, it honestly feels a bit lacking to me. The story is terrible and rather shallow, some cutscenes have characters talking with no sound, the combat feels weightless and boring after a while, and so far I've yet to encounter anything to hook me into the game. Idk if it gets better further along, but for a while after I started I started to wonder if this was a port of a mobile game

author: {'steamid': '76561198051003240', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 15, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 15, 'last_played': 1591585462}
review:
If only this game didnt have such a big paywall..... It would be perfect if another business had this game, a business who would reward you a little much for playing the game instead of speading tons of money to avoid hundreds if not more hours of grinding and being unable to progress for months and months. I had fun with the game until i hit that paywall. after that it feels like you are caged and even tho you work hard, you dont get much rewards.

Honestly, game mechanics/graphics are awesome and the concept is good but... you better be rich or have many years to spend on this game before being able to do endgame without being carried by other players 24/7

author: {'steamid': '76561198252637248', 'num_games_owned': 89, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 152973, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 152738, 'last_played': 1646907848}
review:
this game is a disappointment, i have 2545 hours of playtime and after playing it for more than a year i can say how much devs don't care about playerbase, 
it became pure p2w, 
events and invasions are same every year without changes or bugfixes, 
you will have same bugs that were in game for 5 years
raids are so easy that you can oneshot bosses in first week of invasion. 

Their biggest event in the game was Pantheon Wars, and at the end they gave no rewards, gear/stones that were given were given to everyone instead of winning pantheons, stones were random and not the ones we chose, at the end of pantheon wars the pantheon that won the first place got second place because they couldn't fix bugs that didn't give full amount of points to first pantheon, and pantheon that was sleeping for 8/8 fights got first place without doing anything.

author: {'steamid': '76561198052667033', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 9124, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8993, 'last_played': 1675108190}
review:
After 150 hours of gameplay I have a few thoughts to share. 
If you wondering about starting play this game - don't.
This is a bad game, bad game for newcomers and I'm not talking about gameplay beacuse it's quite good, classes are fun even few very unique like Soundweaver. I'm talking about whole progression mechanic system.
You need hundreds hours of grinding just to start a proper even longer grinding and what when you even can't the first one? Yes that's right, every invasion before you added new generations of items and increased strenght and difficulty of mobs to be more challenging for allready playing players. 
So they added something called "warm-up" options before enter every instance. By this your overall character is scalling to present level of mobs and boom, you are fked up in most of instances beacuse this auto-scalling dont give as much dmg output as you would have on the same level of mobs without scalling. 
Even if you are stubborn son of a b like me and get trough all this, doing all stuff everyday to fast increase your might (its main rank like level, overall strenght) after hitting 300 might you are again fked up. Beacuse now you need to gather lot a lot and a lot knowledge of enemies which are used to increase level tower of knowledge which in return increase your might. Let me just do some  simply mathematics -
To gather this knowledge you have to finish a whole map of quests. Depends of the map, it can be from 2,5k to 40k. To finish map with 40k you need something around 6 hours. Something like 40 quests, cant remember exactly. 
So now, after hitting 300 might you will need 5000 knowledge of enemies to increase 2% of one level tower of knowledge so after 6h you have 40k. It means you can increase ToK eight times getting  2% each of single level.
6 hours - 16% 
37 hours - 100% 
74h hours for 2 levels of tower beacuse 1 give you something around 600 might and you need over 1k to increase your rank by 1 so
74 x 50 = 3700 hours to start normal grinding beacuse from 350 might your character stop being scalled. Ofcourse this is simply mathematics just to show core progression. There is also Cathedral when your followers gave might but its blocked at some point and can be unlocked only by finishing some seasonal feasts which are difficult and very dependable on getting help from very strong players. 
And you can't even thinking about pvp or catching other players beacuse when you struggle with all of this they are strong enough to finish most of the content solo and they will be twice as far away from you at the end of of the season as they are now. 
This is only about might, I don't even wan't to start talking about items which are all nontradable so forget about getting some better gearfrom lets say guild members and even if they could be, benefits from them are not count while still on scalling system.
So thank you but no, thank you.
Sorry for bad english, not my main. Hope to help someone. Cheers :)

Just no.

author: {'steamid': '76561198119687250', 'num_games_owned': 145, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 592, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 554, 'last_played': 1614012502}
review:
Desconociendo su antigua version y a pesar de las criticas de jugadores veteranos de este juego, decidi darle una oportunidad al Skyforge como amante de los juegos de rol masivos en linea.
El juego en si esta interesante y es entretenido en su medida, pero mi opinion es negativa.
Si bien gustos son gustos, lo unico que puedo expresar desde mi punto de vista personal es: no es a mundo abierto, posee un sistema de combate  entretenido tipo  hack and slash, el juego en si necesita de mas contenido y pulido a mi entender,  su propuesta es interesante pero escasa, en poco tiempo se siente repetitivo y cansador.
En resumen es un juego que tiene potencial pero una mala ejecucion de la misma.

author: {'steamid': '76561197970861014', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 12687, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 12655, 'last_played': 1613802289}
review:
At this stage in Skyforge's lifespan. Can't really recommend it to anyone unless you are joining the game with 9 to 20 people that you know will play daily. In just about any online game you play, you will eventually hit some sort of a wall.  In Skyforge you just don't hit the wall, but are slammed into by the game itself.  Between the tedious grinding, and need to have groups for everything to help you progress later on. You'll either give up right away, give up eventually, or just chip away at it forever without really making any progress.  From start to junior god, for the most part is fun, everything after that though, not really. 

Little too much stuff gated behind not just needing a group, but needing a good group. Farming for resources that have a very low return on time invest (Faith, Knowledge, Victor medals, etc). Plus if you aren't premium well you are just eating away even more of your time and seeing even less return on it.  A good online game, or any game for that matter, respects your time. Skyforge really falls flat on that.

Plus the population is really low. Meaning more than a fair chunk of your time is spent solo. Which would be fine if the game was more like SWTOR which is big on story, with MMO elements tacked on.  Skyforge's idea of a story is having you redo the same dungeons you've been doing since earliest parts of game, just to talk to someone in dungeon, and have them probably tell you go talk to someone else in another dungeon. Not very captivating. Honestly the story would get a pass if it was the main source of progression for your character from start to junior god to elder god. But like I said most of that is locked behind tedious grinding and group content, that's hard to get a group for. You could always attempt to find people to carry you through some of the content, but then you learn almost nothing about your class.

author: {'steamid': '76561198121385073', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 5402, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4877, 'last_played': 1637569181}
review:
So I JUST started Skyforge and the game is really good. I enjoy it. 
There's a few things the DEVs could do to improve the game overall though like just putting random rotation group finders instead of specific que and stuff like that I think if people were openly able to just que into stuff fast the community would thrive alittle more. Also the UI is a mess they need to implement easier work arounds or have better menus. Those things being said though.... The community that IS in the game is super helpful and theres server wide chats where you can ask things and get tons of responses, The gameplay feels nice and fluid and the class are super sick. All in all I'd say give it a Try and HMU in-game if you need a buddy.

Jessy Bonsai

author: {'steamid': '76561198159673505', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 140, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 140, 'last_played': 1613414733}
review:
Редкостное говнище, сделанное исключительно ради поднятия бабла, правда я совершенно не понимаю, кому в здравом уме придет в голову донатить в эту помойку. Озвучка - говнище. Лицевая анимация - говнище. Генерация персонажа - говнище. Говенные текстуры на говенном заднем плане постоянно куда-то исчезают. Смена класса в любой момент - отдельный сорт отборнейшего говнища. Квесты - говнище прямиком из нулевых. Куда в этой, прости господи, «игре» ни плюнь - попадешь в говнище. Усиленно играть в это говнище, чего-то там гриндить и фармить я бы не стал, даже если бы разрабы мне приплачивали за это.
Allods Team могли остановиться после выпуска Аллодов и остаться в истории игровой индустрии если не легендами, то как минимум героями. А теперь благодаря этой поделке лично в моих глазах они опустились на самое дно.

author: {'steamid': '76561198034057051', 'num_games_owned': 574, 'num_reviews': 49, 'playtime_forever': 35919, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 32512, 'last_played': 1667606348}
review:
[h1] Скайфордж - игра, в которую я не жалею что играл, но её вам я не за что не посоветую! [/h1]

Всем привет, мысль о том, что мне нужно написать обзор про скай уже вертится у меня в голове несколько лет. Я достаточно много времени в нём провёл и мне есть что вам рассказать.

Прежде всего подмечу, что я скорее "чувак из нью эры" потому что я начал играть 23 декабря 2017 года когда был инвэйжен океанидов и макс поколение вещей было 11. Так что я не буду вам ныть про атласы и про то, как раньше было лучше, я вам просто расскажу как майл умудрились и без того спорную (со слов олдов) "новую эру" скатить в такой шлак, что я просто со слезами на глазах вспоминаю о том, как раньше было круто! Так вот, ближе к сути, когда я играл, вышкой считалось получить 11 поколение вещей, чтобы их заработать надо было качать так называемое МОГУЩЕСТВО, так вот, сначала проходишь сюжетку, плавно переходя по поколениям от 1 до 6, там уже каждый день играешь, делаешь указы богов, "могучка" росла постепенно и можно было получать более крытые вещи, так вот. И к сожалению такой баланс сохранился недолго. Через два месяца от того времени как я начал произошло, на то время, глобальное обновление. Типа там вторглись жнецы и под эту тему в игру добавили 12 поколение, а остальные напросто убрали, оставив только 11 поколение для слабых персонажей, а 12 могли получить только перекаченные задры (уже был звоночек что всё пошло по пи...). Ну ничего, мы играли, делали всякие ивенты, было более менее интересно. Потом ещё через 2 месяца в игре случился инвэйжен фитонидов и что вы думаете, все кто нафармил и вточил 12 поколение вещей - мог их выбросить на помойку, ибо да здравствует 13! Ну и кароче, я могу так писать этот обзор до бесконечности, потому что каждые два месяца, твой топовый шмот (даже донатный, карл) идёт на помойку, ибо майл добавляет в игру новое поколение. А вот теперь поржите, как вы думаете.. какое поколение в игре сейчас самое топовое? Я вот на днях зашёл и офигел... ТРИДЦАТОЕ КАРЛ! Не, вы понимаете да, насколько это ноулайфная игра, где заместо того, чтобы просто её поддерживать и баловать своё, и без того малое, кол-во игроков, они из них выжимают последние аргенты (донат валюта) и заставляют каждые проклятые 2 месяца фармить новый шмот и точить его "знаками", которые муторно фармятся. Самый треш уже начался, когда они полностью убрали из игры баланс могучки, и в итоге игроки которые только прошли сюжетку за 10-15 часов, уже были по стате примерно такие же, как люди, которые начинали со мной пару лет назад. Также, любой легендарный предмет, который ты покупал за донат, через 2 месяца просрачивается и становится не топовой пушкой сервера.

Не могу не добавить, что есть такие "режимы" игры, где ты в соло ничего не сможешь сделать, а в пати тебя не берут, и я даже не про данжи на 5-10 человек. Просто элементарно, без других топовых игроков ты не пройдёшь: искажения, не станешь старшим богом, не получишь топовые награды за командные ПвП челленджи ну и т.д. В Скайфордже редко кто помогает, максимум только несколько топ кланов заботятся о своих, в остальных случаях лучшее что вас ожидает это собрать сброд рандомных аутистов из 5 человек, которые и Геспилонский с трудом могут пройти. Ещё я помню как майл пошёл на поводу трендов и добавил в игру "НЕОБХОДИМИЙШУЮ" функцию Баттл Рояла! Ну кароче, что вы думаете, как пыль утихла, они тут же его из игры выкинули.. поиграно.

По технической части что могу сказать, игра выглядит очень красиво, достойно. За последние года разве что оптимизацию завезли и теперь игра пашет ещё на больших системах и с меньшими лагами, по сравнению с 1-2 годами ранее. Насчёт классов игры: конечно круто в одном персонаже иметь сразу 20 разных, но майл как мы уже поняли слаб в гибких настройках и по сути баланса классов не существует, кто последним вышел в свет и был донатным по началу, тот и самый сильный. Наглядные примеры: когда я только начинал играть, имба считался Ревенант, я на него в принципе и фармил, и да он был крайне имбовым на фоне остальных, потом что вы думаете - появляется друид. В итоге ревенанта режут по урону, чтобы новый друид не был таким ущербным. Друид закрепился, всё отлично, давайте добавим в игру акустика - весь сервер бегает с гитарами. Акустик это конечно круто, но мы создали пироманта, либо пиромант либо соси бибу в данжах. Ну вы кароче поняли, образно, в игре 20 классов, но по сути все из них - бесполезные рудименты. Берс, ниндзя, лучник... ими вообще кто-нибудь сейчас на серьёзных щах играет? Они все скатились в ховнину вместе с когда-то "НАШЕЙ" игрой (хотя.. наверно она никогда не была нашей, это мы развлекали её, а не она нас). Так что по сути классов в игре таковых и нет, более менее LB-ха ещё полезный как поддержка, и то я уже не уверен (алхима сильно понёрфили, а 4 года назад на его слизнях проходили топ данжи). Ещё не могу не отметить, что из игры выпилили русский язык, а донат исключительно рубли в евро, а потом с офигенной переплатой что-то покупаешь.. что будет уже совсем скоро неактуально.

В итоге, даже новая эра первой версии и новая эра которая сейчас - это просто абсолютно два разных продукта, две разных игры (и в первую я по крайней мере хотел играть и получал хоть какое-то удовольствие). Скайфордж стал жертвой собственных бесконечных обновлений и жадности своих разработчиков. Это была очень хорошая онлайн игра, где мы вместе убивали часы, весело проводя время, общались, "передёргивали" на новые нафармленные скины друг друга.

Ладно, пока так, если я ещё что вспомню, то обязательно расскажу, а сейчас нужно подвести итог. Скайфордж, это та игра, в которой я провёл время, довольно хорошее время, но я вам её уже не порекомендую, ибо как сказал один парень - это погоня за собственным хвостом. Вы его никогда не догоните, и не поймаете, даже если вы сейчас получите 30 поколение - через несколько месяцев вам надо уже бежать получать 35, да и как вы накопите на пироманта - в игру добавят очередного вафлёра, который будет выдавать лонли дамаг на сервере в течении полгода-год. Поэтому, просто.. забудьте и пропустите, игра бесконечная, если вы любите ачивки, то платина тут за гранью долгая, просто чекните мои, я их старался получал, в итоге ещё далеко не всё. В общем, моя оценка.. когда я начинал, это была довольно офигенная ММО с частичным новым экспириенсом и я смело поставил бы 9 из 10, это прям было очень сильно... но всё-таки сейчас 2021 год и эта игра настолько уже перековеркана тупыми обновлениями, что все люди с которыми я играл (около 50 человек) в игре не появляются уже более полтора-два года, НОУ ВАН! Так что если оценивать факторы, которые я рассказывал ранее и какой они сделали позор с "указами богов", то моя оценка на сегодня это 3-4 полезных обновления из 10. К сожалению, я уже сомневаюсь что она когда-то станет прежней и скорее всего через пару-тройку лет её окончательно закроют, после того, как выдоят последних оставшихся фанатов, до последней капли.

(P.S. Всё-таки да, не все обновления были уж прям плохими, мне понравится отрезок, полтара года назад, когда в игру добавили акустика, и там некоторое время в игре была атмосфера "Retro Wave", кто не знает что это, загуглите. Кароч, нереально крутая тема, я как частичный ретроман кайфовал от происходящего. К сожалению - это довольно быстро кончилось, ибо данная обнова была выкачена в середине декабря, будто забыв про то, что накануне уже новогодний ивент, в итоге всё ретро довольно быстро поменяли на "снежки"... пАнимаю.)

review: Not fun until you complete the main story line and then it becomes 100% p2w. You want to play a new class, either spend money or farm the item that you need that is set too high. Oh cant complete the mission for the item? Pay to get better gear to complete it. You also cant walk over half the terrain without getting stuck. This MMO has/had potential but is just a snooze fest with the basic classes and even the others. You can also be stun locked by enemies for about 30 seconds-3 mins and you'll just die.

author: {'steamid': '76561198025285523', 'num_games_owned': 446, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 4376, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4376, 'last_played': 1611518930}
review:
This game is hella fun up until the point you essentially hit the first level cap and finally become a god. Everything is balanced well the questline is fun and engaging. Then you hit god tier and the game decided to make literally every person and enemy to instead of sync to your level but sync to the max level possible. So here you are beginner noob god and everything is elder god tier 300 levels above you. Literally making it impossible for you to do any quest dungeound squad or solo content of any kind. you literally need to find people willing to carry you thru 2-3 quests a day that are even worth bothering to do. Then you do this for literal months before you can even begin to think actually being able to play the game. You can only maybe do some of these quests in god mode only. which youll need to farm up the points for such which in your super weak form is so hard.  So unless your willing to shell out mega money to skip this grind of retardedness. don't bother with this game.

It used to be much better back in the day when you could get groups of people together and do these contents but now its simply pray and hope and be carried thru everything till your literally powerful enough to do the same for someone else. unlocking classes is even more tedious and lengthy than it used to be. whole areas have been cut out of the game that used to really give it its charm and the fun part. why remove our god statues?! really dumb. 

so in ending game used to be much better when they didnt just expect everyone to somehow be max level out the gate.

author: {'steamid': '76561198871304112', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 186, 'playtime_forever': 5, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5, 'last_played': 1590801034}
review:
Caldo de verduras rápido:
Limpia y pela verduras variadas como el apio, la zanahoria, el puerro y córtalas a trocitos. Salteá en una olla con un chorrito de aceite la cebolla y el puerro hasta que se doren. Añadí el resto de verduras y saltéalas durante 5 minutos. Incorpora agua y hierbas aromáticas como el tomillo y el laurel. Cocinalo todo a fuego suave durante 15 minutos. Cuando esté listo, hay que colar todo.

author: {'steamid': '76561198145102817', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 36, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 36, 'last_played': 1538551042}
review: I played this game back in 2015 when it was only on MyGames and unfortunately it has become a mobile game. From what I remember the grindy progression system before and after the huge overhaul update didn't improve. And doing the same repetitive missions didn't help counter the grind.  There were major "EA" micro transaction where you had could buy talent/powerup slots, but you couldn't unlock them just by playing the game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198082993904', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 192, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 192, 'last_played': 1612478388}
review: Tirando os bugs gráficos, é um jogo bonito demonstrando um certo empenho da equipe de desenvolvimento, mas... A câmera é esquisita, com o Crosshair no meio da cabeça do personagem sem configuração para remove-lo. O combate é péssimo, sem impacto, parece que os inimigos nem estão lá, você praticamente toma dano do nada tem horas. Os inimigos parecem idiotas que atacam sem parar com a mesma habilidade (sem parar mesmo). A personalização é legal, mas limitada propositalmente. Te colocam em uma sala lotada de de classes, mas só se pode se testar três, fazendo você passar vontade (diferentemente de Warframe que só te mostra três opções e no futuro você descobrirá todas as armaduras "classes" durante a história). E o jogo esta mais preocupado em vender, do que deixar você aproveitar o mundo e pagar quando sentir que deve.

author: {'steamid': '76561197990228990', 'num_games_owned': 395, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 205, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 205, 'last_played': 1612204997}
review:
Unpolished, dull and degenerative to the genre.

Skyforge is a lobby-based singleplayer MMO that leans towards the 'mobile-gaming' type of gameplay.
I can't help but supporting the feeling, that this game was supposed to be released on the playstore rather than PC.

The few hours I managed to put in the game gave me the impressions that the game is on rails and uses a system similar to  Raid: Shadow Legends, where the player need to progress through serveral zones to infinity, upgrading various temples to make the character stronger.

The story seems interesting at first but quickly shows that it is broken, to the level where the cinematics cut themselves short before conversations are over.
Playing on your own leaves no need to communicate with other players. Players I've seen just stand around afk or dancing awkardly by themselves.. probably in boredom.

Combat is fun but cannot be used outside of the boring missions or training room.

Got my hopes up after watching a youtuber praise the Skyforge highly and compared it to Warframe.. I guess because it's a lobby mmo as well. Skyforge doesn't hold a candle to it at all..

author: {'steamid': '76561198249014974', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 4687, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4524, 'last_played': 1679210090}
review: alright, i haven't been playing long but 73 hours is enough for me to be level 192. so i feel like i can finally speak on this game and be semi accurate as to what i have to say. I'm sure you all have burning questions, and i doubt this review will answer all of them, but here goes;  for starters, i accidentally created my character on the eu server. and as a result i had to play all 72 hours, lagging, crashing, and having to fight some language barriers, as there is no method to switch characters to another server, however i made some good friends and am in a good guild thing, so i progressed even against those odds, the game play is lackluster, the abilities of the various classes are cool, but every class has one ability at minimum that does not work as intended, or is utterly useless, and getting classes is much more difficult than it should be taking days of effort to get the two classes i have purchased(with the in game method).  and after you've completed every mission, good luck getting another class for quite a while. combat feels weak, as a god/immortal, youd think you'd really hurt enemies, that only bosses would pose a real threat, but you'd be wrong,  once you become junior god, the difficulty is significantly upped from the immortal stage of the game, making it downright impossible to do some things in game alone without divine form. which costs currency, that takes quite a while to earn.  grouping up in this game is your only hope to gain levels, and your only hope to progress to elder god, which is when the difficulty finally hits the point where it feels balanced again, and youre not tickling enemies and or meeting death in two or three hits. lastly the game is meeting its own death, less and less people are on every day, and there is a trickle of new players, if you get invested do not be upset if you get on one day, to an empty server.  aside from its many downfalls, glitches, oversights, and lack of development. the game can be done completely free, and is very fun if you get a class you enjoy, and friends to play with, i plan on investing even more time into this game, if youre wondering if this is worth a try, it is. but dont judge the game too harshly until you have beaten the story, which above all of this games flaws, is by far its worst , to the point where i would rather stab myself in the heart than start again on the US server, for no other reason than i WILL NOT play through the story again.    i hope this review helps some of you choose to play or not too. and i hope it was not too long to read.

review:
Feels like one of those mobile games that steals character designs from other games for advertisements. I initially got the game years and years ago when it just hit early access. The game has changed quite a bit, but not enough. It is boring, looks and feels like a crappy mobile game, and lacks substance in every area. Character creator is a joke, too. One of the worst in MMORPGs.

There is potential for a great game with some love and money put towards development, but it will never happen. The ideas in this game are great. The execution of those ideas on the other hand... just yikes. Game is a 5/10.

review: Skyforge ist ein Bug Spiel seit der Veröffentlichung wurde nichts gemacht. Skills funktionieren manchmal nicht und wen man auf einem Felsen oder Abhang steht und einen Skill verwendet der auf den Feind wirft es an einer unsichtbaren Wand ap und Meistens beim Ausweichen bleibt man an einem Steinchen, Karton oder Ast hängen. Das Spiel wurde so oft verändert dass es kaum einem auffällt, es hat keine richtige Balance man ist immer im Nachteil (wenn man einige der Schmuckstücke anhat wo die werte nicht, für die klasse geeignet sind rechnet das System es trotzdem an wen du sie einmal an hattest da durch Werden die Viecher stärker und du schwächer). Einige der Leute haben schon über 100 Tickets geschrieben, die werden schon ignoriert. Meine Bitte an euch fangt das spiel bloß nicht an ihr werdet es bereuen.

author: {'steamid': '76561198094777753', 'num_games_owned': 324, 'num_reviews': 40, 'playtime_forever': 504, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 504, 'last_played': 1610859485}
review:
[h1] А вы тоже раньше думали, что нашли идеальную игру? [/h1]
Зашел недавно на сервер Mail.ru, ныне они My.Games, посмотрел на нынешнюю ситуацию и вздохнул с горечью - самые непритязательные игроки все еще живут и будут жить там, оправдывая свои занимательные приключения "обалденными" боями с аватарами вторжений (которые нынче длятся аж по два месяца). Ну так, вдудонили они туда не меньше, чем на новую машину, конечно же жаба задушит свой аккаунт бросить. Ну а что мы имеем по существу - вечное ОБТ (а вы думали что игра в релиз вышла?), кастрированную на 70% игру благодаря "Новой Эре", баги и глитчи, которые убивают желание там просто находиться, про ПВП я лучше промолчу, а из нового контента мы имеем 2 планеты и 2 новых данжа за пять лет существования игры (сразу вспоминается тюлень, который смеется и хлопает ластами). По их мнению игра должна быть красивой и... все, помянем атлас развития персонажа, билдостроение и вариативность. Так что, если вам нравится вечный гринд, красивые фантики, pay to win, настраивать размер ягодиц и пуза в редакторе, а также скотское отношение к игрокам - милости прошу к деградировавшему шалашу.

Sorry to hear that you are having this issue, could we request that you reach out to our support team so we can have it investigated? https://support.my.games/sf_int

Please include as much detail as possible, and be sure to check the specific Windows and Nvidia related settings to ensure the wrong GPU is being assigned (if you have not already).

author: {'steamid': '76561197996768711', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 9, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 9, 'last_played': 1610900742}
review:
Please ignore my hours on steam, i play this through my.games. But i downloaded it on here so I could leave a review and address some things. 

For old players or returning players that were part of pre-ascension days yes, the game isn't as good as it was - it could have been one of the best mmos ever made. Also for old players, the game went so far south many of you still hate on it today not knowing they've switched devs around and the game is soooo much better than it was (still not as good as pre-ascension tho lol).

BUT For new players, ignore the hate and give it a try. The game experience is very good now and this is still a good mmo, especially because you don't know what you missed out on lol. The combat is very fun, class switching is awesome, the graphics are still the best I've seen in an mmo, there's a ton to do, and the community is very helpful. Oh and God mode is an absolute blast- someone said you hardly use god mode, and this may be true when you first get it, but as you start progressing towards the mid-end game you can effectively use it  any time you need to. Join a guild and join any time they put out a group invite and you'll get leveled so quickly its funny. I know this game gets a lot of hate, but honestly I don't understand it anymore.

Yes there's a cash shop and at first glance seems ptw, and maybe it was at some point, but its not now. Equipment is locked behind resources that are hard to get and not purchasable. The only place in the shop you can buy gear straight out is under the "offer of the day" section. This section usually has a few legendary weapons you can purchase, though they are random with random stats and it updates every few days with other options- at first this may sound a little sketch but weapons in skyforge weapons don't affect your might or rank anymore. The gear that affects might and rank are jewelry and gems and you can't buy these. There a cash shop? yes. Is it pay to win? No, its pay for convenience, with said exceptions.

Food for thought: Being a badbass mudder trucker in Star Citizen (just one example) is literally determined by how much money you spend...but no one seems to care? So why do we care when an mmo charges to make you a badbass mudder trucker? Honestly, i just don't get why we care sometimes and not other times.

p.s. - You can have end game character with end game gear in eso, ffxiv, gw2 with just money - I've done it! lol

review: It has a decent story, but there isn't much background information given and the character customization is literally only skin deep; you can almost fully customize your avatar's base appearance, but there's barely any variety in the equipment. author: {'steamid': '76561198375029180', 'num_games_owned': 1496, 'num_reviews': 919, 'playtime_forever': 901, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 901, 'last_played': 1610056823}
review: Um dos melhores MMORPGs qe já joguei até hoje, pois resolvi testar vários gratuitos por curiosidade e esse foi o único qe passei mais de 10 hs jogando além de RuneScape!! E o motivo é qe ele não é padrão igual a grande maioria, não possui missões de matar determinada quantidade de monstros ou procurar um objeto pelo mapa, na verdade ele é uma mistura de Destiny com RPGs medievais em terceira pessoa e tem até uma pitadinha de Mass Effect. Com isso já dá pra saber qe o tema mistura sim fantasia medieval com tecnologia futurista, mas não de um modo ruim ou confuso, pois da mesma forma qe Destiny cada missão possui um mapa único qe precisa ser atravessado cm vários inimigos pelo caminho, tendo a possibilidade de ir solo ou coop cm alguma companhia específica ou grupo de aleatórios.. e cada fase se passa em um local diferente focada em uma temática específica; por exemplo tem fases qe apresentam cenários medievais como florestas e aldeias cm monstros fantasiosos e tudo mais, como há também fases qe se passam em fábricas e bases futuristas cm diferentes tipos de robôs como inimigos. Ademais de início vcê pode selecionar entre algumas classes padrões, e todas elas são voltadas para magia, armas e armaduras medievais, cm isso vcê pode escolher ser um guerreiro cm espadas ou uma maga curandeira, mas qe também usa feitiços ofensivos. A jogabilidade também é bem viciante, pois além de habilidades únicas de cada classe qe podem ser ativadas de tempos em tempos, há bastante liberdade em atacar e desviar de inimigos e até atingir vários de uma vez e liberar um ultimate especial conforme progride de nível. O qe mais prende é a história cm as fases da campanha, prqê cada fase tem inimigos diferentes, paisagens diferentes e bosses diferentes (são dois mini bosses e um boss final por fase). Com isso super recomendo Skyforge, um jogo totalmente gratuito e cm pagamento opcional para benefícios premium, mas qe não são assim tão necessários para se divertir por horas e horas em uma aventura sem igual e bastante dinâmica.

review: Не советую! Баланса нет! ПВП это вообще отдельная тема, без донатной пушки превратишься в мясо для отбивки. Но даже если купить за деньги оружие, то через месяц оно устареет. И тебе скажут купи еще, ведь теперь поколение оружия 29, а потом мы выкуем 30, а затем 31, ну и так бесконечный донат, непонятно за что? И еще одна особенность этой игры, превращать все ваши достижения в ноли. Развиваете Вы навык "Тактическое чутье", ну скажем так, убили на это пол года, а потом обнова, и волшебным образом "Тактическое чутье" становиться "Боевым превосходством". Развивайте  "Боевое превосходство" с самого ноля, а "Тактического чутья" теперь не будет) ЛОЛ, смена названия? Или обнуление? Да и вообще какого хрена? И так будет постоянно, все что Вы разовьете, в итоге объявят нолем)

author: {'steamid': '76561198305898639', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 233, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 233, 'last_played': 1609519252}
review:
Оставь надежду всяк в сие игравший. Начнем. В игру я хотел поиграть давно. Был преисполнен энтузиазмом, однако. Проблемы начались с самого старта. Нету русского в стиме. В РУССКОЙ ИГРЕ НЕТУ РУССКОГО. Через официальный сайт причем есть. Первый звоночек. Начинается игра и тут кастомизвция. На удивление, кастомизация широкая, включая походку и голос(спойлер: гг почти немой. Только ахи и охи). Начинается игра. ВАУ ЭТО ЧТО НАЧАЛО СЮЖЕТКИ СОЛДАТА ИЗ SWTOR? Да, сценка похожая. ,Но сходство на этом не кончается. Графика 1/1 swtor 17 года. И тут, без спойлеров, перейду к итогам более чем 14 часовой игры(3 стим, 11 сайт). И так- игра в буквальном смысле бездушный клон SWTOR. Бездушность- сеттинг не захватывает, лор(или бэк) не интересен, персонажи не вызывают сочувствия, события не вовлекают, музыка не захватывает, а эффекты оставляют желать лучшего. Подача мира из жанра «в лоб». У ГГ нету четкой мотивации, он делает что то только потому, что ему указали пальцем. Самое веселое- это не ММО и не РПГ. Да, люди есть, ,но смысла с ними взаимодействовать- нет. РПГ составляющая заключается только в выборе экипировки. Ни выборов в диалогах, ни выбора пути- нету. Локации в большинстве своем- коридорные. Диалоговая система в зачатке. Никакой нелинейности развития персонажа и диалогов. Так же должен отметить что озвучка русская полное г. Профессиональные актеры, занкомые голоса и играют... не играют они. Зачитывают текст.
Теперь Плюсы- боевка. Она подана достойно, красиво и динамично. Сами бои не заставят вас скучать, хоть и серьёзного челенджа в них нет. Геймлей- в игре полно активностей, на изучение и открытие которых у вас уйдёт ни один час. И... и все. 
По итогу скажу- игру могу посоветовать только самым непритязательным гражданам. Людям, у которых есть чувство прекрасного и желание насладиться качественным продуктом- не рекомендую. Надеюсь, таких большинство.
P.S. Донаааатыыыыыы, дрошилняяяяя

author: {'steamid': '76561198030784015', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11208, 'playtime_forever': 345, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 273, 'last_played': 1680621490}
review:
This is a "Freemium" MMORPG with a sci-fi/fantasy theme.   While there's some time to waste if you don't pay any money, the paywalls here are severe and the developers are extremely greedy in comparison to the dozens of other freemium MMORPGs they're competing with. 

Grind heavy, light on storytelling and plot (which are essential elements for any RPG!), this could have been great but it's been handled badly.  If the game was more accessible to free players, and the devs didn't have their hands out from behind the paywalls with bundles well over $100 USD (ouch), I'd give this a thumbs up, but you can't really play very far in the free tier.   Jumping into an MMO is a big time investment, and being invested in this one means forking out big bucks on all the packages you need to buy just to play a "free" game.   I can't recommend that to anyone.

author: {'steamid': '76561198053478327', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 5828, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5442, 'last_played': 1611607826}
review: On first impression, you'll find this to be one of the most well-designed games.  Character creation, skill sets, ability to play every class, compelling story line, instanced progression, all combine to keep you excited and engaged in the early stages.  But from the very beginning, I was alarmed that I was surrounded by rank/level 300+ players while I was spending hours getting to rank 40.  You can throw $10s if not $100s at the game to make maybe 5% progress.  But through it all, the goal of evolving from an immortal to a god kept me interested.  Finally, the big fight --- one of the best solo confrontations in any game --- and I made it.  I went immediately from rank 50+ to 90+ ... and found that although the content exploded from maybe 5-7 daily activities to about 15-20, almost all of it was beyond my abilities.  I tried every challenge using half a dozen classes that I had earned or bought, was summarily defeated at every step --- not even close. I did some research and inquired of my friends in guild:  Basically the only way to progress is through the kindness of strangers who are willing to carry you for the next few months until you can raise your might and rank to 300+ and play on your own.  The group finder is useless.  Your only chance of being carried if not for friends is to play support and hope no one notices you're doing almost nothing.

author: {'steamid': '76561198077641600', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 65, 'playtime_forever': 254, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 254, 'last_played': 1607565375}
review:
Funny thing, I downloaded this thinking it would be a MMORPG, but it's not. You hang around the lobby and go on 5 minute missions, much like a lot of mobile games. There's no open world, no exploration, just a hub and the missions.

Now, that's a design choice that I personally dislike, and I dislike it in this game as well. Then why the fock am I recommending the game?

Well, mostly because it looks well done. The style is really interesting, the combat is spot on and the people around do tend to be helpful. It's not my type of game, but to people who enjoy this kind of progression, this is a good game to try out. And it's free!

author: {'steamid': '76561198069467636', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 17266, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 15017, 'last_played': 1625499866}
review:
Skyforge ist grundsätzlich  kein wirklich schlechtes Spiel. Gameplay macht Spaß und der anreiz das man sich als Gott durch Horden von Gegnern schnetzelt klingt erstmal nicht schlecht. Aber ... das Spiel versagt bei der umsetztung vieler seiner Konzepte wirklich fatal. Das Balancing ist absolut random. Manche Gegner Killen einen mit ihren Auto Attacken beinahe sofort.  Bosse sind oft einfacher zu besiegen als irgendwelche normalen Gegnergruppen.    
Das Progressionssystem ist schrecklich. Entweder du Grindest das Game 24 Stunden am Tag oder du Zahlst dafür. 
Manche der Klassen sind Klar stärker als andere. Spieler werden dir empfehlen wen du irgendwo nicht weiterkommst das du einfach bessere Klasse XY nimmst. Da denk ich mir welchen Sinn hat es irgendeine andere Klasse als diese zu spielen wobei  das Spiel mit seiner Klassenvielfalt wirbt. Ich finde es aber irgendwie schade das viele dieser Probleme immernoch im Spiel vorhanden sind, den die oben genanten Probleme sind oft nicht erst vor kurzem, sondern schon seit des erscheinens des Spiels da. 

Fazit: Mir persönlich macht es zwar meistens Spaß hier und da mal zu spielen. Aber auf dauer regen mich diese vielen wirklich offensichtlichen Macken des Spiels einfach nur auf.

author: {'steamid': '76561198291315472', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 484, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 462, 'last_played': 1609787271}
review: Hello fellow gamers, I would like to share my opinion with you (first time rating a game as you can tell xD), the thing with this game is that I would totally recommend it to people who have very little time to spare some free-time like 15-30 minutes at max. Overall, it's a great game if you consider that it's a hub-based mmo so the exploration is quite linear but the combat is so fluid and flashy and the enviroments most of them so far have some character. The story is easy to follow nothing mind-blowing like Star Wars The Old Republic but still most of the dialogue with the NPCs is voice-acted which is an admirable effort to keep you interested. That's all so far, have a nice day/night/evening! Peace out.

author: {'steamid': '76561197994037997', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 257, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 217, 'last_played': 1612451952}
review: Heute 2.12.20, nach über 3 Jahren mal wieder probiert das Spiel zu spielen... ich war schon in der Beta mit dabei und ich muss sagen, DIE bekommen es nicht auf die Reihe! Jahrelange Fehler, wie steckenbleiben... mitten unterm laufen... Teilweise unbegründete Laggs mit 3-5 sek Verzögerungen... und von den Pay too Win Sachen will ich gar nicht erst anfangen... ja klar die müssen sich am "leben" halten aber was bekommst du den dafür mit dem Premium.... Doppelte Belohnung bei gleichbleibendem Tages Limit... haha das ich nicht lache.... okay ja ich hab mir eine gen. 28 Waffe Gekauft is besser als der normale scheiß den man bekommt... und wennst was gescheites haben willst, kannst warten.... bei nem Freund der mit mir versucht seit 2 wochen klar zu kommen, droppt einfach keine neue Waffe läuft immer noch mit gen. 1 rum xD, da kannst nichts machen, auser Glück das dich ein paar durchziehen... Das Prestige lvl heute. Abgeschmiert... gestern noch 274... heute 74 xD was is das für ein witz? Festung weggemacht alles vergebene mühen gewesen... ständig ändern die was und machen es schlimmer als es is... Die Betha war um einiges besser als der Mist den die Jetzt anbieten! KAUFT EUCH NICHTS DADRIN! ABZOCKE!!!! entweder erspielen oder sein lassen...

author: {'steamid': '76561198279411914', 'num_games_owned': 108, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 4330, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4330, 'last_played': 1589459229}
review:
Comment bien résumer le jeu ? 
- P2W
Commencer Skyforge en 2020 sans y mettre 1 euros  , c'est etre voué a la ramasse total et la perte de motivation que ça entraine
Le jeu tourne autour de la mecanique d'Instance : Tu entre a X , tu ressort a X , vous gagnez du loot , et vous recommencez si vous avez envie , tout ça pour drop 1% des ressources requises a l'amelioration d'un seul buff , alors que les objets sont possiblement achetable dans la boutique a coup de 10 euros
L'histoire est bidon , fade , des doublages mauvais , des lags , des freezes , ajouté a ça un peu de sel car la communauté et au 3/4 AFK , et vous avez le MMO Parfait qui n'as de MMO que ... la Description 

J'y ai joué a ses debuts , c'etait cool , le systeme etait totalement different , puis il y a eu la dérive de l'argent , ils ont facilité les choses , et rendu la totalité du jeu possible en sortant sa carte bleu
Mais sans toucher au reste et sans ameliorer la qualité de leur jeu ... Et c'est bien dommage , c'etait prometteur , 
Je ne recommande pas du tout ( Sauf si vous avez gagnez au Loto ou que vous avez de l'argent qui traine )

author: {'steamid': '76561198008429566', 'num_games_owned': 147, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 16372, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 12297, 'last_played': 1606961439}
review:
ATTENTION : ce jeu est un gros P2W ! En théorie tout est obtenable en jeu, mais en pratique ce sont des années de farm qu'il faut pour débloquer certains trucs (et ce n'est pas une exagération). Les prix en boutique sont juste indécents, le moindre skin vaut minimum 10€ en gemmes. Dédicace aux médailles de la victoire : 12€50 les 5000, il en faut des centaines de milliers en jeu, à coup de 1000 par jour quand on ne paye pas...

Skyforge est un MMO qui n'en a que le nom, vu que la quasi totalité du contenu est dans des missions couloir avec un nombre de joueurs limités. Si c'est un MMO, alors Diablo aussi. Il n'y a pas de métiers, pas de housing, rien d'autre que du combat.
Le jeu s'articule autour d'un gameplay typé action, plus proche de TERA que de WOW. 18 classes sont disponibles, dont 4 accessibles de base (1 disponible en DLC gratuit sur steam). Vous commencez par un trèèèès long tuto où vous devrez faire une trentaine de missions solo (obligratoirement seul), et accèderez à quelques zones ouvertes, avant de débloquer la forme divine, et d'enfin pouvoir vraiment jouer en groupe.

Je ne vais pas passer par quatre chemins : le jeu est mauvais. Le seul truc à sauver c'est que les combats sont dynamiques, et c'est à peu près tout.

Graphismes : pour un jeu de 2015 c'est pas ouf, beaucoup de réutilisation des assets, et ce sont pas deux reflets sur les textures des persos et des boobs qui bougent qui vont changer la donne. Etrangement, il y a des zones super sympas et d'autre vraiment banales.

Histoire : Complètement ininterressante. Ca dégouline de morale américaine, on est gentils mais tout ce qui est différent ou tout ce qui a quelque chose qu'on veut, on le défonce. Les doublages sont géniaux, il y a des passages où j'ai vraiment rigolé tellement c'était mauvais. La quasi totalité des dialogues sont juste lus, il n'y a pas de jeu d'acteur, et du coup dans les scènes un peu tendues c'est juste ridicule.

Technique : crash une fois par jour minimum, je ne dépasse pas les 50fps alors que mon materiel ne dépasse pas les 40% d'utilisation. Et des bugs, des bugs partout tout le temps, c’est infernal : rester bloqué dans le décor, dans une pente (oui oui), passer à travers le sol, pas d'animations, caméra bloquée, perso invisible etc... Etrangement, la boutique est le seul truc où je n'ai jamais rencontré de bug :3

Gameplay : Après avoir touché à quelques classes en dehors de celles de base, j'ai l'impression de jouer toujours la même chose, il y a très peu de spécificités, on se contente de spam l'attaque la plus forte dès que disponible en gros. Même les classes supposément complexes sont enfantines à jouer.
L'équilibrage est une horreur sans nom. Il y a des feuriosos et des saronides PARTOUT, et après les avoir testé, c'est clairement à raison. Il y a un fossé énorme entre certaines classes, d'ailleurs si vous commencez, débloquez en 1er le Saronide, ça permet de gérer énormément de contenu en solo grâce à des dégâts au dessus de pas mal de DPS et un tanking excellent.

Game design : les premières missions sont avenantes, et la dispo de 4 classes apporte de la diversité. Plus on avance plus ça devient répétitif, les mécaniques sont vraiment toujours les mêmes (activer des trucs ou tuer des mobs, rien d'autre) au point que beaucoup abandonnent avant d'avoir la divinité. Pour ceux qui ont tenu jusque là, un enfer commence : des semaines de PL car tout le contenu passe d'un coup à un niveau extrêmement élevé
Le jeu se targue de ne pas avoir de niveau, donc coup pas besoin de grind pour monter. Ah? En fait si, il faut farmer comme un fou pour monter ses bâtiments et gagner en puissance (et donc en rangs).
Le PvP est OBLIGATOIRE pour obtenir des équipements de dernière génération, et comme il n'y a pas de matchmaking digne de ce nom, vous allez juste vous faire ouvrir en boucle par des optis PvP. Heureusement, pas besoin de gagner pour avoir les récompenses.
Le mode divin vous permet de multiplier vos stats le temps d'une mission, et ça marche aussi en groupe. Ca casse complètement le challenge sur les missions classiques : les joueurs ne se donnent même plus la peine de faire une instance sans qu'un joueur du groupe ait la forme divine, qui gère très facilement solo. Son utilisation est limitée, mais plus on progresse plus on peut l'utiliser.

Modèle économique : f2p,  mais il faudra quand même passer à la caisse ou farmer comme un dégénéré pendant des mois pour n'avoir ne serai-ce qu'une arme légendaire (obsolète la saison suivante bien sûr).

Communauté : la commu fr est active, les toxiques sont assez minoritaires, mais le peu de end game que j'ai fait laisse paraître une communauté très élitiste.

Pourquoi je joue encore ? Parce que j'ai rien de mieux à faire, et que j'ai rencontré une ou deux personnes sympas, mais ça s'arrête là.
Jeu réservé aux gens qui cherchent un jeu multijoueur, simple, où farmer est la principale activité. Ou pour ceux qui ont déjà fait le tour des "gros" jeux du genre.

Bonne chance.

author: {'steamid': '76561198317796349', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 5710, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5399, 'last_played': 1636188020}
review:
Sehr schlechtes Aufstiegskonzept.

Geht bis Stufe 40, dann kommt man nicht mehr weiter, ausser man loggt sich 2 Wochen lang ein und spielt dumme Sachen oder man lässt sich hochziehen, langweilig.

Die nächste Durststrecke ist wenn man Juniorgott ist. Auch hier kommt man nur mit hochziehen weiter und kann nichts mehr alleine schaffen (oder nur in einem Schneckentempo, dass einem langwelig wird).

Vorallem gab es eine Questbelohnung das Geschlecht des Charakters zu ändern. Die erste Änderung war kostenlos. Nun kostet das Zurücksetzen Geld. 
Das ist sehr schade, wenn man sich einen speziellen Charakter geschaffen hat, dann spiel ich den Müll einfach nicht mehr, fertig.

author: {'steamid': '76561198030715265', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 18918, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 16549, 'last_played': 1701539391}
review:
Nearly creates its own genre of game by blending aspects of an MMO, action RPG, MOBA, and others.

The gameplay is extremely fun, cool and deeply satisfying plus you can switch your class with no sacrifice  and so change your experience on a whim.  

You lose nothing from dying so there is no punishing aspect of play; just good fun the entire time.

The community is extremely helpful and friendly too although you will need to join a guild (pantheon) to take full advantage of this but doing so is easy.

author: {'steamid': '76561198172072797', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 1354, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1197, 'last_played': 1690761276}
review:
If you haven't read the reviews of the game already: 
This game is fun for a few hours, or days, etc, but after a while, you hit the infamous paywall. The story is rather forgettable, and the characters are not so. character customization is bland and completely pointless, and the game seems incredibly pay-to-win. The player is a plank and has ZERO character. The grind may be worth it, so I'll give it some time, but across multiple platforms, the pay to use classes are much more fun and interesting than the standard 3 classes, all being relatively bland. To fix it, it would be nice to have all the classes, bar the re-skins or ones the developers find REALLY worth having behind a paywall. The visuals, for such a game are average, and the enemies are very poor in design. The special powers are not very appealing, even for this type of game. But the worst thing is the world, in several senses. The world as in story, is stupid, a retro-futuristic style is fine, but there is no practicality to the world, most of it's there for the visuals, which doesn't mean the models for futuristic technology is good, it's not. If it were described as an action adventure game instead of an RPG, it would be fine, but RPGs require story arcs, which this basically runs down to "kill this thing" and when the purpose is achieved, it gets repeated. This could've been a REALLY good game, but games are supposed to get better in story, not worse, people will have a very high standard based on visuals. This won't change the developer's minds, but if you plan on supporting this game, just know that it's not universally praised.

author: {'steamid': '76561199021679206', 'num_games_owned': 22, 'num_reviews': 57, 'playtime_forever': 70, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 70, 'last_played': 1596890371}
review: I will be glad if you give me a award

author: {'steamid': '76561199026627481', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 2641, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2594, 'last_played': 1602878766}
review:
At the start everything looks great. I started that mage class and had alot of fun. Some quest discriptions are cryptical and some bugs should be fixed but whatever. The worst of them is that the game goes quiet or starts playing disabled sound and silences activated sound. So basicly deactivates speech and combat sound and plays music instead.

I love mages and everything went peachy and I had alot of fun. Just until I made the mistake to make the quest to be awarded goodhood. Now almost every place I goto is way too hard (trash having 21 million hp while I got 2,7m. Groupfinder just gets you somewhere at events, the rest of the time you wait forever and all there is left to do is forrests who get stale pretty quick because they all have the same quests, the same mobs, the same minibosses.

Players take randoms and are kicking them before the last boss.

If you are lucky to get in a helpful guild you might have a chance to see something beyond that point. Else it is just endless waiting in queues and repetition or the choice to simply quit.

author: {'steamid': '76561198245932864', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 44, 'playtime_forever': 2112, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1822, 'last_played': 1695458882}
review: Gioco spettacolare, sistema di combattimento interessante, un misto tra action combat e old style tab target. Tantissime missioni, eventi, attivitá, ottima grafica, classi multiple tutte utilizzabile dallo stesso personaggio. Uno dei migliori giochi a cui abbia mai giocato.

author: {'steamid': '76561198397726359', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 27830, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 26780, 'last_played': 1706922553}
review: Li uma análise antiga que me inspirou a dar meu primeiro feedback público do jogo. Eu abandonei o jogo por volta de 2018, sendo que eu comecei a jogar no beta, primeiro pelo client do jogo (não me recordo o nome) e depois pela steam, com uma conta zerada. Tenho na minha conta steam 446 horas jogadas, então provavelmente devo ter alguma propriedade para falar do assunto. Aos poucos, minha experiência com o jogo foi se tornando cada vez mais horrível. Primeiro pelo fato de querer jogar solo, a sensação de jogar jogar e nunca crescer sem precisar de ajuda, lhe obrigando a entrar em guildas com pessoas arrogantes e que só te ajudam se tiver tal programa, se fizer tal coisa, se ir para aquilo e etc. A pior parte era você estar numa missão e os mais fortes saírem voando no mapa em montarias de batalha ou em forma elder god, deixando você para trás apenas para pegar os loot que deixavam na frente. Mano, dane-se o loot, eu quero me divertir, ser útil na missão, nn ficar pegando o resto dos mais fortes. Tudo isso, e também o fato de existir claramente classes que estão num abismo de diferença das outras (sendo que no geral as mais fraquinhas eram as que mais me atraiam) culminou para que eu abandonasse de vez o jogo. De tempos em tempos (como hoje) eu ainda costumo entrar na página do jogo na vã esperança de alguma atualização drástica que tenha melhorado as coisas, mas aparentemente (e também baseado em vezes que eu reinstalei, joguei uma ou duas semanas e apaguei de novo) o jogo só vai de mal a pior. Hoje é extremamente pay to win, sem qualquer oportunidade de crescimento para players iniciantes (que no geral abandonam o jogo nos primeiros níveis), foi o que observei. Um terceiro fato, são as quests repetitivas, mas isso já em um tanto esperado nesse tipo de jogo, então são coisas que "dá pra relevar", embora algumas novidades fizessem toda a diferença. Não se a quantidade de players atualmente, vi alguns anúncios do jogo no youtube, então me parece que estão investindo na divulgação, eu espero de fato que eles estejam melhorando, pois é um jogo promissor que se auto-sabotou. Espero um dia ter algo que me faça voltar a jogá-lo.

review:
Have you found this game installed without ever seeing it before? 
I installed a game called Conqueror's Blade on a "MY.GAME" Client, an entirely different platform. I keep my Steam Library clean and noticed that this game was installed while looking for Stream Avatars. I poked around and found that the game was force installed through that "MY.GAME" client. I uninstalled this, Conqueror's Blade and the "MY.GAME" Client and my router crashes instantly after removing these files. 
Do not trust this developer.

author: {'steamid': '76561198340736322', 'num_games_owned': 533, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 651, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 643, 'last_played': 1614801178}
review:
Tbh I had a hard time on deciding the review for this, as it's a decent enough game in it's own right, and is technically free. I say technically as your going to have to spend money to get much variation out of it.

|However my biggest gripe would be the repetitiveness, of the whole thing. 
This is literally, start Q > SMASH > More SMASH > Big baddie appears, SMASH and TA-DA! 
Congrats you got a very minor reward, annnnnnnnd off you go again.

The graphics are decent, the game play isn't terrible, some weird audio sync issues that look like an old Bruce-Lee movie (it's free remember) but mainly it just lacks substance.

So in essence if you want a free game to pass some time, with decent combat and a simple story then give this a try, however if your looking for Warcraft or ESO then I wouldn't get your hopes up. 

Overall 5/10 :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198275290852', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 69, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 49, 'last_played': 1605877737}
review:
If you want to make a ideea if to start to play this game or not read here:


With 1163 hours  played from my.games, i can say Skyforge was a good game, but now i would nod recommand to anyone, never.It is super grinding, need to grind years to get a really good account, with everything you would need, also is very p2w ONLY if not farming(can avoid p2w if farm a lot).The content is fun(and super hard) at start.When get bit higher maps are easy to do, and when open a end-game content map... is a hell, some are extremly hard.What about classes?It have a good class system and can unlock all of them for free, but, yes there is a but, only few classes can be played each invasion due a system we have in game called Atlas(the super grind in game at this moment, and the most annoying one because it reset every 2 months and you lose all progress on it).Beside the fact that you need Atlas to play some classes, you also need a legendary / pack / p2w weapon(you can buy them with in-game curency, but take some time to farm the needed ammount, however i have most of the weapons needed farmed in like 2 years xD)
The walls of the game: from start untill end content you will hit many walls, points where you think will be impossible to progress anymore and can take you even weeks to pass a wall
Amount of the bugs in that game is ridicolous, some of them are super annoying and make it super unplayable(this game don t even have sound since years btw, is a bug)
No new content, the content we get in last time is only content wich was removed in past, and now they bring it back with few changes(and is worst that it was before)
PvP - The pvp is BAD. I like the combat style on pvp and so, but you need to FARM A LOT FOR PVP BUILD AND CHANGE IT OFTEN. Also the ranked pvp is bugged, after you get to diamond few times(highest league), you won t win points anymore.
 The player base is usually helpfully but... not many players(on EU PC we have most of the players - except russian server - and still i doubt we have like 200-300 active players per day), ps4, xbox and NA have even less players
 So if you are thinking about starting to play skyforge, all i can tell you it is funny for short time, just for test, if bored, but if want to play it for end content and so i don t recomand it, is a bullshit endless and pointless grind(end content reward isn t worth for the work it need to be).I DON T RECOMANDT IT

author: {'steamid': '76561197974765747', 'num_games_owned': 868, 'num_reviews': 362, 'playtime_forever': 3380, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 347, 'last_played': 1693278844}
review:
Update 2023:
I just got back into this recently with my kids and a friend. I am having a blast. The game still looks great even after all this time. I have RTX 4090/13700k/23 GB DDR5 RAM playing at 4k+.
It seems they did change some things and the game feels better.

I was playing this game basically as an RPG. The graphics are very good and the action combat is fairly easy to get into. From what I have played so far it is pretty fun. Again my review is from a single player perspective which I do not mind. If you like PVE MMOs than this should keep you busy for many hours. The game looks great in 4k. You can switch through multiple classes anytime you want back at the hub. If you want hardcore style MMO then try the pvp stuff. My rating is 8/10.

Old video:
Some noob game play here. I am not sure of I was on some kind of easy mode. It was hard for me to get hurt much except bosses. Unless I was that good. Doubt it. :)
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2245292482

review: Pretty easy chill free game. This is like a small mmo dungeon type game. There are a couple of places where it is large scale mmo type, But its mostly dungeon type which can be completed alone. You get 3 classes and unlock others, it seems to be like mobile games where you take ages to unlock 1 thing. Game is pretty chill nothing crazy but great for a free game. Graphics look nice. If you are bored from everything , I would recommend you give it a try for a quick mmo fix. But you most likely will end up playing something else sooner or later.

author: {'steamid': '76561198173352489', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 4991, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3894, 'last_played': 1653926428}
review:
Leveling System is a complete nightmare. about 3/4 of the way through what they call the tutorial you run into a brick wall. Hard. I expect f2p games to be a bit grindy and everything but progress doesn't slow down, it stops. You either get carried at that point or you invest money into a stronger class because it's so terribly unclear what you're supposed to do. No System message, no tutorial steps, not so much as a popup tooltip.

The game massively underplays just how important things like the stronghold etc are. Progression is not so much gear centered as equal parts gear and your Capital buildings, especially early on and at the same time progress through those buildings is heavily timegated.
developer_response: Thanks for the feedback, we have recently been reviewing the early game experience, progression and Stronghold. We have been testing updates to these systems on our public test server and will be making some adjustments that directly address many of your concerns in the near future.
