author: {'steamid': '76561197991702942', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 229, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 229, 'last_played': 1555154901}
review:
If you're alone and want to start a new game, this one might be fun, the combat ain't bad, there is a story and the game might be worth the shot.

If you want to start the game with a friend, don't bother, the story missions are solo and once you can create a party, you still can't do the same mission together, you'll have to do everything alone, so it's basically single player. They do let you repeat already completed zones with a group, but what's the point if you can't progress together with a  friend?

This is the most single player MMO that I have ever tried.

author: {'steamid': '76561198071484165', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 1113, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1113, 'last_played': 1548534756}
review:
My.com. All you need to know. 

But for real, this game is a major letdown. Visually fantastic. Pretty fun combat once you get all your abilities. Reasonably interesting story. . .
And it's all solo. Literally the entire game is solo, with the exception of a few open areas here and there. You'll spend most of your time grinding through increasingly similar-feeling missions by yourself, quickly tiring you out on both the combat and the story, because those are the only two things to do for the first 50+ hours of this game. 
Then of course there's the almost outright lying done on the store page. This game does in fact contain 17 playable classes - however, only three of them will be usable for the first 30 or so hours, by which point you probably won't even care enough anymore to bother unlocking another. Of course, if you do, be sure to pick correctly since you'll only have enough currency to unlock one other class before you have to grind another 30 hours. This, combined with the trivial level-up system, puts the game in Warframe-levels of tedium. 
By this point, the game is already pretty unenjoyable to play, but just to make sure you almost never want to touch it again,  the game is sure to throw in a bunch of mobile-ready P2W aspects, allowing you to bypass a lot of the grindy/time-consuming elements by simply pulling out your credit card. 
Overall, huge potential that was squashed by incredibly greedy decisions.

author: {'steamid': '76561198151101259', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 2017, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 968, 'last_played': 1636110059}
review:
This game is game is very pretty and and has a large amount of content for free. End game has some interesting mechanics and there's a lot of things to take part in, even though it can be quite grindy. Seasonal rotating events keep you on your toes, waiting for the holidays to grab the latest Valentine items or Christmas goodies.

Considering this is a Free to Play MMO with a small development studio, I think it's a solid game.

review: Нажал установить. Он скачивал мне его 30-40 минут. Затем скачал геймцентр и снова 30-40 минут закачки. При запуске я осознал что русского нет из-за стима. Идите в маил и качайте там. Там на русском, там качает 1 раз. Как минимум сэкономите 30-40 минут.

author: {'steamid': '76561198939705539', 'num_games_owned': 178, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 2699, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1620, 'last_played': 1697014152}
review:
Skyforge ist so nicht schlecht. Es gibt natürlich Pros und Contras wie bei jedem Spiel. Es ist nur sehr schade meiner Meinung nach, dass es sehr viel Kostet die jeweiligen Klassen freizuschalten. Die benötigten Coins bekommt man leider nicht soviel wie man eigentlich benötigt. Ich finde es auch irgendwie ärgerlich das es Aufgaben gibt die man nur mit mehreren bewältigen kann und bis das Spiel das Spiel andere Spieler findet für diese Aufgaben vergeht eine Gefühlte Ewigkeit..
Doch es macht dennoch eine Menge Spaß wenn man die dinge erledigen kann ohne auf Hilfe angewiesen zu sein. 
Das könnte ich so gesehen Stundenlang Zocken und es wird nicht Langweilig....jedenfalls noch nicht und ich hoffe sehr das es auch so bleibt. Es ist natürlich Geschmacksache, also ich würde dieses spiel jedoch Empfehlen :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198026528518', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 6116, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6036, 'last_played': 1588446542}
review:
Game is great until you become a junior God, then, even if you have done all your bastions to their max, and gotten the best gear you can, you CANNOT do anything, unless you go to divine form which takes resources it will take you a long time to get at this point in the game, or be carried. 

After I was carried a few times, I got all new gear except one slot, a gem, put my prestige at 140, the mobs have a power level of 230, so I still cannot do anything, unless I am carried. The community, while nice, uses acronyms for everything, and you really will have no idea where you need to go to get your gear where it needs to be.

I also have a suspicion, that most of the high level players were playing from the beginning, or when this switchover first happened. From what I can tell every so often a "new generation" of weapons is released, with harder enemies, and the gap in power from junior god to playing with other players grows further.

So the catch up mechanic is non existent/ broken/ insanely hidden.

So like so many others, after really enjoying the game for a while, I hit a wall, and decided, screw it, I am not banging my head against this wall. To people who scream its a grinding game, you have to put time in, do your bastions, etc.etc.etc. Most the people with this problem you hear about every so often knows this, we are fine with this, but in order to grind, you have to be able to complete content. and when the suppose to soloable content is no longer solable cause a broken game mechanic, and the only solution is to try to understand a horrible LFG system that until this point there was literally no reason for you to even pay attention to, people will get upset and quit.

Like me.

author: {'steamid': '76561198930042392', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 1441, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1441, 'last_played': 1553973041}
review:
Charaktererstellung und -gestaltung: Eine sehr umfangreiche Charaktergestaltung, bei dem man seinem Charakter das Aussehen geben kann, das man möchte. Es gibt zwar begrenzte Möglichkeiten, sind aber dennoch weitreichender als in anderen F2P-MMORPG's. Kostüme sind In-Game erspielbar, jedoch auch durch die leicht zu erhaltende Währung "Credits" zu erkaufen. Das Klassensystem begrenzt sich auf den einzigen Charakter, den man erstellen kann. Es gibt keine Charakterliste und man kann zwischen den Klassen switchen, sie aufleveln und skillen, ohne dass beim Wechsel Verluste entstehen. Ein großartiges System, wenn auch das Skillsystem sehr simpel gehalten wurde. (4/5)

Grafik: Sci-Fi mäßig gestaltete Welten, von Pflanzen umrankte Gebäude, ein Insel-Resort von feinster Qualität und viele weitere, schön gestaltete Gebiete warten auf die Spieler. Sowohl Open-World Gebiete, als auch die Story Gebiete bieten uns eine große Auswahl für unsere Augen. Sie sind individuell gestaltet und es macht unglaublich viel Spaß sie zu erkunden. Es ist nicht so bunt wie ein Fantasy-Game, aber es ist nun mal kein Anime-Cartoon MMORPG. (5/5)

Sound: Epische Kampfmusik, entspannende Hintergrundmusik zum relaxen und die verschiedenen Sounds im Hintergrund bieten für jedes Gebiet das passende Ambiente. Wer braucht schon Spotify, wenn man schon gute Musik im Spiel hat? (4/5)

Kampfsystem: Ein action-basiertes Kampfsystem, bei dem jeder Schritt zählt! Ausweichen, Kombos abschließen, wichtige Momente nutzen um einen Vorteil zu erhalten: Das ist wahrer Spaß. Und in einer Gruppe machen die Kämpfe um längen mehr Spaß! Ob ihr nun eure Kameraden am Leben haltet oder die Gegner für sie schwächt. Jeder Schritt zählt. (5/5)

Quests & Story: Eine sehr interessante Story. Plötzlich gilt man als unsterblicher Gott und bahnt sich seinen Weg zwischen Geheimnisse und eigenartige Geschehnisse. Doch die Dialoge sind recht lang und verderben gerne die Lust, mitzulesen. Die Cutscenes sind jedoch gut eingestellt und bieten gerne mal actionreiche Kampfszenen. Die NPC's heben sich oftmals voneinander ab, doch das gilt nur für jene, die für längere Zeit eine Rolle spielen. (3/5)

Skyforge... macht Spaß. Es ist unglaublich schön gestaltet und zum Stressabbau perfekt geeignet. Ob man nun als Berserker seinen Feinden die Köpfe absägt, ihnen als Revolverheld Bomben entgegen wirft oder als Lichthüter mit Lasern um sich schießt: Jede Klasse hat einen einzigartigen Spaßfaktor. (21/25)

author: {'steamid': '76561198057993389', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 1376, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1200, 'last_played': 1554588859}
review: Skyforge is a very enjoyable game. Fast paced action adventure rpg. It reminds me of Phantasy Star Online.  I am having fun playing it. The menus are simple, the leveling mechanic is easy to understand and the game play is fun. It is  not a traditional styled RPG or MMO.  I think those who liked PSO back in the day will enjoy Skyforge greatly.

author: {'steamid': '76561198001939226', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 11479, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 9055, 'last_played': 1643553192}
review:
- Graphics = Very good
- Story = Mediocre
- Variety of classes = Very good
- Grinding = Medium-to-high
- Community = Friendly
- Pay-to-win = Non-existent

Don't expect a Lineage II-type of game. 
Don't expect a Planetside 2-type of game. 
And don't expect a Star Wars: The Old Republic-type of game. 

Instead, take the game as it is and you'll enjoy it. Another plus is the community, which is friendly.

author: {'steamid': '76561198103202497', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 2152, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1709, 'last_played': 1597003655}
review:
NÃO RECOMENDAMOS
Se fosse falar sobre a beleza do jogo e jogabilidade, eu recomendaria, mas um jogo não consiste em só isso. Quando o jogo se torna totalmente "Pay to Win", onde as armas lendárias compradas de cash (que por sinal são muito cara) a sua duração é pelo máximo de 20 dias ou até o final da invasão atual que geralmente dura 2 meses, quando inicia uma nova invasão, todo o seu investimento foi perdido. Pois para continuar com um bom desempenho, você terá que  investir novamente numa outra arma lendária.
Há, esqueci de falar, as armas Lendárias vendidas no jogo, vem em "Caixas Surpresa" que nunca vem a arma da classe que você deseja, induzindo que você coloque cash, para comprar diversas caixas, até conseguir uma arma satisfatória. Não compensa.

Se você for jogar, não invista no jogo, não vale a pena.

author: {'steamid': '76561197977433391', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 36588, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 28587, 'last_played': 1559379716}
review:
I can definitely recommend this game. 
Just dont look at it from a mmo-perspective. I think it has more in comon with dungeon crawlers like monster hunter or diablo -like games.

The grind is real, but totally doable and there are many aspects. Its just not so obvious what to do and in most cases counter-intuitive which I really like. So you basically have to macro-plan your progress.

The subscription is rather cheap and worth it, though you can aquire Argents through in-game events and basically play with a subscription for free. There are also promotional events that give 3-7 days of subscription to try out.
I spent money in this game just like I spent money on PoE : To support the developer.
I dont see how calling "pay to win" would be justified when the majority of the stuff you can buy is cosmetic.
And that single weapon you can buy for each class doesnt really cut it. And you get it as a free drop anyway.

What I really dislike is that you cannot help new players progress through the quest to become a junior god.
What you can do is help them grind some better gear so they can finish it faster but still they have to to it all alone which kinda sucks and puts off a lot of people, which I can totally understand. I hope they change that in the near future.

author: {'steamid': '76561198027944245', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 32, 'playtime_forever': 86814, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 57389, 'last_played': 1692343496}
review:
**I HAVE ACTIVATED THE COMMENTS I WAS SO UPSET WHEN I FIRST POSTED THIS I FORGOT TO TURN THEM ON**

It is 10:03 EST 07/15/2020

Right this very moment I am on skyforge. Guess what I am doing...

Standing in Devine observitory with 20 other people... doing NOTHING! 

No one is talking in chat.
Barely anyone is moving.

I have asked in chat for a group so i can get an item.

No one replies.
No one sends me an Invite.
No one even gives me a toxic comment.

They are all just standing there.

In the past when I complained about this i would get lash back. Some would say if the game bothers me why do I play it... I must now pose a questIon to them.

HOW DOES THIS GAME >>NOT<<< BOTHER YOU?!

Starting off you have to play 36 missions... solo... on an MMO. then you get your devine form... which you can't use right away because you need a resource, nor is it any good to use in solo missions as it is extremely weak. DEVINE... FORM... you know when you turn into a god! Its WEAK! Especially since the game now boost all enemies (that you actually get decent gear from) to about level 300. Lets not forget that you get enough sparks to get a new class ( unless you save up for a more recent more expensive one) and that means fight extremely powerful enemies with next to no skills.

The list goes on... and on.... there are so many issues with this game how do people still defend it.And how  can you litereally stand in one spot in one game for hours... doing NOTHING!?

I honestly want to know why!

graphics are beautiful
combo combat is awesome

MMO that doesn't give the option to play with friends (almost) from the start is a daft choice for the developers and probably why most reviews are piss poor for the game

author: {'steamid': '76561198062588051', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 335, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 244, 'last_played': 1699446866}
review:
I am one of the founders from the original first launch Skyforge, although the game had an interesting concept, the game design is just awful. you don't get that feel of achieving something, the more higher your stat goes, the enemy gets 10x stronger than you, and the matchmaking in this game is so bad, you can join a queue in pve and after 2 days you will still be in the queue. 

my main account is connected straight through the skyforge website. I thought I'd give this one a try from steam, but I couldn't get through the installation, error writting to disk, I can't be bothered to troubleshoot really.

Game that has gone this long and had a major overhaul on the game design, still fail to deliver. 

There are other interesting and fun games out there, I highly do not recommend this game. But you are welcome to try out if you are still keen. Just don't grab the "Free to play" bait.

author: {'steamid': '76561198129928662', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 2865, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2688, 'last_played': 1549338341}
review:
A fun game at first but becomes very hard later in and leaving little room to make mistakes with your character, it got to a point where the game just wasn't fun at all. Its not a real MMO other reviews will say the same but more of a dungeon crawler. You can't play with anyone at first, you have to complete the campaign.
 
 "Free to play"... Pffffff we all know what that means, just means pay to exceed. But honestly that didn't bother me about the game, what really got to me is how the game mechanics are set up just so backwards and very confusing with little tutorial guidance, the interface menus are terrible to navigate. 

One thing of advice for anyone wanting to try Skyforge. 
At early on in the game do not use real money to level your character up, wait until all the campaign road missions are done all the tutorials are done and all the story modes are done. If you level up to fast early on and haven't completed all the base quests, the game will auto level set to 220 making it almost impossible to run solo adventures.

author: {'steamid': '76561198130877209', 'num_games_owned': 118, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 3578, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3302, 'last_played': 1563298374}
review:
I think Skyforge is one of the most misunderstood games. As mentioned already before it's not a common mmo like WoW or ESO. You could describe it more like a mmo-dungeon crawler, like Diablo 3 - Path of Exile or Grim Dawn in groups and even raids. It's all about hunting the best gear. And like these games of course you need to grind a lot. 

This game is definitally not pay to win. But it is pay for convinience. You pay either time to progress, or money. This is totally up on you.. and the subscribion (if you like to) is very cheap in this game!

I highly recommend this game to everyone who like to grind gear in group play. No matter what, it's worth to have a look!

author: {'steamid': '76561197991447230', 'num_games_owned': 187, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 128023, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 99977, 'last_played': 1655425716}
review:
Um MMORPG diferente de tudo que se tenha experimentado, impossível de se tomar como base os demais MMOS. 

A temática basicamente segue a linha de que, após a sua morte em combate heróico para salvar a cidade de ser invadida, você acorda entre os mortos e descobre-se como um imortal. Agora como parte de um grupo de guerreiros imortais, deve atender as suplicas da população e salvar o planeta das terríveis invasões que se seguem, além de buscar uma forma de ser reconhecido entre os deuses, tendo assim seus seguidores, que irão lhe trazer poderes através de sua fé.

Em Skyforge você possui apenas um personagem, não precisando criar contas alternativas e ser obrigado a farmar equipamentos para cada um deles. A temática do jogo permite que você possa trocar de classe a medida da necessidade do seu grupo permitindo escolher entre diversas classes a qualquer momento, obviamente bem distribuídas entre a Santíssima Trindade (Suporte, DPS e Tank). Com isso a possibilidade de ficar enjoado apenas com uma classe é praticamente inexistente. Obviamente isto lhe farar ver a visão de cada uma delas. Existe também a possibilidade de virar um deus, em sua plena forma divina e conforme vá avançando, se tornar um Elder God e toda a sua plenitude e poder. Claro que para poder fazer isso você deve ser reconhecido pelos seus seguidores, que lhe fornecerão a fé nescessária para isto, algo que não será difícil, pois conforme seguir a sua aventura salvando as pessoas, mais e mais serão reconhecidos os seus feitos e com isso, novos adeptos surgirão para adorar-lo.

Diferente de outros jogos, o nível aqui não é significativo, sendo substituído por Prestígio, mas ao contrário dos demais, o que realmente irá determinar a sua força será o seu Poder, representado pelo seu "Migth". Por isso já dou a dica, fique atento a isto sempre. Pois não adianta ser alguém com um prestígio realmente alto e não ter poder algum...

Experimente e tire as suas próprias conclusões...

author: {'steamid': '76561198087227136', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 3881, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2229, 'last_played': 1653398986}
review: Skyforge is a good MMO and there is plenty to do to stop you from getting bored. I have only been playing it for a short time but it seems that it is a long lasting game and progress takes time. The people there seem friendlier than a lot of other MMO's which have constant bickering and putdowns of people which is a welcome change. Noone seems to pressure you and you can increase your level and abilities without a lot of hastle from others. It does have a cash shop like most free to play MMO's but you can still do fine without using it if you want. But it can give you an advantage though of course. I recomend this game if someone is looking for a game that takes a lot of time and it is not over complicated to play like Aion is now, which nc soft ruined!

author: {'steamid': '76561198041636991', 'num_games_owned': 94, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 20902, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 20852, 'last_played': 1572819952}
review:
I gave this game a good rating a couple years ago and even used money on getting stuff in this game. I even questioned why there were bad reviews fo it. Well they sure gave me a reason why. I was fine with the pay to win stuff, until they decided to make rebirth flames no longer obtainable by putting enough effort into trying to get them. Before you could earn them with victors medals which you can earn completely for free. But they decided to make that no longer possible and only obtainable by spending real money. The price isn't the problem, it's the fact that they made an item that was free for years no longer free. 

It's a pretty important item to because of the item generation system. Items become less useful every invasion, as enemies become stronger each one, if you don't keep playing the game and getting the next generation items your items become useless, the flames fixed this though by bringing your items up to the current generation. Without flames your items will become useless if you don't keep playing.

Please if they ever resolve this and make flames obtainable without spending real money leave me a comment telling me this. I still want to come back to this game, but I won't until they decide to fix this. Good job my.com you already struggle to maintain players in this game and you continue to push people away. 

Did you not learn anything from when you removed the Atlas system of progression? No one was actually too stupid to spec their classes the right way, and removing that system to switch to the might system completely change the way you played the game. I never played when that system existed so I never experienced how it worked myself, but my.com keeps finding more ways to push people away from their game

author: {'steamid': '76561198075251930', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 215, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 215, 'last_played': 1547500090}
review:
nachdem man das game beenden möchte, poppt direkt ein umfragebogen auf. hier ist meine auffassung. 
-----------nicht installieren, zeitverschwendung----------------

ps: habe vergessen, dass die anfangsstation mit bots gefüllt ist, die das gefühl von einer community vermitteln sollen. 


charakter editor ganz ok. schöne brauntöne der hautfarbe. die schuhe sind on point (weiblich) . haare sind mehr als schlecht animiert.  wenig make up zur auswahl, wieso kann man die lippenstiftfarbe nicht selbst definieren? selbst die sims 1 haben nen besseren editor gehabt. oder das mmorpg flyff... miese grafik, aber trotzdem mehr auswahl als hier. das gameplay ist mega boring. keine healpots, was bedeutet ich sammel die kugeln stupide auf und bin immer fullife. ja leute gut gemacht. so macht ein spiel richtig laune. mit freunden kann man auch nicht von anfang an spielen, da es wohl zu viel mühe war, das direkt zu beginn freizugeben. vermutlich wusstet ihr asber auch schon, dass das game für alle super langweilig ist, sodass ein multiplayer gar nicht erst nötig ist.  die klamotten gefallen mir ganz gut. meine coco workbiatch sah auch richtig hübsch aus. hätte sie gerne öfter mir angeschaut, bin aber vor langeweile paar mal eingeschlafen. dass ich nach schließen des games an einer umfrage teil nehmen muss, zeigt ja schon wie mies das game ist. und da ich weiß, dass mein antwortbogen eh in dem müll landen wird, mache ich auch npoch vorher copy und paste und gebe dies auf steam als negative bewertung ab. 

wir 2 konnten zwar nie zusammen uns in der welt sehen, da multiplayer wie gesagt nie frei war, haben uns aber köstlich über diescord ausgetauscht und über unsere großen boobies herzhaft gelacht. 

viele grüße an das entwicklerteam vorallem das ressort "gameplay" team. hat hier richtig verkackt

author: {'steamid': '76561198008148366', 'num_games_owned': 142, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 1195, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 543, 'last_played': 1602018758}
review: Das Game  ist genau 1 Stunde spannend. Danach wird es langweiliger als Werbung die im Postkasten steckt. Das Combat System ist nichts besonderes und während der Kämpfe kommt auch kein wirkliches Feeling auf. Das Freischalten von zusätzlichen Klassen erfordert eine bestimmte Währung im Zehntausender Bereich. Das ist stumpfes Dungeon Grinden ohne irgendwelche Besonderheit. Interessant wäre der Atlas gewesen, aber der wurde entfernt. Jetzt ist es nur noch ein Grindfest, das aber so stupide umgesetzt wurde, dass man getrost das Gehirn ins Glas legen kann während man das macht.

author: {'steamid': '76561198047463694', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 49, 'playtime_forever': 60287, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4200, 'last_played': 1554842865}
review:
Fact: Developer remains a Communist.

Developer is more worried about caps than what was once a fun game.

I have an old toon with 8 million whatever those points are, nothing insanely great but should be decent right? Nope.

Some years back the Developer decided to do away with drops scaling with the player's level. All is "might 100" max, but you can increase the weapon's stats with upgrades. The cost of upgrades is credits + materials you recieve from particular items you sell, just for the material for the upgrades. To illustrate the insanity, all my weapons were lowered to might 100, generation 2, and I am expected to get jewelry and other particular items drops (no exchange to buy them from other players) and sell these items for the crafting material. However, many lower missions are "ramped up" so they are treated as an operation, not merely a solo mission which makes them far more difficult than they need to be.

About that illustration of the insanity: One piece of jewelry gives me 1 piece of crafting material and I may get 3 pieces of jewelry in a mission. Note that upgrades only add a few percentage points to a weapon/jewelry/jem's wear (which doesn't seem to wear down but haven't really looked I am so disgusted). Each upgrade costs 15 of these special crafting material at generation 2 so that's at least 5 mission at around 45 minutes each to do one upgrade.

So I can't kill much, can't do anything with my old toon. Missions take forever because of this "warm up" operation treatment of the lowest missions versus letting me, the player, choose to play what I'd like to play, the basic solo mission to get what I need easily instead of 45 minutes for 3 pieces, and thats with leaving the mission early since the boss 1 hits me and heals between my deaths. It's just so worthless.

In fact, I made a new Steam toon as the game requires you to, you can't login with the old account through Steam. The kicker is my new toon, which is like 60k of those points with 23 might, does better than my original toon, which somehow has only 75 might, with 13,000 followers as a god.

In other words, this game is no longer fun, and has let the 1% elitist players destroy it. No one talks in game chat, which used to be very busy. No one is offering to help anyone like they used to do. Maybe this is why SkyForge is now on Steam after years without it a last ditch effort to have population on the servers. It's never crowded now which is exactly what happens when a game designs for the 1% of players instead of all of us. The Developer made the hundreds of hours put into a toon worthless to us returning players.

So it's pretty clear to me the Developer doesn't care about the players, as most don't, and the changes that got rid of enjoying the game appear to be something everyone is stuck with according to the Developer's pride. Skyforge now isn't worth the effort. And after the Developer has ruined the game I won't be shedding a tear. They seem to have got so full of themselves and decided to emulate EA instead of pay attention to what we enjoy and make the game exceed the fun we had.

Why so many Developers let the "challenge" 1% elitist players ruin their market potential by ruining their game is beyond comprehension, Devs over and over go out of their way to make all the work they did in graphics, sound and development of a story & immersive world unseen by 99% of the players who actually want to enjoy it. It isn't greed either for greed would demand Devs broaden the game's base by telling those elitists off and pursuing their market potential instead of alienating 99% of it.

SkyForge is f2p so I may play my new toon when other games I regularly play are down but after the many hours I put into my original SkyForge toon that is weaker than my new one that's less than a week old, I have no reason to play the original toon, and that appears the intention of the Developer, to make us abandon the old ones. I have all but 2 of the new classes unlocked on the old toon as the old system was actually player friendly and far less in game currency expensive to get (but you still had to grind to level it up) than the new system. it'll probably take a month of gameplay to make the currency to unlock just one more class. Sure I can spend real life money to unlock the classes (which most would think is the greedn factor) but, after what I lost in time leveling each class on my original SkyForge toon, there's no way I am gonna spend one penny on Skyforge.

Save your time, SkyForge is not even worth it as a F2p game, you'll play for years and not have unlocked half the classes, This honestly makes many of the Korean/Chinese Developer's game grinds seem short and reasonable in comparison to SkyForge.

author: {'steamid': '76561198079590797', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 881, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 809, 'last_played': 1546838613}
review:
I played Skyforge a few years ago and let me tell you, I have never seen a game regress so much. It legit looks like a mobile game now and has the shitty pop ups to boot. The only thing they didn't touch was the core gameplay.

It used to have a class system that was very interesting and you could focus on which classes you wanted when you wanted. Now it's just get to point on the map and spend a ton of currency.

The world map now looks straight out of a mobile game and is a huuuuggeee turn off. The old one was way better and wasn't even hard to navigate. Who thought this was a good idea? It just makes the game look terrrable.

Try it if you want, the core gameplay is still there, probably won't be around in a few years.

author: {'steamid': '76561198025530301', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 647, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 647, 'last_played': 1546781517}
review:
About 10hrs in Prestige 38ish, just done with the game. 

The game went from fun to making me want to rip my hair out. 

The difficult curve goes from slight slope to full blown power climb. 

Literally cannot progress any further in the game because the mobs basically 3 shot me (year i have upgraded my gear). 

Either way, i can see why not many people play this game but figured I would give it a shot. 

Also, the not having a dungeon finding system or anything makes this pretty lackluster. 

Side note, think i have seen like 3 people total in chat. That is sitting in the main hub.

恩，若已決定要入坑，不管課不課
首先加入【中文】頻道
裡邊有幾個混久的老屁股可以照應
再來是語言的問題
基本上還行，STEAM可以在遊戲內開股溝【GOOGLE】大致上翻譯了解意思還行 ( 這邊特指與外國玩家交流的部分)
再來，就是加入一個好公會
有的公會大福利多，大神也不少，遊戲內環境熟悉後，被carrry只是常態。在線人數30+起跳。
有的是小而美，因為人少，所以大家互相幫助提攜的情況很常見。人員在線，看主群體的時區。
至於我家，恩，華人應該逼近十位數；外國友人對於華人相對友善，和樂融融；不大不小的工會。
人員在線高峰大約有三個時段，周末時間會有重疊。恩，溝通上障礙不大；挺喜歡聽外國朋友說中文，特別好玩 XD
所以簡單總結  1.入頻道  2.選一個能配合你時區的公會
當然若你本身外語強的，可以把以上都忽略
不過，在國外的ONLINE GAME上能碰上華人也是一種緣份
所在都有 .....

回過頭來再提一下語言
這不是我所接觸的第一款外語遊戲
玩著玩著就玩6了
從單機到大型連線，有興趣也好，因緣際會也罷
反正若入坑了
多少做點功課也不為過，反正有些套路都適用的
另外他這遊戲，自帶一個類社群軟體的語音【DISCORD】
還行，有需要的上巴哈逛一下
亂七八糟打了一堆，希望對各位有需要的朋友有點微薄幫助

author: {'steamid': '76561198043879797', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 3289, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2618, 'last_played': 1683080095}
review:
This is the first time I am writing/typing a rewiew for any kind of game, so bear with me while I rant.
I have played this game since its beta and have loved the idea and concept of this game. That concept would be a game where you can play in a sci-fi/fantasy game and work to become a god/deity. The ascension atlas, a skill tree during the early days of the game, was an incredibly good idea. The idea of not using a level system but instead a prestige/gear rating system, was a good idea. Until they have reworked everything.
This game is completely pay to win, a cash grab, and is a cash sink. Playing the game until you reach your junior god form is fine and dandy, but once you do reach that point, it becomes a total pay-to-win game. I have spent 50 US$ and only manage to go up 5 prestige points from filling up the first bastion which is a "skill tree." I could've played the game, but that would take WAY too long. Unlocking then elder god form is also a chore and a grind, more so than any other MMOs I have played, and I played many MMOs. This game's user interface and leveling system is also now far too confusing. On 2017, I reached 120 prestige, I decided to get back into this game on Dec 2018, now all the levels have been set to 220+ prestige and are impossible for someone like me to do. The game is also unclear on what to do next after you have reached junior god form.
I have NEVER played such a game where it is such pay-to-win. You either pay a lot and get to the end game, or you grind for months-years in order to reach the end game. I DO NOT recommend this game. Take this word of advice from someone who wasted way too many time and money on this game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198299711911', 'num_games_owned': 85, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 3988, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3833, 'last_played': 1546480850}
review: The game is nice and all, I really liked it but after you reach a certain milestone (Junior god) it get's pretty much impossible to play if you are a solo player and don't want to spend any money, The only way you'll be able to progress is if someone carries you, cause after becoming a junior god everything is higher level than your current prestige and the scaling is terrible, and there is most certainly a queuing system for all the maps but You'll be queued for hours together and end up with no-one joining. I only recommend you to play it if you have friends to carry you or if you have some extra money to spend.

author: {'steamid': '76561198141803022', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 79221, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 52837, 'last_played': 1623871847}
review:
Sin Skyforge no podría vivir.. si algún día vendo mi pc me llevo el HD … si lo pierdo hago todo lo posible por tener siempre mis cuentas... La alternativa de varear entre los distintos tipos de Jobs, al no tener que ser un mago o brujo.. si no que podes ser todos .. La tecnología .. magía dragones .. muy buenos gráficos .. la historia es increíble.. 

El arte y los escenarios .. estoy pensando en comprarme un buena placa de sonido para poder escuchar mejor la música.

De mas esta decir que lo juego hace 4 años..

Si no me ven online .. es por que tuve que hacer algo muy importante o un tema sumamente grave...

de 1 a 10          11

author: {'steamid': '76561198190934528', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 5822, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4711, 'last_played': 1664135994}
review:
Bem vamos lá..Após 70h de jogo acho que ja da pra fazer uma analise desse jogo.
Skyforge é um mmo rpg com tematica mitologica e seu objetivo inicial é passar por varias provincias para no final se tornar um god.
O jogo se destaca pelo seu maravilhoso grafico, que pra um free to play ta muito bem polido.
Também possui uma mecânica de combate unico que possibilita lutas bem frenéticas aliado de classes bem interessantes(que por sinal são varias).
A historia do jogo é meio cliche,isto é, o velho protagonismo exagerado...vc foi morto em campo de batalha durante uma guerra e simplesmente volta a vida em meio a uma pilha de mortos,apartir dai vc descobre que é um immortal e se junta a uma elite de outros immortais e deuses.Apartir dai vc é enviado pra varios continentes pra resolver diversos conflitos.
Bem se eu tivesse que dar uma nota para os aspectos desse jogo eu daria:
Graficos : 9/10
Jogabilidade : 7/10
Enredo : 4/10
Trilha Sonora : 8/10

Da pra se divertir até a metade do jogo,pois o jogo conta com um sistema chamado prestigio,é um calculo que o jogo faz em cima do seu gear e dificulta o jogo de acordo com isso(ou pelo menos deveria).O problema é que na realidade dps que vc finaliza todas as provincias do jogo automaticamente todos os inimigos ficam umas 50x mais fortes que vc,lhe obrigando a ser carregado pelos pro players do server(isso quando eles tbm n morrem tentando carregar).Esse sistema é totalmente falho.O jogo te obriga a finalizar todas as fases do jogo em modo solo pra no final te obrigar a jogar em party.Por conta disso eu não recomendo esse jogo pelo motivo de que ao chegar no end lvl o jogo perde o sentido do que deveria ser um rpg.

author: {'steamid': '76561198084399051', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 76, 'playtime_forever': 1378, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1378, 'last_played': 1541071676}
review:
It's a beautiful game, but i think most misunderstand it. It's NOT an MMORPG, not at all! No idea why MMORPG is in the tags. It's an dungeon crawler, much like Warframe etc. The game is purely based around grinding and combat, so if you like games like that, try this. It's free, nothing to lose but time.
Some controversy regarding the p2w aspects. I personally didn't experience that in my 23hrs of game time so can't comment on that. 

Pros
-Beautiful looking!
-Combat is good
-Plays well, solid fps
-It's free!
-Nice character creation (jiggly boobs!)

Cons
-You can skip grinding by paying real money. Not sure what's the case with p2w these days.
-Somebody said there's only servers for Europe and NA. If that's still the case then it's a big con for people who live elsewhere
-Misunderstood as an MMORPG
-

author: {'steamid': '76561198021185020', 'num_games_owned': 182, 'num_reviews': 107, 'playtime_forever': 1108, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1108, 'last_played': 1545024693}
review:
What's that game somehow ported from smartphone to PC and maybe consoles? Skyforge.

What is it about? I don't know, go in and kill things, you're a chosen one just like any other players.

Does it have classes? Yep, but only 4 are free, five if you get Outlaw aka, McCree / Reaper hybrid, or Mesa from Warframe. The rest you have to save special coins to buy them, don't worry, daily login will give you... a few.

What do you do? Go in and murder everything, the more miles you walk the more rewards you get. 

How to make yourself strong and powerful? Do Bastions, do research, and gain followers, YOU WILL NEED "MIGHT", the more the better. Get as much as possible before you reach to junior god.

Ok, that's all of it.

Hey, that's all of it? Yep, because once you reach to junior god, you need to pay to get legendary gears, otherwise, you'll get rekt by even just minions. However, that's what happens when people are lazy to gear themselves up, I have no problems with handling minions, I just need to be smarter than an AI when it comes to boss fight.

If you up for more challenge, que for operation up to 5 players and max at 10 for PvE.

The game also has PvP, but forget about it, the old players have already paid millions of cash to get all the legendaries they needed to melt you into flesh puddle even when they just stare at you. (No srsly, you can get stared to death).

What happens if you die? You just respawn, and you have start over the fight again.

How can I prevent myself from dying? Que with other players and eat those healthy pills, you will die... Less. Promise.

But I don't like to grind in the game, can I just play it? You can, but you'll regret it. You will. YOU WILL.

Is this game enjoyable? Of course! You also have fashion compete against other players! Remind of me Warframe.

And that's all of it. I recommend this if you want something to kill time or play with friends.

author: {'steamid': '76561198018967325', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 137, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 26, 'last_played': 1682633059}

Gutted the system for this garbage it is today, had potential aside from optimizing issues. Very unfortuanate. Logged in connected steam account then immediatly uninstalled.

author: {'steamid': '76561198217919117', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 154, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 48, 'last_played': 1553795519}
review:
Играл когда-то в старый скайфордж. Было очень нудно и долго фармить одни и те же локи. Что изменилось теперь, когда я вернулся? =)
Я быстро нахожу пати, быстро прокачиваюсь и выполняю те квесты, которые мне нравятся. Самое главное, для меня - трачу меньше времени. Часа в день, для этой игры более чем достаточно. А если забить на игру, то всегда можно быстро догнать. К тому же картинка на высоких настройках вполне достойная, добавили много интересных механик в локациях. Лор, озвучка тоже на приемлимом уровне, разрабы продолжают озвучивать новые квесты и добавлять интересную инфу о мире. Даже появился, пускай и долгий, заработок донатной валюты.
Немного криво сделаны анимации. Управление с геймпада, по мне, не очень удобное.

author: {'steamid': '76561198081511076', 'num_games_owned': 428, 'num_reviews': 50, 'playtime_forever': 5041, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4628, 'last_played': 1556579504}
review: Um ótimo jogo, com uma jogabilidade exelente e uma temática muito interessante, infelizmente estragado pela ganancia, fazendo uma boa parte do conteudo ser pay to win, inpedindo que os jogadores possam fazer coisas basicas, como conseguir novas classes, que em teoria, era para ser um dos principais pontos do jogo.

author: {'steamid': '76561197999334875', 'num_games_owned': 794, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 19, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 19, 'last_played': 1544827646}
review:
Upon installing this game, before even launching it, my computer immediatly set itself ablaze. I called my local pyschic to speak with the fire. She looked at me, then at the fire. Yelled at me for assuming psychics could actually talk to fire and charged me $800 for the house call. Satisfied that this was no demonic hellfire I phoned Steve. My buddy steve came to look at the raging inferno now begining to consume my house.

Perplexed and not quite sure what we were looking at we attempted the only thing we knew how to do in order to calm the fire down. We burst into showtunes. The neighbor called the police because our broadway rendition of "Baby it's cold outside" was offensive to her and her cats. My cat, having already been consumed by the ever growing flames, didn't seem to mind. I called bullshit on Deborah and her cats and tried to throw some fire at her. 

Fire, if you are not aware, is not a solid object. You are not capable of grabbing or throwing fire. Ninja movies had lied to me. My hand, instead of something tangible, was met with something akin to being stabbed in the liver with a pneumatic lightsaber. This caused an involuntary reaction which involved lots of loud screaming and accidentally punching Steve in the throat with my burning hand. Steve, unperturbed, punched me back. Of course the house was still on fire. Our clothes caught fire as we wrestled.

It was at this time my girlfriend walked through the front door. Which was also on fire. She was not amused. She started to say something about knowing all along that me and steve were getting it on behind her back. This of course was 110% true, as evidenced by my now flaming hotdog. (I had been making lunch before this.) Rather than listen to her argument me and steve simply walked out the door, locking it behind us to prevent her from following with her incessant screaming.

My girlfriend never showed up again. Suffice it to say I'm pretty sure this game deleted my girlfriend. 5/7.

author: {'steamid': '76561198394218033', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 29555, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8959, 'last_played': 1602416421}
review:
Din punctul meu de vedere jocul are multe parti bune, dar nu compenseaza cu cele rele, sau mai bine zis lipsa... Dupa aproximativ 450 ore de joc , jocul a devenit atat de sistematic si plictisitor incat nu prea ai pentru ce sa il deschizi. Totul in joc se rezuma la misiunile zilnice care se repeta, sa cresti ToK, Cath si Bastions +PVP(care e departe de a fi un pvp clasic). Singura parte interesanta e transformarea in God(zeu). Lipseste stilul clasic de MMORPG unde faci comert, craftezi...etc
Pe scurt jocul nu merita efortul de a fi jucat  la modul intens , poate doar incercat si pentru relaxare...in rest daca cauti un MMORPG  bun, sfatul meu nu-l juca
P.S. nu e pay2win , e de farmat intens, foarte intens, pentru absolut nimic!

author: {'steamid': '76561198276014679', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 6777, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6694, 'last_played': 1525726552}
review: This is an extremely grindy and p2w game.  It is indeed beautiful, but if u do not spend money on it you will find it takes tons of time completing the same tasks over and over again to get anywhere.  You think your moving along nicely with you're friends until one buys some argents and *boom* their a month of grinding past your tier.  It's definitely fun and well made though.  Just a well made cash sink at the end of the day though.

author: {'steamid': '76561198142216601', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 33, 'playtime_forever': 16493, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 10704, 'last_played': 1656900923}
review: Great at first, the campaign is great fun and unlocking classes is great. When you finish the campaign and hit prestige level 150 (approx.) the game becomes nearly impossible. You have to grind for hours and hours in order to level up and cannot even try to play the game as it's meant to be played until you hit prestige 245 (extremely hard to reach!). This game starts off fun and appears to be interesting but quickly becomes a nightmare of grinding, bugs and ridiculously difficult gameplay. Unless you want to waste 200 hours of your life trying to reach the basic playing level, do not download this game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198041275214', 'num_games_owned': 358, 'num_reviews': 33, 'playtime_forever': 639, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 612, 'last_played': 1666549207}
review:
Эта не та игра уже, которую я полюбил еще на збт...
Плюсы:
- Дизайн мира,окружения,противников и шмота. (Единственное что осталось хорошим это дизайн. Спасибо всем дизайнерам за всё)
- Лор. Хоть он и не велик но он интересен.
- Смена классов почти в любой момент.
- Возможность принимать божественные формы.
- Механика боя с боссами, особенно с аватарами и противниками из искажения.
Минусы:
- Странная анимация персонажей(нпс) при разговоре.
- Кастрированный культ (по сравнению со "Старой эрой")
- Бесконечный бессмысленный фарм. Фарм ради фарма.
- Прокачка персонажа за счет башни знаний и бастионов. Почему бы просто не сделать одну кнопку  "услилить персонажа" и тыкать только в нее. Перс будет качаться за ресы получаемые за задания и не надо менять вкладки, всё в одном месте ? Так ведь еще проще. А лучше вовсе пусть игра сама все делает ты просто ходи на задания.
- Механика экипировки. Пожалуй самая больная тема для меня. Обновлять шмотки каждые 2 месяца ? Серьезно ?  Фармить и прокачивать шмот, подбирая статы под класс, затрачивая кучу времени и кредитов в течени 2 месяцев, что бы ходить на задания вторжения а потом все заного? В игре где класс можно сменить и уметь играть сразу за 3 роли, собирать 3 разных сета когда с одним то мучения ? Благодарю но нет. И да кому то это нравиться, не спорю.
- Ну и типичный минус это донат .Я конечно все понимаю, кушать всем хочется, но почему в продаже оружие и релики влияющие на игру и упрощающие её? Так точно деньги оставят в проекте ? Ну да, конечно,это ж логично, чего это я.
- Отсутствие вариативности. Классовые способности мало того что повырезали, так еще и привязали к пве и пвп. Не давая выбора вовсе. 

p.s. Я никогда особо не понимал почему майл так поливают грязью,причина не понимания была в том что я не играл в игры что они издавали. Теперь я понимаю что значит "мыло убивает игры".

review: WARNING! DONT PLAY THIS GAME. Reason: I LOVE this game on xbox everyone is so friendly and will help anyone if you ask, even I will.. But when I got a pc and saw that this game was on pc! So I flipped and wanted to download it thinking it was goona be SOOO much fun. No, no one will offer help to you (the high levels) because they think they are too op and that they are so high up in rank that they are too cool for you (they stand afk in the main lobby).. Also why am I saying this about help.. Well this game has gotten so far advanced that its too high ranking to do anything with out higher levels help., I only gotten past the first half of the game (the storyline) and then once they stick you out there.. you are so confused on what to do anymore, No one offers help. I suggest you get this game on xbox.. They are so nice there, and random people say "I'll help you" if you ask in chat for help.. I'm not the strongest player ever buy I offer help if I can.. To ANYONE.. my xbox name is Primdox and if you see me chatting please say hello or dont be affraid to ask for help.. :) (this game is totally different from the xbox vers. So don't start here and get familliar with it then move to xbox thinking its the same.. NO its not)

author: {'steamid': '76561198055112660', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 181, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 181, 'last_played': 1539332530}
review:
Do not be fooled by my hours played on steam. I have devoted hundreds of hours playing this game since release via the my launcher and even bought a founder's pack to help during its development. 

The game looks pretty good for an MMO and the gameplay isn't terrible but it is BEYOND grindy, pay to win and the devs only care about your money and NOTHING else.

They couldn't care less about the playerbase and god forbid you have an issue of any kind, because even if you helped support the game from the very beginning they will happily do nothing if it doesn't benefit them.

Save your time, money, and effort. Instead put it towards a game that is fair, rewarding and with devs who actually give a sh1t about you.

author: {'steamid': '76561198001104668', 'num_games_owned': 652, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 1444, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1444, 'last_played': 1543011377}
review:
okay hmm this is the first time that i actually feel like writing a negative review of a game, so here it goes....

so yes i have not played long but that was enough to figure the gist of things and note that i am also taking into account the gaming experience that i personally watched of a gaming buddy. 

so first things first i will say that the game is solid, concept is great, application has work but works and flows tho enemys and missions could be a tad harder, it tends to become a grindfest in the later portions of the game but can be seen what it can be like in the early game portion. Though i have say this the game itself could be greatly improved. 

now the reason for the negative review. it is grindy in most missions and too easy once you get the hang of it and becomes just mindless hunting if that is your thing then it is good. for new players, once you get to certain lvl most things become group missions and we have found that most of the community is literally leagues apart. it feels like a multiplayer match of the old Battlefield games as a new player with no equipment. and also there seems to be no true support for the game from the support staff anymore. had some issues with applying some of the packs where the game seems to default to european server even though we are on the NA server. 

so if you do plan on getting into or trying this game be warned that you need to keep an eye on the server

author: {'steamid': '76561198179347281', 'num_games_owned': 301, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 720, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 720, 'last_played': 1540179444}
review:
TL;DR
-have to go through ALL the areas solo first to be able to do co-op in which you just repeat the missions together
-customisation is not the best, lack of anything but white skintones, bland hairstyles
-requires lots of googling of various issues cause the game just doesn't tell you what the problem is
-grindy which might not be an issue to others like me
-you pay to progress faster but it's not mandatory

+amazing amazing active combat with lots of variations
+16 interesting classes that you can work towards (started 4)
+entertaining from the beginning, not after level 60 like in every other MMO
+gorgeous graphics
+feeling like there's always something to do
+different feel from every other MMO thanks to it's sci-fi people only god-like settings
+if your favorite part about MMOs are dungeons, the missions are ONLY dungeons

First time writing a review and that's because this game was probably the biggest dissapointment I experienced in quite some time and that's mostly because of it's unbelievably wasted potential.

I've seen the reviews before i downloaded it but most of them were negative for the grind, which i don't mind (especially with a combat as good as this game has) and a paygate, which i'm willing to pay for when it's a f2p game that I enjoy and it's just the "do it faster/pay for cosmetics" kind. But there was one thing barely anyone mentioned - the almost non-existent co-op play. Let me elaborate!

The graphics in this game are so gorgeous and apart from how white it is (character customisation's darkest skin is a tanned white person and literaly every NPC is white), the NPCs were alright and the fact that you can look like a golf dad that's actually a god is a fun concept. The combat is unbelievably well done, so much even that it's something that restored my faith in having fun in an MMO game.

 The missions are basically constant dungeons, no open world with running back and forth to talk to two people across the globe 20 times, so I enjoyed it in this form more. The world also make it seems like there's a lot for you to do, apart from unlocking areas in countless of diverse "lands", you also unlock new upgrades in separated missions, you research stuff and get items, you upgrade your following of people which makes you stronger, just a lot of things.

For a solo game, it can be entertaining enough, the combat is more active in any other MMO so if you feel like playing something brainlessly just for the sake of looking cool and killing stuff, this is good.

 If you want to look cool and kill stuff with your friends though? Well, you both have to finish all the areas, all the countless missions solo first to be able to go back to them and play them together for the "grind". And that is after hours of trying to figure out how to even group up as this game doesn't tell you ANYTHING on what the issue is - first you have to make sure you're on the same server (NA or EU), then you both have to finish the prologue and choose a class, then you both have to get to at least the third mission, that's where co-op unlocks, but you still need to finish the storyline (which unlocks locations) solo. So basically if you want to go through missions together with your friend? Not gonna happen, you can only go to previous underleveled missions together to, what, grind for unusual gear? 

Thing is both of you would have to put countless of hours into this game SOLO first to be able to play somehow proper co-op together afterwards and that's just a no no.

author: {'steamid': '76561198221170236', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 25254, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 20101, 'last_played': 1572801993}
review:
this game has a number of issues that change? over time?:
Reset lagging from a checkpoint which when fighting can occur to a degree where enemies freeze or oscillate in one position for minutes and then the next minute you see yourself dead, interface clashes and dissapearances, items weapons equipments drop item mismatch, network issues when internet connection is at best, the whole game decides to "NOT RESPOND" in the fashionable windows manner for hours?, items in storage that require click mechanisms stop funtioning,  camera rotation/alingment malfunction, character invisibility, weapon invisibility, sometime when not on mount character looks like on mount and when attacking weapon is not seen yet attack takes place, divine form that "levitates" occasionally "walks"? when in movement, when using Laertes sword to spin the sword appears in 3-4 positions in different forms at the same time, class or mounting is not taking place when in non-combat non-movement stationery positioning, on rare occasions class symbols are not in effect, backward/sideway walking when unintended for.....

i've gone to their support website for assistance, ive tried allot of steps proposed to eliminate the possibility of the problem being from my end, thought the frequency of the issues may have subsided from daily to a few days/weekly, these issues still persist and come back like before. 

I've been playing Skyforge for like over a year now, i thought long and hard on what to write about in this recommendation review. i know that not everyone is having this issues, so i only recommend this game to people who would welcome the possibilty of these or any of these risks; which is likely seen as i do not recommend

author: {'steamid': '76561197993012447', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 4978, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1671, 'last_played': 1557522910}
review:
Rage quit once, shame on me. Rage quit twice, shame on you devs. Rage quit thrice, NOPE. As others have stated this game is designed to make you hate your life and spend hard earned cash on it just to have enough ingame currencies to spend on leveling your character. The story progression has you on a constant uphill battle trying to maintain an equal character level to the level of the zone you need to progress through. Simply put this game isn't P2W as in paying for uber gear or fast tracking, it's P2W just to be able to play the game and stay even paced with the story.

Side note. I never spent a cent on this game, but if you are willing to spend real money and enjoy playing against the odds you very well might enjoy this game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198290467548', 'num_games_owned': 273, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 2637, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2514, 'last_played': 1621017111}
review:
Вообще не понимаю че все так бомбят. Мне зашла. Гринда много, но боевка ее как-то разбавляет. Довольно приятно порой, ибо не хочется после трудного дня еще ломать голову с квестами, а хочется просто помочить парочку тварей и получить награду. Обучение заняло 20 часов, потом выдали полный картбланш на возможности. Давки доната не заметил сильной. Донатные брюллики можно и в игре за некоторые квесты получить. Графика очень даже радует глаз. То что нужно, чтобы заходить каждый день по 2-3 часа и просто отдохнуть. 
Единственный минус, который я заметил - многое урезали с беты мыла.

author: {'steamid': '76561198063083367', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 5866, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4157, 'last_played': 1566277406}
review:
Развеиваю мифы

1. Игра без русского языка
Это НЕ так.  В игре, в стимовской ,этой, ЕСТЬ русский язык, для тех кто еще этого не знает, реккомендую погуглить как его открыть. Переведено все, как в росийском аналоге игры, диалоги только на английском, но есть субтитры. 

2. Без доната в игре нечего делать.
Опять же это соверешнно не так. Есть платный контент, но он вовсе не обязателен для приобретения, можно достичь самых верхов без какого либо доната, все необходимое зарабатывается в самой игре.

 Игра очень интересная, захватывающая, мне очень нравится и сюжет и графика и боевка. Поиграв 80 часов я докакчалась почти до топ уровня, не вложив в игру ни копейки. Аргенты, за которые покупается легендарное оружее, можно запработать в самой игре. Кому жалко времени на игру и хочется все побыстрее, конечно это может не понравирться, но если вы все равно решили тратить на игру хотя бы пару часов в день или несколько дней, то все вполне достижимо.

☻ Особо из плюсов хотелось бы отметить, что в Скайфордже как раз решает все не донат а умение игрока. Тут нельзя стоять на месте и просто мочить босса, тут нужнь уворачиваться от ловушек, кооперироваться с джругими игроками, успевать вовремя уклоняться и юзать щиты, бафы... и так далее

☺ Есть и минусы которые особо выделяются - это баги. Они не частые, и на процесс игры не особо влияют, но вот картинку подпарчивают. Разработчики их решают, но достаточно медленно. Думаю однажды самые бесючие они все таки уберут совсем. 

8 из 10 за баги.

author: {'steamid': '76561198161563137', 'num_games_owned': 74, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 1081, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1017, 'last_played': 1555480224}
review:
Pros:
+Amazing graphics
+Good combat for an mmo
+Decent story
+Very expansive zones
+Lots of cooperative missions
+Raid bosses
+Music is decent

Cons:
-Beyond awful voice acting, be better with no voices at all
-Quests fall into the boring fetch,kill,repeat 70% of the time
-Main classes are unobtainable due to impossible monitizing
-Illusion of getting closer to unlocking a class, without 5$ it would take possibly 200hrs to get 1 class.
-The lipping looks like the original fallout games
-No real reason to team up for 90% of the game
-No indepth inventory customization
-Very few outfits without $$
-No tradehouses

Total mmo rank: 7.5/10
A pretty game with good team mission structure. With some refining, this mmo could be very superb, but it needs mission restrictions eliminated, class restriction eliminated by at least 95%, and events for fun rather than grinding. AND PLEASE NO MORE VOICE ACTING BY CRAIGSLIST VOLUNTEERS!! Still, a good amount of fun if you have no other games.

author: {'steamid': '76561198116879965', 'num_games_owned': 1283, 'num_reviews': 6897, 'playtime_forever': 15, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 15, 'last_played': 1652462743}
review:
Sci-fi и fantasy сталкиваются в Skyforge, бесплатной MMORPG, установленной в захватывающем мире Aelion. Как Бессмертный на пути к обожествлению, вы являетесь последней линией обороны между планетой и враждебными силами, которые стремятся уничтожить ее. Освоите динамичную боевую систему и развяжите свои невероятные небесные силы, чтобы отбиваться от вторжений. Выберите один из 18 уникальных игровых классов, объединитесь с бессмертными по всему миру, чтобы открыть для себя необычную вселенную богов и монстров и выполнить свою судьбу в качестве героя Аэлиона.

Боги Aelion исчезли. Теперь существа из самых глубоких траншей, жнецы из огненных ям и безжизненные машины из самых холодных пустошей угрожают планете и всем ее обитателям. Сражайтесь с инопланетными захватчиками, чтобы получить новые способности, награды и последователей, и держать Аэлион в безопасности!

Пусть ваши враги знают, что Аэлион защищен. Овладейте интуитивным и полезным боем Skyforge, выполняя разрушительные атаки и комбо. Вы можете собирать специальные предметы, чтобы создавать новое оружие, изучать навыки и использовать удивительные небесные силы в Своей Божественной форме!

Выберите один из 18 открываемых классов и переключайтесь между ними в зависимости от вашей боевой ситуации или стиля игры. Рок с убийственными риффами Soundweaver, сифон жизненной силы вашего врага с Revenant, и использовать силу природы с Grovewalker!

Откройте для себя приключение без ограничений в безграничных режимах Skyforge player versus environment (PvE) и player versus player (PvP). Исследуйте более 100 межзвездных локаций в одиночку или с другими бессмертными онлайн, в местах открытого мира или в более коротких экземплярах. С последними обновлениями вы даже можете отправиться на таинственную новую планету: Терру!

author: {'steamid': '76561197991763235', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 4904, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4904, 'last_played': 1496334717}
review:
And this is where I take my leave.

I've been with this game since the beginning, payed for a founder's pack and now regretting every cent given to these guys
Once the steam version released, I tried to log in on my own account, only to learn that it was not possible so I had to begin again from the start with a new steam account, losing all perks from the founder's bundle.

Once in-game, I noticed that the old Atlas had been removed for a much simpler path, dumbing down the skill trees significantly (the only good thing that came out of this is you unlock the other classes much faster)

Now, after a hiatus, I see the accursed 'Battle Royale' on this mess, which, remembering how the different classes are, I can already tell is going to be a painfully unbalanced fustercluck.

I would not be surprised if this would eventually share the fate of Firefall

author: {'steamid': '76561197964865396', 'num_games_owned': 186, 'num_reviews': 55, 'playtime_forever': 167, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 10, 'last_played': 1657050906}
review: Hat, ... hatte Potenzial. Das für mich negativste ist und bleibt (egal welches MMO) das P2W System. Das ganze "Grundkonzept" basiert aufs cashen, cashen und nochmal cashen. Ohne kann man dieses Game im "Lategame" absolut vergessen. PVP ist quasi tot. Und das neue BR.... der verzweifelte Versuch nochmal paar Spieler ran zu kriegen die paar "Kröten" da lassen. Traurig, aber die Zeiten schöner mmorpg´s o.ä. sind in meinen Augen vorbei. Mal abgesehen vom Giganten Blizzard, schafft es keiner so wirklich etwas abzuliefern das man einen "AAA" Titel nennen könnte. Einzig nennenswertes wer etwas "Kostenloses" und (für mich) erwähnenswertes möchte. Neverwinter Nights Online oder Guild Wars 2 online. Habe ansonsten wirklich alles an mmos angeschaut, ausprobiert usw. nichts sinnvolles dabei. Zumindest nichts, das sich auf dauer zocken lässt ohne regelmäßig und übermäßig Geld rein zu stecken.

author: {'steamid': '76561197962328966', 'num_games_owned': 377, 'num_reviews': 38, 'playtime_forever': 898, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 796, 'last_played': 1544408502}
review:
Perhaps one of the worst MMORPGs i`ve ever had the mispleasure of playing.

Disclaimer: It`s fine if you like this game. I like it, but I`ll still criticize it to hell.

Don`t let the beautiful graphics and good action combat fool you. This game was maliciously developed to make you feel frustrated in order to convince you to spend money.

Now let me start by saying that there are people who get to elder god stat without spending a single dollar, but most of them spent 2-3 years playing the game daily for hours to get there. So it`s possible, but like you`ll hear from those players themselves, you`ll need to no-life it hard in order to manage doing so. Also let me state I have around 50 hours in this game, not 2.9 as steam shows. I`m using an my.com account to play instead of my steam account.

You`ll first have a great sense of accomplishment doing the main missions since every main quest will take you to a different "dungeon" (mission), making you feel like the game has a lot of diversity. However it quickly stops feeling that way and you'll end up finding out that the game has an early game and an end game, but absolutely no mid game. Once you`ve finished doing all of the provincial missions on the first half of the main quest season 1, you`ll be forced to do those missions over and over again to gain might, which dictates how powerful your character is.

Now let`s talk about MIGHT. This is perhaps the worst progression system in any MMORPG ever. Do you remember how in the original Ragnarok Onlint  you had no other way to get exp, you you'd have to farm monsters all day in order to level up? Well skyforge does something worse than that. it has BASTIONS... those are provincial quests that will give you a miniscule amount of might every time you finish them, but different from killing mobs, you don`t get to gain bigger amounts of might the harder the quest is. It`s always a small number. Oh yeah and you don`t get might from killing mobs, doing region quests or finishing missions. You`re hostage of the horrible progression design instead.

Right out of the bat you`ll be informed by other players you shouldn`t upgrade your equipments until you reach 900.000.000 might. Now this might make you think that the game will give you means to steadly progress towards that with a decent pace. Something that wont make the progression either too hard or too easy, right? Wrong. You`ll have to no-life bastions, the most boring quest system ever, to gain that might. That means doing the same exact quests over and over thousands of times and just so you know. When I say Thousands, I do mean thousands. I`m not trying exaggerate. That`s how bad the grind is in this game.

Want an example? I`ve played for an entire month and got to 35.000 might. Now I have a job and a life and still I invested from 1 to 3 hours a day (more during the weekends) in this game, yet I`m still, if my math is correct, 25 months away from reaching the end game. That`s  2+ years of daily grinding just so I can reach the end game. THAT IS INSANE.

BUT!!!! And it`s a big but. The game ALLOWS YOU TO BUY MIGHT WITH REAL MONEY!!!!!!!! YES, THIS GAME IS 100% PAY TO WIN!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! All you have to do is buy medals with your argends and spend them on trophies! THOSE GO ON SALE BY THE WAY! My.com is so scummy that they monetized the trophy system and linked it directly to the progression. Not only that but you`ll often see packs being sold on the store that give you legendary gen 15 weapons for different classes.

Oh yeah have I told you about the grind to unlock other classes yet? No? Boy... where do I even begin... you need either 25.000 or 35.000 Spark of Transformation to unlock them, which you`ll be able to get by doing each of the provincial missions for the first time. You get 500 by mission and by the time you finish the tutorial you`ll be able to buy ONE cheap class! Or, OF COURSE, buy the 40 dollars pack on steam that unlocks all of them!!!! Oh yeah! Have I told you that it`s an exclusive thing for steam players? My.com players don't get to buy that pack, but instead they are offered 2 packs right of the bat. The first one is the Outlaw class and some argents for 2 dollars and the second a "unlock a class of your choice" coin that lets you unlock ONE class of your choice + 10k argents.

IF you`re thinking of start playing this game, don`t. It`s designed to be highly frustrating so you`ll either quit or spend money to progress. It's so bad it has lost almost it's entire population. The matchmaking for quests isn`t even used anymore because of that. The concurrent player base is so small that in order to do group up for quests you gotta go to the main lobby and yell that you`re looking for a group.

Now let me tell you the worst part of all. This part is specially aimed towards the people who might be thinking "Eh, that's fine. I like MMORPGs and highly grindy games". I'm sorry, but you won't have any fun grinding in this game. The only fun areas are the open maps, which does feel like an actual MMORPG. They don't help you progress on the game that much though. You'll only use them to farm specific monsters during invasion times so you can get "stronger".

The truth is, you'll have to farm missions over and over, but since the number of new players is low, you won't be able to matchmake with them. Finding them at the main lobby won't work either because you'll hardly ever be able to find enough people that are just as strong as you to make a full party and do a mission that's proper for you. Instead you'll have to join a clan and wait for max level players to announce they are about to run a mission. You'll then join and follow them around, doing nothing because high level mission monsters are impossible to kill unless you're on the same level as them. What i'm trying to say is that the entire progression of this game is about being carried by stronger players. You won't achieve anything by yourself.

Stay away.

Update:

I just had the oportunity to participate in one of the game`s 2 weeks event which rewards you with credits, medals, cosmetics etc. Here`s how it works. The game requires you to acquire 2,000 points in order to get all of the rewards and it costs 5,000 credits for you to advance 1 point (although sometimes it can add more than just 1 point. i`ve experienced a few instances in which 10 to 30 points were added to my event) and it takes around 8 hours for that point to be given to you and for you to try and get more points. However you can accelerate that by using Intelligence Data, which is a currency you can get from killing bosses in missions. Most of the time bosses will give you only 1 Intelligence data even though the event requires you to spend 10 of those to accelerate your proccess and instantly give youyour point. My.com did think about that though and they allow you to spend credits buying Intelligence Data Extractor, which will significantly increase the amount of ID you get. There`s a catch though. Once you get 3000 ID with this item, which you have to keep buying over and over for millions of credits, it stops giving you the currency. So unless you spend 24h in the game for 2weeks doing missions all the time, you can`t finish an event without spending real money.

EVERY SINGLE SYSTEM ON THIS GAME IS DESIGNED TO FRUSTRATE YOU.

author: {'steamid': '76561197971190603', 'num_games_owned': 923, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 61112, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2721, 'last_played': 1549966793}
review:
Bon, disons que ce jeu as des qualités et des défauts mais pas de bol pour le dis jeu j'ai eu un gros soucis avec (voir capture d'écran sur mon profil publique) à la première zone de la seconde région du jeu je suis bloqué en plein milieu du niveau, apparement un bogue bien pénible, du coup impossible de progresser.

C'est donc déplorable car en plus du bogue pas moyen de joindre le support en jeu quand on y joue sous steam, le machin commence avec le bouton a cliquer qui est pas cliquable ou que aprés 45 minutes de lutte avec un second bogue, ensuite quand on as par miracle et persévérance réussi à cliquer ça met que le jeu n'est pas trouvé !

Du coup je me pose de sérieuses questions au sujet justement du sérieux des gens qui ont développé et qui exploitent le jeu car je leur ai fait part il y as plus de 72 heures de mon problème et j'ai toujours pas eu de réponse, même pas un " on as bien reçu votre signalement".

Je ne trouve pas de mot asser fort pour décrire ma déception... surtout que avec un camarade on as fait le test c'est pas que chez moi ces problèmes !

Conclusion: nulachier alors que ça aurais du être correct voir plus !

author: {'steamid': '76561198055990965', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 45, 'playtime_forever': 975, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 36, 'last_played': 1617566051}
review:
I played the game for about a year, a while back on the RU servers, when the game just came out.
The game mechanics since then were dumbed down, since then, and tuned toward monetization, even more. 
The gameplay and the setting are good but damn this game is constantly nagging about paid stuff.
And yes the game is P2W (Pay-to-win) since you can upright buy new classes and stat buffs with "premium currency". You also get double the loot if you have a subscription which is btw a jawdropping ~$30/mo.
This is insane.
