author: {'steamid': '76561198008597844', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 106, 'playtime_forever': 579, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 476, 'last_played': 1524859893}
review:
It has potential, yet boring and feel unfinish.
Wish the game plays as how the cutscenes shows but there's not even our player's voice except text then press "Space".
The graphic is nice for both while of course cutscenes are better. Performance is smooth yet the gameplay is quite boring.

+ Graphic
+ Performance
+ Girl players name (sounds like they are beautiful, lol)
+ Cutscenes
+ Character customization

- Unsatisfying combat for Paladin / Warrior class (seems like the weapon doesn't even hit the target)
- Locked party mode while it only allows you to play with friends if only you have done it solo
- Grindy (okay?) but boring imo

review: un conglomerado de errores y bugs graficos o de animaciones rotas y fallos en las colisiones, pero lo estaba dejando pasar porque todavia me parecia minimamente entretenido y le estaba dando la oportunidad haber si a medida que siguiera adelante y desbloqueara mas clases se ponia mejor pero le dejo una reseña negativa porque ahora ni se puede loguear, y es un problema probablemente del luncher y no mio porque no soy el unico, solo vallan a las discuciones del juego. simplemente le estaba dedicando la tarde de hoy luego del trabajo para probarlo para quedarme extrañamente bloqueado en la penultima zona del mundo 2 y al preceder a reiniciar el juego por si las dudas nunca mas pude loguearme, pasaron ya 3 horas de eso, aun no me puedo loguear, a nadie de los que se quejaron les han respondido los tikets y ademas ni siquiera publican nada avisando de que estan haciendo nada, ni nada por el esitilo mucha gente se queda sin poder jugar de golpe y ni cuenta se dan -_- la verdad se lo ganaron, todavia no lo voy a desinstalar, seguire tratando mañana si no se puede lo siento pero me perdiste -_-

author: {'steamid': '76561198327543348', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 759, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 750, 'last_played': 1526161556}
review:
O jogo é bom, muito bom na real, eu estava esperando bem menos, não sou muito de jogar MMORPG, porém tive um interesse especial nesse, o jogo pode ser p2w (como assim pode ser? Explicarei depois), tanto a jogabilidade como os gráficos são bons, podem ser ajustados pra um PC não-tão-bom como o meu, porém, um defeito que tirou TODA a minha vontade de jogar foi que não existe PvP. 

Sim, na real, existe PvP, mas de que adianta existir sendo que você fica 50 minutos (juro, fiquei 50 minutos) e nada de alguém aparecer pra você jogar ? Você upa , upa , upa , upa mais um pouco, faz quest , ganha arma boa e no final não consegue testar nada disso no PvP, somente com monstros.

Pra quem gosta de PvE, esse jogo é um prato cheio, mas se você for que nem eu, que gosta de PvP mesmo sem saber nada sobre como funciona as batalhas multijogador no jogo, recomendo você nem chegar perto.

Talvez algum dia ajustem isso, pelo que eu li o JxJ é muito desbalanceado e players veteranos te matam com duas pauladas, te stunam infinitamente e etc, mas hoje em dia é injogável.

review: It used to be a cool game, even if you had to do a humongus amount of farming to get where you want but now it's only a "pay to get something interesting", where you one shot every pack of mobs you encounter and where the bugs are florishing like dandelions in spring. The only interesting points are the graphics, but that's pretty much about it.

author: {'steamid': '76561197995457954', 'num_games_owned': 386, 'num_reviews': 54, 'playtime_forever': 18, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 18, 'last_played': 1492246456}
review: Если аллоды после покупки переделывали и плавномерно отправляли на дно, то тут все и с самого начала. Игра про донат  о донате. Донат, донат, донат, все что делают - все завязано на донате, лотереии, сундуки, имба плюшки. Все можно получить за игровые деньги? - смешно.тут как и в аллодах если вы в равном шмоте налетите на папку в фул донат рунах и всех плюшках из сундуков, то отлетите с удара, да хоть вас 20 человек будет - улетите с массухи.  У игры потрясающие художники и много действительно крутых идей, но все их труды несут приставку "донат". Вас всегда будут держать вкурсе и делать анонсы.... Внимание! Донат магазина. Руки и умения ничего не решают. Если вы не готовы тратить огромные деньги на постоянной основе, то даже не пытайтесь. Лучше либо поиграйте в популярные ммо  подпиской, либо с умеренным донатом, благо и те и те еще есть,  и ,надеюсь, будут держаться на плаву, ибо в такое играть тошно. А и да, играл через основной лаунчер мыла.

author: {'steamid': '76561197983538091', 'num_games_owned': 509, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 1720, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1372, 'last_played': 1648325169}
review:
La sortie de Ascension a scellé le sort de ce jeux... Adieu Atlas, temple, etc... Même les joueurs de PS4 se sont vu dégouté de ne pas pouvoir profiter de l'ancienne version, avant Ascension.

Bonjour la facilité et le linéaire.. ça ne vaut en rien du tout l'avant Ascension c'est devenue vraiment n'importe quoi mais comme des "gens" y joue encore, tout ce tralala continue...

SVP re faites l'ancienne version, que l'on peut choisir ou non, mais qu'elle y sois!

Ascension aurais fonctionné si il y avait un monde ouvert derrière ça aurais permis de mieux faire passer la pillule.

author: {'steamid': '76561198819213239', 'num_games_owned': 5, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 414, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 414, 'last_played': 1520315320}
review:
Super Game ist auch echt Nah an der Realität "Skyforge ist daher meine TOP 2#"

Und ich finde es darf sich gern weiter in die Richtig FSK 18 oder 20 Scene begeben.

Da hier Jugendliche normal nix auf einem Skyforge Server zu suchen haben.
Da ich auch viele gesehen habe die von Kinder da echt Belästigt und mehr wurden, besonders was Intime sachen angeht.
Da Skyforge zu dem echt Hammer Sexy Fraun und Männer Carakteren zum Sebst erstellen anbieten kann.
Finde ich Trotzdem das Kinder nicht in Sollche Games gehören, da Kinder es scheinbar nicht in so einem Realem Lebens Echtem Spieln und der Online Welt begreifen könne das sie hier zu 98,9% Nur Erwachsene spieler/inen finden werden.
Die sich echt Sexuel belästigt fühlen oder auch verarscht von einem Jungen spieler Fühlten .

Zbs... Das sie sich als Älter ausgeben und Fraun Anmachen und ect....  und so auch bei Erwachsenen Männern von Minderjährigen Mädchen ect... usw.. und sofort.

Ich habe dieses Game Gründlich Getestet und Beobachtet auf Schwachpunkte und co zu 98,05% Sicher.

2,95% Ist das Minderjährigen Problem im Allgemeinem InGame Chat ect...

Game Rules ect.. ist Total Korrekt und 100% Richtig so auch die AGB des Games.

Nur Jugendliche im Alter von 9 oder Hoch bis 16 Jahren Gehören normal noch nicht hier rein.
Da einige Minderjährige Kinder es nicht Richtig verstehen können was sich nicht gehört gerade bei Rules halten sie sich selbst  Oft nicht an Regeln.
Also auch das sie immer "Rummeckern und Zicken" werden wenn sie was nicht bekommen,
Dennoch das sie Oft zu Agressivität Neigen können.
Es Gibt mehr Brennpunkte die ich da erfasst haben beim Zuhören und Chat Fenster Lesen.
Und Ich Dachte es könnte eventuel auch Skyforge Helfen diese Probleme zu Analysieren und zu Beheben.

Selbst bei Grand Theft Auto V Online Mode & Multiplayer Servern ist es so Eingeführt Worden.
Selbst Jeder GTA V KW-Five-Life.com Server Besitzt sollche Regeln & Erneuerte AGB,s als auch eine Mindesalters Anforderung von 20 Jahren. Per Personalausweiß Nummer oder Electronische Personalausweiß erkunngung,s  Bestätigung.

Und man kann es Bestätigen lassen Via Paypal ect...

So kommen dan auch keine Minderjährige merh auf die Server Für Erwachsene da ich finde das Skyforge genau wie GTA V
Sehr viele Sexuelle als auch Sexy Carakteren drin haben die einige Kinder Erregend finden und Schneller Pupertieren, als auch keine Ahnung haben werden was sie da in einem nicht so Ganz Normalem Falle gerade Sagen und tun.

Und da man auch Redet Kinder davor bis zu ihren 17 oder 18 Lebensjahr zu Schützen sollte es doch auch gern hier Beherzigt werden.

Weil Manche Eltern es nicht Merken werden das sich ihre Kinder doch antun werden.
Weil sowas sollte im Echten Leben als erfahrung gesammelt werden und nicht in Unseren besten RealLife Online Games.

Wie Gesagt es ist meine Meinung und Kritic drüber und weil ich Kinder davor bewahren will.
Sowas mache ich weil ich eine Tochter habe und sie Schützen will.

Weil sowas nicht in Sollchen Games mit Minderjährigen unter den Erwachsenen Passieren soll.
Da Erwachsene gern in Sollchen Games Stressfrei Spielen wollen und einfahc Ruhe vor Kindern Suchen um sich Auszuleben vom Alltag, auch wenns nur für Paar Stunden oder ein Wochenende Lang ist.
Ich kenne als Familien Vater Ich Flüchte auch ins Skyforge nur um mit Freunden oder mit meiner Lebensgefährtig Spass zu haben ect...

Weil so Erwachsene kein Stress Zuhause an ihre Kinder rauslassen müssen.
Sondern es bei Monstern Rauslassen können ;-)

Oder in einer Gruppe oder Sogar Clan oder Gilde Kämpfen können um wieder  Gute Laune zu Tanken....


So ect...  Könnte weiter Schreiben Welche Gründe es Gäbe und Gäben könnte und was so Super an "Skyforge" ist.

Aber den Rest kennt sicher Jeder Erwachsene hier auch Skyforge ;-) 

Ganz Sicher 

Liebe Grüße euer Aura-Baikaa StandartGamer Alias: Rayn

author: {'steamid': '76561198121088534', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 15, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 15, 'last_played': 1501529553}
review:
J'y ai principalement joué hors steam, et encore une fois, je blâme steam pour ne pas mettre des évaluations neutres..

Skyforge est un bon jeu, entaché par ses dev et surtout la communauté.

A la base il y avait un arbre géant afin de débloquer des stats/persos, 3 types de pierres (rouges, bleues, vertes) et les raids c'était des raids.

Maintenant que les devs ont écouté la commu de casus (suite à la MaJ ascension il y a un an ou deux je crois) tout a volé en éclats et le jeu s'est transformé en un grind sans fin sans difficulté apparente sauf avec les distorsions, qui manquent à mon sens d'intérêt sauf si vous êtes un Hardcore.


Votre objectif va être d'up en puissance pour taper plus fort, le end game est simple au possible, les opérations ISA, Medea et Ophelia se font avec un groupe PU formé à l'arrache sur le global sans soucis, la seule strat c'est avoir au moins 3-4 dieux avec le groupe, donc rien de bien méchant.

Le PvP est mort aussi depuis que les gens spamment la god form à tout va dedans, perdant le fun et le challenge, c'était bien parti pourtant.

Néanmoins cela reste un bon jeu pour le gameplay de ses classes qui sont toutes différentes, et plus ou moins complexes à jouer (petite pensée pour le moine qui arrache mais qui est dur à master)

Si vous voulez vous y jeter dedans, allez-y, cependant attendez vous à un mindless farm, et de la casualisation à outrance (je ne parlerai même pas de la simplification des stats, c'est ridicule)

Je ne recommande pas, mais j'émet une certaine réserve.

author: {'steamid': '76561198024490232', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 20474, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 20330, 'last_played': 1507047658}
review:
PvE is kinda fun in a group and if you get into a decent guild, otherwise its just spamming chat hoping to get a invite to raids.
PvP is a bit more pay to win, there is a battle armour suit(chicken suit was the nickname we used) that cost's money to buy which is a lot more powerful than not having it.

Grind to max add on's can be a bit random. Combat superiority is another grind that can be p2w. New seasons keep it fresh but again can be maxed out very quickly depending on how much money is thrown at it.

There is a skill curve as you learn different classes and the most optimal way to use them but prepare to ridiculed for it. There is definetely some elitism here.

Its a free game, will take a lot longer to catch up to everyone unless you spend money or get given a free ride of a guild (Unlikely).

author: {'steamid': '76561198186149063', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 108785, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 91660, 'last_played': 1589994646}
review:
Simple answer, dont. I kid you not, you can literally get punished for playing the game normally because they have no idea how to reproduce a bug. Just recently some bug came out where if you were online playing at a specific time, you would get +2/4% more combat superiority than if you weren't online then (at least that's what I was told) and a good number of people who had it (including myself), didn't even know that was a thing. All we knew was that we somehow had +4% more than others. Combat superiority is basically a buff to your damage and health against a specific army.

And guess what? Weeks later, after everyone has farmed up to around 80% combat superiorty, they drop everyone who had +4% more combat superiority than others, down to 35%. Yep, they don't remove the 4% that you got UNINTENTIONALLY, they remove a whole 41%. As if that wasn't enough, we also can't exceed 59% because the game somehow believes we should have 100% at the time. 

And the best part is, those who intentionally exploited the bug, had nothing done to them. No jokes, they have 100% and are still roaming scott free. Politely send a ticket to their support team regarding how you were unjustly punished and you know what they do? They close your ticket.

author: {'steamid': '76561198302127530', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 5569, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5097, 'last_played': 1622976995}
review:
Après 87h de jeu, je me déécide enfin à donné mon avis et dieu sait que c'est dûr de savoir si le jeu est bien ou mal...

Graphisme :

Terrain ; Magnifique quand les paramètres graphiques sont bien réglé, sinon ils sont très moyen voir mauvais.
Personnage en jeu : S'est acceptables.
Cinématique : Mauvaise qualitée d'image, bug nombreus et omniprésent !

Traduction :

Traduction parfois juste, souvent ont atteint le niveau google traduction... Quand on a la bonne langue biensûr, en effet le jeu change de langue quand il le souhaite, d'un objet à l'autre en moins de 10 sec vous passez du français au russe (Histoire vraie).

Gameplay :

Alors la il y a de quoi dire... Alors on nous a vendus des batailles immenses, des combats de dieux aux pouvoirs gigantesque... Oublié sa ! Si par chance vous réussissez à surviivre aux 3h de file d'attente pour trouver du pvp (Player vs Player) vous vous ferez massacré par ceux qui soit : passe leurs vie sur le jeu ou qui font flambée leurs carte bleue ! [Histoire vraie]. La campagne et la plus brouillone que j'ai jamais vu avec l'obligation d'activé la suite de la campagne entre chaque chapitre... Enfin si vous retrouvez le menu associé à la campagne que j'ai mis 1h à trouver ! Sinon pour la phase dieu, il savoir que pour se transformer en nous même en fait ^^ il faudra payer avec de la "foi" qu'il faut obtenir grâce à ses adeptes. Résultats : personne ne se transforme en dieu pour sauver quelqu'un d'autre ou pour se battre contre un autre dieu en pvp. Sa coute trop cher.

Bug :

Pratiquement omniprésent, du bug de texture, jusqu'au blocage sous la map quand vous apparaissez, vous allez être servis !

Interface :

La plus désordonnée que j'ai jamais vu ! Il faut le voir pour comprendre !

Conclusion :

Jeu très moyen voir mauvais qui pour moi est loin d'avoir dépassé le stade qu'on attend pour un jeu sotis, je le classerait plutôt dans une bêta.

author: {'steamid': '76561197994265851', 'num_games_owned': 383, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 1374, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 575, 'last_played': 1593479241}
review:
I found this game on Xbox, and I was actually really enjoying it! So, I decide to see if it's on PC and, if so, what it could do on PC.

PC version is a completely broken mess. I never got out of the prologue on PC because it was completely disagreeing with my computer. It set my resolution WAY higher than my computer can handle, and it wouldn't let me change it back. for some reason, it wouldn't let me click the choices. I had to enter to select them. If I set it to Fullscreen, I could only see a small portion of the game, since the rest was out of the screen. (another thing from the resolution being forcably set so high). If I set it to windowed, it puts the lower portion of the game behind my computer's toolbar. It keeps going, but I'l move on.

The game is VERY intensive and seemingly poorly optimised. Framerates are gonna be bad no matter which version of the game you choose. This is the first game I've yet run into where I had to turn down the graphics settings.

Gameplay is actually really fun. That's what drove me to seek out a PC version in the firstplace. It's very fast paced and does a very good job of making you feel really powerful later on down the line.

At the end, I'd say go play the Xbox version. Despite the poor framerate in some places, the game actually works over there. I'll reitterate that the PC Version is a completely buggy mess.

----------------EDIT:

I decided to revisit this game since I've upgraded my system significantly since my initial review, and there had been plenty of time for updates. I encountered none of the technical issues I did in the past. Super fun gameplay with a smooth framerate. That's why I've changed my review to a recommend. pretty good game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198016031057', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 9, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 9, 'last_played': 1519802669}
review:
Сама игра неплоха в начале, но отношение к игрокам и безмерная жадность делает данный проект неинтесесным. Играл с момента обт на клиенте от мейл ру. Итак о плохом:
-наплевательское отношение, если вы напишите о багах в игре и то что это сырой продукт, ваше сообщение просто сотрут, а вас забанят на форуме
-разработчики делают что хотят и когда хотят, на вас им срать с высокой колокольни
-продажа товаров напрямую влияющее на игровой баланс( оружие, боевые маунты)
-никакое пвп
-никакого развития проекта( деньгосос) максимум меняют значки
-одни и теже баги воскресают чудесным образом
-вас заставят купить, прокачать и потом просто удаляют эту вещь ( сначала были атласы, их тупо удалили, потом были провинции их порезали, были наборы колец, их сделали неактуальными, дошли до края, тупо вайпнули всех, началась типо новая эра. Сейчас у них проблема со знаниями о противнике, собором и провинциями, так что скоро будет очередной вайп. 
- ввели ранги премиума которые не работают и награду так и не дают корректно
-наладили продажу стимуляторов за которые можно ускорять акции, распродали их по акции ииии БИНГО выпилили их 
- пытался выбить себе аспект, так за 100 проходов тренировочного аватага ни один не выпал. На вопрос а какой шанс дропа комьюните ответил что это закрытая информация
И это стандартная отмазка на любые вопросы. Как работает гиперион- тайна, какой процент игроков закрыла 5 ранг и вы так быстро ввели 6ой, зачем и для кого- тайна. А тайны то нет, всё работает наобум, никаких точных данных, игра покрытая мраком
- ввели крафт вещей, непомерные деньги за один!! ОДИН сезон вторжения. А потом их можно выкинуть, что  у людей в голове, загадка
-никакое гвг с кучей багов и договорняками
До сих пор играю, но с каждым днем мечтаю всё больше и больше избавиться от этого .....на. Останавливает только то, что потрачено много сил и средств в проект который на тот момент был ещё нормальным
Хороший проект который попал в руки бездарных разработчиков, которые не занимаются разработкой и развитием, а тупо выкачивают деньги.

review:
Un tres bon jeu , sachant que ce dernier est en free-to-play . Un univers asser avant gardiste , et il fallais oser .
Dynamique , et fluide , tres plaisant a prendre en main sur le coter combat , il n'en reste pas moins qu'il faudra jouer plus d'une heure pour comprendre les mécanismes de ce jeu et oser le critiquer .
Le meilleur moyen de ce faire encore une opinion est de l'essayer .
Un jeu recommander pour toutes personnes voulant experimenter et s'amuser , raleurs et pro-gamers s abstenirs.

author: {'steamid': '76561197974020350', 'num_games_owned': 266, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 475, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 475, 'last_played': 1519058469}
review:
Fuyez.
Ne téléchargez pas Skyforge.
Rien à voir ici.

L'ancienne formule, avant la mise à jour, avait au moins le mérite d'offrir un contenu très important et une progression longue qui permettait au gameplay d'évoluer.
C'était du grind bête et méchant, mais vous aviez le choix dans votre progression.

Désormais il n'y a plus de progression, tout est restreint par les monnaies du jeu (relativement difficiles à cumuler) et l'argent réel.

Comptez plusieurs semaines pour pouvoir changer de classe. Sachant que les trois classes "offertes" peuvent débloquer une dizaine de skills et que cela prend à peine quelques minutes.

Non. Sérieusement. Jouez à Warframe, à Guild wars 2, à un moba, peu importe.
Mais FUYEZ.

author: {'steamid': '76561198092192430', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 16862, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 14190, 'last_played': 1521441466}
review:
ПОПРОШУ ВСЕХ НЕ ЗНАЮЩИХ АНГЛИЙСКИЙ НЕ УСТАНАВЛИВАТЬ СТИМ ВЕРСИЮ! Для вас существует Mail.ru версия. На частоту: вам сдесь не рады...

++Проработаные личности персонажей (сюжет)
+Удобное управление на геймпаде (дорабатывают интерфейс, так что приходтся часто юзать клавиатуру)
+Частые и даже порой атмосферные ивенты.
+Интересная механика развития.

-Смысл развивать персонажа? Уровень снаряжения всё равно подгоняется под миссии независимо выше вы уровнем или ниже (да есть исключение, но это где то 2.5% контента)
-Сюжет порой на отъ.... ( проходя сюжет чувствуешь себя идиотом и не можешь ничего с этим поделать)
-Баланс классов. Давайте по чесноку: Ревенант OP (если учитывать одинаковый уровень развития)
-Баланс развития: Недавно сделали всю снарягу экеперовываемой без ограничений по "уровню силы", а смысл когда не прокачаный перс всё равно ничего не сможет сделать фрагу на директивах без бога? И вообще почему нубам дают заведомо не выполнимые задания без помощи сильных игроков?
-Форсят на PvP: скипай за стимуляторы или страдай.
-Нарушающие атмосферу ограничения. (стоймость божественной формы варьируется, и вы не можете сделать А потому что по тому (без Б))
---Pay to Win: Слабый но одно его наличие уже можно считать за 3 минуса. (уникальные пушки с уникальным эффектом только за покупку недешёвых наборов)
-Изучение классов или прочих полезностей значительно замедлено, что заставит вас купить пак классов.

Играю только по тому что это единственное RPG которое не заставляет меня быть "пианистом"

review:
I've played 11 hours and I'm still going through a meh story without doing much of anything interesting. The only thing worth mentioning I've unlock are my character's ability since everything else was better stats, better stats and better stats.

Also the open areas you can do beside the story are a massive slap in the face. It's just running through a way too big map slauthering and collecting everything you find.

At least the core gameplay is very fun but after a few hours, it gets very repetitive.

If I find some worthwhile content, I'll update my review.

author: {'steamid': '76561197971493010', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 240, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 240, 'last_played': 1518160088}
review:
I played this game when it was open beta, a long long time ago.  It was a beautiful game, where with hard work you could get anything in game.

The game is somewhat pay to win, as you can pay to get increased limits and get to goals quicker, which is a bit of a pity.  In theory though, you could still compete reasonably well if you poured enough time in to it.  I can't remember what kind of limits there was to end game (or if you just got more & more powerful), and I never played for the PvP side of it.

The only thing that turned me off was that I found out they had removed the credits (normal currency) to argents (premium currency bought with real money) ability, and that argents were mainly able to be attained by spending real money.  If premium currencies were affordable that would be ok, but I haven't found many games where premium currency could be considered affordable.

All in all this game has a nice variety of classes, and from what I've seen it's a very beautiful game.  I would've liked to go further in to it, but my game time is somewhat limited and I'd rather focus on other games where they don't force limits on players (unless you pay of course).

author: {'steamid': '76561197984237869', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 511, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 511, 'last_played': 1517869937}
review:
Skyforge looks great, but completely fails to engage my imagination. Such a shame as the lore presented in the trailer seems to have much potential. Perhaps it is a translation problem? I quickly lost interest in the “pew pew!”  (in a winding hallway all by myself), then something happens automatically, then more “pew pew!” pattern. 

Pros:
•	Great looking graphics, including characters and scenery.
•	Runs well even though my system was slightly below the required specs. I assume that it would both look amazing and run smoothly on a good gaming rig.
•	Avatars are NOT creepy. I find a lot of Asia-influenced games have avatars that look like weird-hermaphrodite-rubber-jailbait-sexbots. Not a problem here. Males range from rugged to youthful with no baby-head jammed on a jacked body (that I saw). Females had a good range of reasonable builds that stopped well short of “full Bimbo” exaggeration or other strangeness. 
•	Insane amount of costume options. 
•	Good lore concept that justifies almost any RP idea for your character & costume.
•	Easy to use controls.  
•	Good basic artwork. By that I mean the style of costumes, scenery, vehicles, monsters, etc. There is a lot of fun stuff right off the bat and it appears some effort to tie the various aspects together while allowing choices.

Cons:
•	NOT open world. This was a big one for me. I felt like I went from elevator, to hallway, to waiting room (oh look, other players…loitering), and back to elevator, rinse and repeat… 
•	Lore not incorporated into game play. Dialogue was awkward, rushed, full of inconsistencies and just not entertaining. If the editing rule of only keeping lines that contribute to the story was followed, ALL the dialogue would be cut. Also: cringe-worthy voice acting and editing.
•	No sense of character advancement or how it relates to plot. I had no idea what was improving next as I levelled or that I had control of it or a choice to make. A good system will have you itching for that next upgrade or ability, here I wasn’t even aware what was being introduced or when.
•	The Combat system was not engaging. Just button mash and eventually a prize(?) pops out. I tried button mashing with my eyes closed and my results didn’t change.

author: {'steamid': '76561198024968498', 'num_games_owned': 10778, 'num_reviews': 116, 'playtime_forever': 26868, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8858, 'last_played': 1568407882}
review:
Review were re-written according to current game state:

OK, let me get this straight. This is a good and fun to play game... for a while. Then you start noticing artificial progress stoppers and limits. I've started playing it about a year ago for the first time and when I finished main quest line I end up with all green (lowest quality) items which can not be upgraded and no way to progress since nobody wanted to take me for a ride into dungeons which were all at least half a hundred ranks above me. And without such a ride there were (and, actually, still no) way to progress any further. Since then the game changed quite a lot in the way it handles item stats and your damage output, but at least online improved as it seems. I did manage to find myself a good pantheon (guild) and people often start free rides into low-mid level dungeons available nowadays. It's quite easy to break past low-rank limbo now. So, if you starting from scratch, just make sure you get past the main quest line and become a junior god. Theoretically, your level should be decent enough to be carried through mid-level dungeons and start replacing your gear with blue and purple items and upgrading them. Also, beside dungeons there is PVP in which you can participate during so-called happy hours during which no matter win you or loose you'll get a box with good gear or temporary legendary weapon or artifact. So, look into this as well even though PVP here is completely imbalanced and pure cancer. I'd recommend to avoid 5v5 matches as plage since they provide the same prize as 3v3, but usually take 15-30 minutes to finish because it's MOBA-alike mode. Do them only if they pop-up in your directives and provide a good prize there. And yes, do the directives. They give items which will help you get quite a lot of might from your capital buildings (very good for Stronghold, Tower of Knowledge and better than nothing for Cathedral).

Now, regarding the game itself. It's really beautiful and in some cases the locations look just breathtaking. However, it doesn't really encourage exploration since regions are relatively small (with a few exceptions) and littered with invisible walls and unwalkable slopes (all of them). In fact the bigger and more complex location is the worse offender it will be (like Thea and Terra). Also, even the smallest bump on the road may require you to jump or walk around it since you'll stumble into it otherwise. And jumping when you already stumbled into it usually won't help since you won't have any forward momentum to move over it. And it isn't necessarily visible in the first place! In some cases you may stop while moving from an upward slope to a flat surface. Also, you can't cross deep water. At all. Anything deep enough to reach your head is lethal and will kill your “god(dess)”. So, yes, local immortals are swimming like a brick and the only reason they are called "immortals" is the fact that they just respawn like nothing happened after that. Beautiful game with utterly broken exploration.

Gameplay is good. It's packed with FPS-like action and there are little to none useless skills. You can lock on your target if you really want to, though. In case you play with a gamepad that might be helpful. There are a lot of classes and you don't have to start a new character to play another one. In fact, you can switch between them whenever you want. You just can't get your hands on most of them from the start and have to unlock them. The game will grant you 3 defaults at start and playing on Steam account will grant you access to Outlaw class. I'd recommend getting it since it's free, but replace it with current meta later on like Grovewalker right now. Ask at the Observatory whichever it is. Then unlock anything else as you please. Some classes (like Alchemist) provide tremendous burst damage with proper equipment. The only issue with unlocking other classes quickly is the fact that you have to run PvP matches for a looong while to get enough sparks. They occasionally drop from monsters in 100 point packs, but you'll need 25-35k to unlock another class, so farming PvP is way faster.

Quests and story are relatively dumb. Unfortunately that's something you can expect from an MMO. There are only a few with decent stories and this one is clearly not one of these. An absolute majority of quests are standard FedEx trash or kill a bunch of mobs which happen to be hostile only if you stay right in the middle of the pack for around 10~15 seconds and will land first hit on you in ~30 in the best case. Fearsome creatures, right? With such a level of aggression the only question I have is why they can't just get along with each other? They clearly can tolerate an “enemy” running through their ranks like there is nothing wrong with that.

I can say nothing bad about the service in this game. I had a few issues and opened quite a few support tickets as well and so far they were very polite (even though most messages are standard templates) and somewhat helpful. For example, they updated the Grovewalker and Soundwaver bundles description with legendary weapon item generation after I reported that I got quite outdated weapon out of one of these (I decided to get myself a GW bundle) without any forewarning from their side. Also, I had quite a few problems with their launcher and we did manage to resolve at least some of them.

Now, is it playable without a premium account? Well, to some extent yes, it is. Premium grants you +100% to two in-game currencies drop one of which used to upgrade your Tower of Knowledge with diminishing results and barely affects anything when you get to directives, but the other one is in-game money and you need quite a lot to keep your gear in shape (and a few more oceans to fill the void called Cathedral... forget about it until you max-out your gear in current generation). Credits also used to buy metric fucktons of Intelligence Extractors for events which require these. The problem is this premium is tiered and to reach the next tier you have to buy third in-game currency... with real money. Yey. -_- Got it? You pay for a damn premium, but until you pay more you are not premium enough. Even though these bonuses are rather minor they still help and some levels provide stuff like +3% to your health and damage or double your faith storage. Oh, you can get 2000 points towards premium rank progress from directives, but these are very rare and you'll need ~36k to get from rank 5 to rank 6. So, if you are really into it, expect to spend your hard-earned money on more things than just a subscription.

What really rubs me the wrong way is all present pay2win or even pay2grind systems. You've decided to participate in the event which requires Data Intelligence? Well, you'll get about 3000 of that quite easily, but then you will stop receiving it pretty much at all and the only way to get event reward is to use a lot of Argents (which you can buy en-masse with real money or earn in relatively small amounts in-game). Have you worked hard to do achievements specific to the current invasion to get prizes from the local version of "battle pass"? Well, you won't get half of the prizes without actually paying for that pass. You think you are doing great with upgrading your Stronghold and Tower of Knowledge? Oh, wait, why do their upgrade items suddenly work a lot worse (like, here your 100 stronghold resources... instead of 1000). You can grind to the highest rank to get a chance for a legendary weapon, but you know, you can just buy them. In my previous review I told they haven’t had lootboxes for real money... Well, now they have them with legendary weapons.

So, I like this game, but I can't really recommend it. That's why this review is a “negative” one.

author: {'steamid': '76561198027313280', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 396, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 396, 'last_played': 1517663002}
review:
"In Skyforge, you will walk the path from an immortal warrior to a mighty God, gaining followers as you fight to protect your world.

Your loyal followers will help you increase your power as you rise to become an Elder God. The best of the best will join the Order of Keepers and shape the fate of the world." - Skyforge website


I have played this game on xbox one, and apart from the female character creation (which has chest and butt customization), i have found NOTHING interesting. It's bland, laggy, choppy and frames skip like a broken record.
the controls don't respond and sometimes won't do anything until the game decides to let you make an action

You start off as an "immortal" and battle groups of badly made enemies, which can hit you eventhough they are not close to you (melee units), extremely overpowered for your level and you get no help from anyone if you encounter a harder level. The enemies can quickly close in on you and have a speed boost while following you making you unable to distance yourself from them, even with ranged attacks, their hitbox is broken, and some of them are downright cheap

The rewards system sucks, and you get no real pleasure in battling it out with the baddies. Terrible voiceover and mocaps, your character can't jump and hit at the same time and any action can be interrupted by movement, (including some of your skills, which i find ridiculously stupid) or incoming damage. 

There are no useful healing items to use when close to death, and even if you use one, you can't use another for the duration of  the damn level. Seriously? 
When you die, you have to walk a considerable distance to the place of death... frustrating.
The quests have a certain order you need to do them in, and you can't have more than 2 active at a time, so whenever you finish one, you have to go all the way to the other end of the map (on foot, because the mounts are limited to an hour of usage, or teleport for a small 750 credits fee), a thing which i don't understand.
Also, at the beginning of the level you get a battle prototype, but be careful not to press the wrong button, or you'll end up self destructing it and it's lost forever... bogus feature.

But hey, it's a free to play game, and like all free to play games, they're fun until you hit the mega-grind wall.

It's a good time waster, but nothing more

author: {'steamid': '76561198004877053', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 96, 'playtime_forever': 11295, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8965, 'last_played': 1545132738}
review:
Warning : yes, I recommand that game, but not to just everyone, and not whole-heartedly. There are some verry irritating aspects to it.

Technically, this game is pretty much what I have come to expect from every russian game developper I ever encountered : solid core mechanics, everything else either lacks polish or is really, really lame. There are about a zillion bugs in this game, be it from the ridiculous running animation that includes an (obviously broken and unintended) twitch of the left foot to the special weapon not dropping properly after being depleted on some occasion, replacing all your combat animations by... well, by nothing, you simply appear idle while actually shooting. Those are not game-breaking bugs, but they sure are cringeworthy.

The dialogs are by far the worst part of the game. I have been gaming for over 25 years and the only thing I can think of that would be this bad is "all your base are belong to us". Except that, here, it's not a botched translation, it's just some very, VERY bad writting. For exemple, you go talk to the god of knowledge and storytelling for informations, and of course, he tells you a story. The only thing you can reply (you don't chose your character's answers) is "boring"... First, no, it wasn't (for once !!), and second, you don't ask the god of storytelling for informations if you don't want him to give them to you ! That's just an exemple, but almost every dialog feels out of place, inconsistent, and in some cases questions and answers don't even match ! It's hard to believe Obsidian Entertainment actually worked on that game. Seems to me they just slapped their label on it for good measure, but actually did nothing. For the first time in many years, I skip every dialog, the story actually makes more sense that way. That's how bad it is.

Now, the game isn't all bad. You play one character that can unlock all classes, classes themselves level really quickly once unlocked, so you get many options. Missions are well designed, generally speaking, and overall it's a cool game to blast some sh*t to smitherins. Don't expect profound lore, intricate storytelling and whatnot, but if you come for good action, that can be played in short sessions if you wish, then this game is pretty good.

It is, however, an extremely grindy game. That would normally be a "I'm not playing this" sign for me, but this one is different. You can't just grind all day long to become all powerful. Pretty much everything you can do to become more powerful is on a timer, meaning you get to spend those "knowledge of enemies" a few times and day, and then need to wait. You can of course keep playing and get more of those, but can't spend them anyway. So, it's a grind, but an intentionaly slow one.

Well, you can also go the Wallet Warrior way, spending real cash to remove the timers, but this would cost you a real life fortune. If you can't refrain your impulses to go faster and faster because you want to level super fast and be super strong... This game isn't for you. Even if you buy your way through the timers (assuming you can afford it), you'll still need time to actually do the quests and all, get equipment, faith to power your god-form abilities and whatnot. Some of those things can not be skipped. It's not pay to win, it's pay to advance faster. Which isn't really needed, actually.

If you have a bad history of compulsively buying a sh*t-ton of things from a cash shop and fear you may get in trouble again, just don't play this game. It will ruin your life. If, however, you have a modicum of sanity and don't mind spending some real cash, occasionnaly, on some fluff or to exceptionnaly bypass a timer, this might be a good game for you.

So, in short, good action MMO, incredibly bad storytelling and dialogs, a lot of incentive to spend real cash, some bugs, long grind. If you intend to play somewhat seriously, I suggest you invest in the "all classes unlock" pack (which, by the way, doesn't include the Revenant, so it's NOT all classes unlock) when it's on sales. Don't play full price, it's a rip off, but at 50% or even less, that's nice to kickstart you in the game, and you won't really need anything else. You might *want* a whole lot of other things, but you won't really need it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198070029622', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 13571, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 13044, 'last_played': 1524018288}
review:
Boring.

The game is very repetitive, the content does not change, it's always the same instances with the same maps with the same enemies at the same place, the gear will increase the same stats, the only thing changing are numbers as you level up they become bigger and bigger.
But the feeling of the gameplay will always be the same all along once you've learned to handle a class.

Added to that is the game push people toward group play, but content is oriented toward veterans who do not want newbies in group content because it lengthen the run and they did this repetitive content hundreds of time, so newbies get the shaft for group play in a group oriented game.

Try it for the solo part perhaps, but after that it get stale fast.

review:
게임은 나쁘지않은거 같다...캐릭터 모으는게 조금 오래걸리기도 하고 귀찮긴 하지만 잼있다.또 코스튬이 꽤 자유롭다는것이 맘에들고언제든지 캐릭터를 바꿔서 할수있다는 것이 좋은거 같다. 근데 렉이 씨발뭔 지랄인지 오지게 걸린다.내컴이 안좋은 편이라 안돌아갈줄 알았더니 잘돌아가길레 어제까지만 해도 멀쩡하게 잘 플레이를 했는데...뭐만하면 응답없음이고 하다가 튕기면 보상까지 씹힌다

author: {'steamid': '76561198160073616', 'num_games_owned': 49, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 50188, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 46010, 'last_played': 1597010269}
review:
I really don't understand the so many exaggerated negative reviews. The game looks awesome and it is absolutely not pay to win, that is just a stupid excuse from people that do suck in mmorpg's. 

Of course, with a bag with money you can become much stronger but that doesn't mean the game is unplayable without investment. If you want to be a (semi) pro in the game then don't be such a greedy whining bitch and support the developers with a small investment. 

Don't expect you get everything for free, that's not how the world work. Do you even know how much this game has been cost, a triple A size? The game may have some flaws (no game is 100% perfect) but it is far from failure. And of course ,everyone has their own taste.

author: {'steamid': '76561198079744946', 'num_games_owned': 115, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 3912, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3248, 'last_played': 1568529412}
review:
1, 2 oder 3 Achtung! Das Spiel ist Müll, weil es ein Onlinespiel ist!
Onlinespiele sind der größte Dreck was die Spielindustrie entwickelt hat, denn Solo Spiele sind und war besser als solche Spiele!



Skyforge von My com  ist nicht Kostenlos, wer das glaubt wird selig. Lach lol
Und man merkt dass MyCom die Spieler Unser für doof verkauf,
wer es nicht mehr, ist selbst dran Schuld.
Man merkt es,  an den neuen SAMMLEREDITION "HAINWANDER" mal wieder!
und mit den neuen Update, wo Spieler richtig zur Kasse gebeten werden.
um das Spiel, spielen zu können muss man  Minimum Prestige 178 haben.
Was drunter  ist mit seinen Charakter z.B Prestige 117  schafft man die Level Aufstiegs Qusten nicht mehr. Um weiter zu kommen muss man in seiner Hauptstadt  und Markt gewisse Sachen kaufen mit Real Geld das man auf  Prestige 178 kommt das man die aufgaben Questen schafft.

Und auf den offen Welten zu spielen , bekommt man keine richtigen Punkte das man die
Prestige  und macht Punkt horchen bekommen, weil dadurch das Spiel voll langweilig geworden ist, als das gleiche Spielen muss dann um überhaut mal Pukte zu bekommen.

Wo ich My com auslachen muss wegen Ihren Lüge, das alle Spieler in der offen Welten 
gleichgestellt sind.

Wer z.B Prestige 150 hat  und  ein Spieler der z.B Prestige 40 hat.
Hat mehr Macht Punkte als der horche Charakter.
Und der Spieler mit Prestige 40 , macht mehr schaden als der Charakter mit Prestige 150 . lol

Da soll mir mal My com sagen, wo ist die Gleichstellung aller Charakter ist.
Lügen haben kurze Beine, ich denke dass bei My com alle mit kurzen Beinen  rum laufen. Lach lol

review:
Bon jeu F2P, joué avant la sortie sur Steam.

Certains peuvent être perturbés par ce MMORPG qui se démaque des autres, toutes les classes disponible sur un seul perso et les zones instance ( pas de monde ouvert ).
Ce jeu est gratuit et entieremment ouvert sans utilisé la CB, juste comme tout MMORPG cela prend du temps de tout débloquer.
Attention il plait ou pas, mais quelques heures permettent de réellement l'aprécier.

author: {'steamid': '76561198082664966', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 65, 'playtime_forever': 216, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 216, 'last_played': 1514571459}
review:
O jogo é até legalzinho. Os gráficos dele são lindos, a dublagem dos personagens é boa e o gameplay é até divertido, mas seus pontos bons param por aí.
A movimentação de todos bonecos (inclusive a do personagem do jogador) é muito travada e robótica. Só se tem acesso a três classes iniciais e a evolução do personagem é muito lenta. A variedade de armas e equipamentos é microscópica, ao ponto de nem existirem NPC’s mercadores, armeiros, ferreiros, etc. O jogo é extremamente repetitivo, parece até um dungeon crawler fora da dungeon. Você fala com um NPC, interage com alguns objetos e depois passa horas e horas lutando contra inimigos de tipos pouco variados. E, para piorar, o game está todo em inglês, o que, mesmo para os que entendem, eventualmente se torna algo chato e cansativo.
Recomendo Skyforge para graphic wh*res que curtem dungeon crawlers com sistema de combate de MMORPG.

author: {'steamid': '76561197985507554', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 159, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 159, 'last_played': 1515557345}
review: Ok I've been trying to play this game. It's pretty unplayable. I've added the game to my firewall whitelist to not hinder or block it. I contacted their support team. sent them all the information they asked. fallowed their instructions and still didn't get this game to stop giving me error "10120". I understand bugs but this is the only MMORPG I've ever had this much problems launching and playing. I've been booted half the day and then when I get booted I have so many issues trying to log back on. restart does not help. Gave this a solid three hour try to play. Sadly enough of my time has been wasted.

author: {'steamid': '76561198033991091', 'num_games_owned': 589, 'num_reviews': 202, 'playtime_forever': 112, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 112, 'last_played': 1515498106}
review:
Играл на мейле(да-да игра именно оттуда и там располагается руское комьюнити ну это для тех кто в танке и вообще не знает ничего помимо стима) ещё с самого первого дня ЗБТ и играл активно около 2 лет без передышки.При всём этом состоял в одном из топовых кланов участвовал ещё в самой первой битве пантеонов и ходил на аватаров и всё было хорошо игра развивалась и цвела на глазах ,а обновы которые были вызывали восторг или благоговение перед разработчиком так как в те времена очень ценилось мнение комьюнити по поводу что стоит убрать, добавить, фиксануть ,помню даже была волна когда предлагали описывать желаемые новые классы а лучшие предложения добавили бы в игру.О самой игре стоит сказать что она выглядела и до сих пор выглядит шикарно и чувствовалась так же и не мудрено ведь в разработке участвовали Obsidian: которые могут делать красивые миры качественный геймплей да с забористой сюжетной составляющей(взять тот же KOTOR, FalloutNV, Neverwinter, Dungeon siege) а также Allods Team которые тоже что то да могли на теммы красочных миров да и локализовывать кому то ведь надо. И вот живёт проект развивается а наш любимый издатель Mail.ru думает:"Чёт мало денег а игроки совсем ошалели мы тут понимаеш КАЧЕСТВЕННЫЕ(это тоже важно) наборчики продаём а они випки просто так фармят(ибо был трансфер внутриигровой валюты в донатскую )не гоже нам в нишите прозибать так что надо проэкт с колен поднимать".И предумал гениальный издатель схему мутную "Новая Эра"-назвали её. В итоге позакрывали теммы о классах желанных да серваки тестовые открыли где какие то вообще почти никому не известные чуваки орали как всё круто и что всё збс но при этом видно бло что народу на тестовом сервере было мало(и это был не ПТС он был закрытый попасть туда могли не все поэтому ширма была призакрыта так что ты вроде видиш начинку торта она такая сладкая и яркая но вроде и не видно что сам торт это куличь из говна)остальные же орали о том что трансфер бабла закроют и мол давайте все дружно фармить это самое бабло(Сразу оговорю это нихрена не помогло ибо потом это бабло с таких батек просто вытянули да и с меня тоже на левых акциях).Ну ладно вот пришла эта самая Новая эра и такой свет проник в наши глазки что мы вроде как и нарадоваться не могли....первый мать его день!!!Но потом пришло осознание что под красочной и яркой обёрткой лишь половина конфетки а другую кто то смачно так откусил!!!50%-60% контента из игры просто тупо выпилили предложив нам :1)системму статов легче и меньше чем в средней браузерке, 2)дефолтную систему скилов и пасивок на каждый класс с небольшими отличиями билдов ПВП и ПВЕ(которые к слову вобще не подходят под их предназначение) и если раньше можно было иметь несколько сборок и свою уникальную под каждый класс то теперь она у тебя либо одна на всех либо тупо 1 на каждый ТИП класса(сапорт танк атака) и то разница между ними в 1-2 символа 3)смена прокачки себя любимого и своего пантеона на столько что из игры выпилили почти все ресурсы оставив только стандартные кредиты и добавив свои ссаные знания а пантеон бывший раньше вашей грозной опорой где надо было заниматься небольшим менеджментом:качать храмы качать последователей(при этом ресы ты по большому счёту добывал сам) выдавать им заданьки дабы они добывали то что ВАМ БЫЛО НУЖНО  распределять их по храмам в провинциях вибирать какие бонусы каждый адепт даёт а в сё в таком духе да блин была даже специальная божественная специализация заточенная чисто под улучшение этого самого культа и давала нехило так силы и возможностей(они даже эквип потом могли крафтить)при этом можно было даже в игру не заходить ибо все операции с культом легко проворачивались через сайт элинета а сменили мы всё это на обычный рандомайз слизанный у Fallout shelter когда ты просто тыкаеш кнопку "отправить в поход" и ждёш а потом ещё и ждёш когда они отдохнут при этом имея возмождность повесить а них 2 вещи для улучшения тсатов но при этом они всё равно либо нифига не несут либо несут мало и на данный момент просто являются фармилами веры(которую могут ещё и не принести между прочим)а остальное просто ВЫПИЛИЛИ!...как выпилил между прочим и сам элинет внутриигровой а тот что на сайте тупо стал личной страничкой на форуме ибо функционала тма теперь 0 4)финансовая революция ну ладно закрыли трансфер я бы понял и принял но теперь кредиты стали нужны только для апгрейда храма(или  как его там) прем сделали только за рубли наборы выходят постоянно не несут в себе нифига прикольного а с некоторого момента там стали барыжить эпическим шмотом с доп возможностями дабы pay to win акции стали платнымиа потом даже убрали ежедневный подарок в донатской валюте от количества последователей потом правда вернули но уже кредами 5)на комьюнити положили огромную болтяру ибо все обновы теперь и далее будут только злить и разжигать огни ненависти а когда разрабы выкладывают некие свои "дневники разработчика" то в них видно что арты и ранние наработки куда лучше чем в итоге то что выходит а сами разрабы порой ещё и тролят типо "ну мол мы знаем как вы ненавидите наши обновы но менять наш путь нетерпимости не собираемся хыыыы"
.....можно много ещё говорить о "Ссаной эре" но факт в одном мыло загубило очередной хороший прект даже не тем что провело реформы повсеместного доната  а просто удалив пол игры при этом теперь ещё пошли обновы которые этот контент в немножко изменённом виде возвращают выдавая за новый (взять хотя бы новое-старое открытие классов за какую то там дичь которую вроде даже переименовывать не стали или возврашение старых второстипенных статов на новые кольца или те же аномалки которые были тупо выпилены а сейчас введены обратно под видом общих ПВП зон(WTF???))И таким макаром доить контент старого скайфорджа на обновления для "Ссаной эры" будут ещё долго а фиксы и ребалансы делаемые разработчиком будто нарочно пытаются выгнять из агонизирующего проэкта ещё верных ему фанатов дабы и те не мучались.....ИГРА ШЛАК НЕ ИГРАЙТЕ НЕ КАЧАЙТЕ

Обновление 06.08.2020 ещё больше моего батхёрда в коментах.

author: {'steamid': '76561198088645772', 'num_games_owned': 195, 'num_reviews': 33, 'playtime_forever': 1832, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1705, 'last_played': 1611246708}
review:
Could be a decent game, too bad they fucked up the game with the caps at release. Played it for quite some time, endgame is basically this: Get carried for a month by high prestige players to get some upgrades, farm the same boring shitty quests in bastions to get some might for 8 hours a day. Unlocking classes is a pain in the ass as a new player, the best method is to queue 3v3 pvp so you can earn 250 sparks for each game. The cheapest classes cost 25k sparks, and the overpowered revenant costs 35k. I was sitting in 20-50 minute queues, only to play against players that were afk farming sparks. The PC version of the game is completely dead. If they fixed the progression system and the class unlocking in the game then I would recommend it, but until then its a waste of time, sorry.

Update as of 2018.11.12:

Game is still garbage, nothing changed.

author: {'steamid': '76561198138368819', 'num_games_owned': 64, 'num_reviews': 185, 'playtime_forever': 1571, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 681, 'last_played': 1538727621}
review:
Виртуальный мир - В настоящее время продолжается активная разработка Skyforge. Обзор начнем с того, что отметим: в проекте присутствует огромное число необычных решений, а также инноваций, которые позволяют в полной мере погрузиться в виртуальную реальность. 
Общие особенности - Первое что нас встречает в данном проекте – это необычная графика Skyforge. Обзор продолжим ее сравнением с аналогами. Следует отметить, что качество графики превосходит по аналогичному показателю такие проекты, как Guild Wars 2 и ArcheAge. Авторы игры вложили все силы в качество анимации персонажей и пейзажей. В проекте предусмотрена комната стиля: здесь можно выбрать головной убор, а также другую одежду для своего персонажа. Обзор игры Skyforge продолжим рассказом об «Элинете». Это уникальная система, которая позволяет получить практически мгновенный доступ к новостной ленте, игровому руководству, форуму и другим ресурсам. 
ИТОГ -
Играл в Skyforge на Майлру центре , игра мне нравилась залипал . Потом добавили класс Стрелок и начилось... В данный момент играть не рекомендую , сейчас идёт так называемая НОВАЯ ЭРА!!! Старая была интересней и лучше.Не называйте меня олдфагом , я докажу : Ранее для прокачки и получение Мл.Бога надо было пройти квесты , а что щас??? В чат пишешь проведите по провинциям , и какой нибудь 130престиж проводит тебя. После получения младшего бога и Миссий игра становится скучной.
4из10

author: {'steamid': '76561198108264751', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 2105, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1826, 'last_played': 1515365667}
review:
Un juego mmorpg diferente al resto , con unos gráficos muy buenos y una jugabilidad aún mejor , muchas clases para elegir
y aunque no sea completamente mundo abierto es un juego que no lo echas de menos y no se nota tanto , los mapas no dejan de ser grandes y están cuidados al detalle , al igual que las habilidades.
Muy recomendable en mi opinión para divertirte con una nueva experiencia en los mmorpg.

author: {'steamid': '76561198028556897', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 993, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 993, 'last_played': 1514710678}
review:
Oui... Oui... Mais non.
Très beaux graphismes pour un MMORPG, et les premières heures de jeu sont très fun et immersives car le background change de l'univers fantasy habituel.
Malheureusement, plus aucune difficulté à jouer seul au bout de quelques heures, le personnage devient invincible et farmer les instances devient alors fastidieux et vide de sens. Aucun loot digne de ce nom non plus. Bref, une déception...

author: {'steamid': '76561198025452874', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 8, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8, 'last_played': 1514923794}
review:
I'm only installing it on steam to advise against playing it.

It used to be a great game a few years back. World created by Obsidian, MMO experience provided by Allods team. A match made in heaven, it would seem.

I was in the beta, played avidly through first year up until the Ascension expansion. That's where a cool game suddenly became linear, dull and dumbed down to oblivion. No more strategising, prioritising quests/dungeons to expand character ect. Everything down to ONE trait. Unlocking classes got grindy and annoying. Your followers are a joke now, just click and wait and click and wait, no more picking and choosing who goes where. Not to mention there's half less of them than there used to be. My well trained combos? Yeah, well, half of the skills missing, dumbed down to one-button-mash with occasional right click. Ascension killed the game. MY.com killed the game. Plain and simple.

Spare yourself time. Go play something else.

author: {'steamid': '76561198032792782', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 8780, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7971, 'last_played': 1623827590}
review: I test a lot of f2p games.  And why not as it is no risk.  All in all I think this is one of the best.  Enough so that I actually bought the Revenant DLC.  On sale of course.  I’m one of those people who would never spend a lot of money on any kind of games at all no matter how good they might be. After all they are just games right?  But as I said this is one of the good ones.  My biggest hassle is the learning curve.  All of the guides on internet date from 2015.  The game has been largely redone and doesn’t work that way anymore making all the guides useless.  So after 100 hrs. I’m still a noob.  (I learn quickly but you have to explain a long time.)  And yes there is a lot of grind.  100 hrs. and still not close to having enough credits to unlock a new character and my power level is waaay too low to get invited to a group. So bear in mind that I know nothing about endgame or the problems of  lfg. But hey patience is a virtue right?  And I have none with those who want to get to endgame as quickly as possible and are frustrated because its too slow.  If you don’t like playing the basic game then go find something else to do.  Simple huh? So to sum up : Hurry and go for it while the DLC sale is still on.  (Or don’t hurry and take your time while waiting for the next one.) 10/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198129826491', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 1528, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1528, 'last_played': 1514442717}
review:
Vou Escrever um sintese de com o Jogo foi para mim:

-No começo do Jogo você é muito bem orientado, em como evoluir, poré no Mid-Game (após alguns "continentes"), você fica meio sem saber o que fazer "a mais" além daquele modo campanha, quando vai virar um Deus? pra que serve "knowledge" mesmo? Como faço essas Regiões em Grupo? (Não quero dar spoiler, mas simplesmente essas coisas vc vai aprender e conseguir entrando em uma Guilda). 

-O sistema de Group Finder simplesmente não funciona, já fiquei 10minutos esperando e nada de grupo de apenas 3 pessoas.

-Mecanica do Jogo é bem Fantastica, cheio de efeito e muito bem elaborada, no começo é bem facil, depois vai exigir um pouco mais de conhecimento e tecnica do seu personagem. 

-Regiões "abertas" se assemelham bastante com um MMORPG, e o jogo em si tem um pitada de FF XIV Online (Final Fantasy)

-Não é Pay to Win, podem confiar, a maioria das coisas que você consegue com "Diamantes" (Dinheiro Real) vocês conseguem com Credits "Dinheiro do jogo", resto é puramente Cosmestico , alé disso, eles dão Muitas coisas de graça e Premium por vários dias ( Premium só té mais dinheiro do jogo) , com os eventos, com as missões diarias, pra vocês terem um ideia, ganhei 1k de diamantes e nunca os usei, e to com 10 dias garantidos de premium, mas já to atolado de dinheiro que nem tem onde gastar. Unica coisa mesmo é ir achando um set legal pro seu personagem.

-End Game é Bem fraquinho isso tenho que admitir, eles "prometem" um mundo aberto para o EndGame, mas ainda não foi lançado. Sobrando apenas o PvP entre Guilds. Mas até lá você se diverte bastante matando Milhares de Monstros com combos e piruetas sensacioanais e Testando e Usando TODAS AS CLASSES DO JOGO. Isso é muito bom não ter que criar um novo personagem ou abandonar pra sempre sua antiga classe.

-Em Resumo Dou 8.8/10 porque podia ter mais coisas pra fazer no Mid-Game e um Mapa Aberta PvE no EndGame.

author: {'steamid': '76561198043330736', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 38614, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 36359, 'last_played': 1593957415}
review: Game is great for new players who want to discover and see a new kind of ''open world''/''mmo''. The bracets are there because it isnt really one, its more a instanced/ dungeon kinda game where you fight with other people or alone trough several missions. The part thats its good for only new players is because it gets so repetative in the end, you run the same dungeons over and over again. I give it a solid 5 out of 10. Fun for the beginning but dont go to the endgame.. it sucks.

author: {'steamid': '76561198451352992', 'num_games_owned': 128, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 876, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 876, 'last_played': 1513347038}
review:
Когда эта играла только-только вышла, то мы с мужем играли в неё чуть ли не сутками. Был интересный сюжет. Был атлас. Часть локаций была общих, часть - только для командной игры. Всё было довольно гармонично и очень неплохо. 
А сейчас...атлас убрали. Часть локаций превратили из общих в одиночные. Часть бывших командных теперь можно самому пройти. Сюжет вообще отдельно идёт. То есть, либо просто качайся по провинциям, либо в сюжетку. Во вторжениях теперь непонятно как участвовать, хотя раньше это было даже обязательно. 
Одним словом - одна сплошная боль. Печально, что хорошая игра превратилась в такую посредственность. 
Разочаровалась в этой игре.

review:
Game errors out on start up and I've tried debugging / repairing it via client but that didn't make any change.
 I wasn't gonna bother reviewing but I feel like I should report that the game is unfortunately not working, 
which is a great shame because it looked cool and the lore seemed interesting.


Edit (2020/07/21); 
So once again, I tried to play this game. 
And once again, biggest hardcore boss of this game, is the actual game and the 3rd party client (MyGameCenter) itself.
It errors out, repairing it does nothing and I am still unable to play this game.
Well, I guess this will be my second report that the game still unfortunately not working.
developer_response:
Sorry to hear about this issue, can we please request that you contact our support team providing as much detail as possible so we can investigate further. https://support.my.games/sf_int

Thanks

author: {'steamid': '76561198044167825', 'num_games_owned': 178, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 77, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 77, 'last_played': 1513367697}
review:
Start playing this game on the OBT(russian) and there was something unique: classes was not the limit but "combat stance of the player" - you are not bound to one class and when you wanna be dd or healer or buffer there is nothing to stops you. But most interesting was the ATLAS - one of the favorite type of class development! that was uniqe to mmorpg cuz beffore only few single player games like FF or Rouge Galaxy was brave enough to implement such feature. That was a boom! But there was a big disappointments to - a lot of PayToWin options wich is plague of most freetoplay projects. But that was normal... Kind a....
But wright now there is nothing unique or special about that game: Atlas is totally cutted out, you still can switch beetwen classes at any time but now they are opens to you in strict order, cult feature cutted too(no point to provide more details - you will never to see it again), and there is no more "open world of people in pain that need your help" like it shows in trailer - every step of you is tottaly controlled by game from one hallway to another!
Everything that awaits for you in this game is 1-3 hours of lonely journey beffore deleting this game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198005907572', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 45, 'playtime_forever': 851, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 780, 'last_played': 1546873514}
review:
เล่นจากสตีมไม่สามารถเปลี่ยนไอดีได้ หรือถ้าใครไปโหลดเกมจากเว็บตรงจะไม่สามารถใช้ ID ร่วมกันได้ต้องเล่นใหม่อย่างเดียว 
ข้อดี มีระบบสร้างตัวละครดูดีมีรายละเอียด กับชุดเท่ๆสวยๆที่หาใส่ได้ไม่ยาก

ข้อเสีย 1. ระบบคลาสอาชีพไม่ค่อยดีไม่สมดุล บางอาชีพเล่นง่ายเก่งเร็ว บางอาชีพก็ไม่รู้จะมีมาทำไม 
          2. ระบบภายในเกมที่เยอะมากจนงง ต้องทำความเข้าใจพอสมควร
          3. ถ้าอยากได้ภาพสวยๆ ต้องใช้เครื่องคอมที่มีประสิทธิภาพ หรือแรงพอสมควร

author: {'steamid': '76561198134749106', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 708, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 575, 'last_played': 1575552470}

author: {'steamid': '76561198008532686', 'num_games_owned': 851, 'num_reviews': 93, 'playtime_forever': 469, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 469, 'last_played': 1492878698}
review:
I would have recommended this game back when I first played it... But now? Nope, and here are my reasons why.
1. If you want to progress really easily early on, just play the free class given to steam players (the Outlaw) It's the easiest early game class to play and gets boring really fast.
2. Cryomancer is just the best DPS mid-late game.
3. Eng Game content is lacking and boring.
4. Extreme pay to win (or pay to progress) elements.
5. Although yes the acting is mediocre that wouldn't push me away from a game.
6. The grind to get anything is pretty misleading, you'll think oh I only need like 10k credits to buy this class, NOPE its 15k instead.
7. You can no longer demo classes in the training area which is dumb.
8. Unable to transfer my character and my money and stuff to steam, original accounts are separate so yes we don't get the Outlaw class for free like steam users do.
9. Becoming a god really isn't all it's cracked up to be and just basically means you either look like a fancy person or a fancy robot who hits harder. (although I think the robot skin is awesome)
-
Overall when this game came out it was a lot of fun, but now that it's had some time to 'bake' it's been ruined.
They left it in the oven too long.

author: {'steamid': '76561198039156445', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 14875, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 14195, 'last_played': 1544160818}
review:
El juego en un primer momento te estimula con muchos tipos de clases, con Raids y las Operaciones, tambien con los bosses de los mapas para dar un ejemplo Kairax el boss que se encuentra en el mapa abierto Thea. El hecho de que tu personaje pueda tener todas las clases tambien lo hace bueno aunque solo puedas tener un solo personaje ligado a una cuenta (Sabran ustedes si eso es positivo o negativo, eso es a gusto del que juega) Por otra parte si hablamos de la comunidad es una bastante sana y amigable he recibido mucha ayuda desde que empeze el juego en ese aspecto no me puedo quejar, otra cosa destacable es la jugabilidad no es muy elevada a la hora de utilizar las clases pero lo compensa siendo dinamico a la larga se siente como si todas las clases fueran un tanto iguales

Pero a medida que vas jugandolo y acabas el mapa la verdad se torna repetitivo, soy una persona que disfruta de farmear objetos y equipamientos en los MMO pero no me agrada el hecho de tener que ir muchas veces al mismo mapa para conseguir completar misiones y cuando digo muchas de verdad son demasiadas, ademas a la hora de buscar gente para hacer las misiones se torna pesado. Antiguamente el juego contaba con una opcion de busqueda global pero en un parche la jodieron y ya nadie lo utiliza.

Ademas de esos algunas clases estan bugeadas, vease el Monk que al cambiar de elemento no deja autoatacar, o el Outlaw con su ulti que al usarla no se acciona solo queda en enfriamiento como si ya lo hubieras usado, tambien desde mi punto de vista el juego perdio algo de esencia en cuanto a diversidad de uso en las clases, todos usan al Revenant.

Otra cosa buena y llamativa que tenia el juego era el PvP que ahora ya casi ni existe en todo el tiempo que he jugado puedo contar con los dedos de una sola mano las veces que he hecho PvP y no porque no me guste sino porque ya nadie lo hace, a decir verdad todos se saltan las misiones PvP con estimulantes (Un item para saltar misiones y acelerar la carrera en los eventos) 

En cuanto a apartado grafico el juego tiene buenos paisajes y buena definicion de mapas, si hablamos de FPS tambien se defiende no he tenido problema alguno con las caidas de frames solo algun tiron pero nada grave.


En resumen:
En si tenia mecanicas interesantes aunque las destruyeron con el pasar de los parches, esto no quiere decir que este acabado ni mucho menos si toman buenas decisiones pueden levantar el juego agregar nuevas mecanicas mejores que las anteriores.

¿Lo recomiendo?, en parte si porque siempre fui partidario de primero probar un juego para poder sacar lo malo y lo bueno que tiene para ofrecer pero exceptuando eso lo cierto es que no como esta actualmente, carece de diversion alguna despues de completar el Mapa y conseguir las clases los eventos solo son un hype temporario y luego el juego se devuelve a lo mismo, el juego esta estancado, pero puede salvarse (Es por eso que le voy a dar una oportunidad y voy a recomendarlo).

author: {'steamid': '76561198019103636', 'num_games_owned': 325, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 27708, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5852, 'last_played': 1640521567}
review:
Cons:
 * F2P MMO, so yea, it's a thing.
 * Game scripting, well, I've seen worse, but that does Not make it good.
 * Very, very, VERY grindy to do certain things. (Like unlock more classes, grrrrrrr..)
 * Non-combat animations, character possession clipping, and outfits are clunky/detract from the game's visuals.
 * DLC are bloody crazy-expensive for what they are, unless on sale of course.
 * Classes have a very small range of skills to use. (Small enough the only choosing is what key they are bound to.)

Pros:
 * The world-graphics and combat animations are breathtakingly beautiful.
 * The class and level system is fresh and different, and there is actually a variety of mechanisms to increase the power level of your character, which you only need one of, ever, to enjoy the wide range of activities possible.
 * The free Steam DLC is a great starter pack to get you going, and the Outlaw/Gunslinger class is a /lot/ of fun.
 * The (optional) storylines, after the intro trash of course, is actually pretty decent and well written. Have yet to see any typoes or improper grammer that tend to plague most F2P MMOs as well.
 * The pathfinding is crazy-good, I was actually seriously impressed by it. (Look at a quest objective so there is a lil popup thingie, hit your action button, and you will run to it via the shortest path without ever getting hung up on anything.)
 * There is a wide variety of interesting game mechanics to discover, from having a city map that you can pull up and upgrade buildings to make tyou more powerful, to random limited-use weapons from a selection of types with appearances and animations particular to the mob that dropped it, and yea, LOTS of other stuffu too.

Murder Immortals:
 * Yup, I'm an immortal in training to be a goddess. How do I train you ask? Well, first I kill things, then I save people by killing things, then I recruit followers (hey, I have over one-thosand thus far!) by killing things, then I go collect herbs for some guy's healing potion by killing plant things, then I do community service by going to the beach to clean it up by killing eggs AND killing the things that leap out of the crushed eggs attempting to claw my face off, then I go to a secret research facility to supervise an experiment and kill the things that come out of the gaping hole in reality when things go wrong, then go for a stroll through a beautiful and serene to relax and kill starved/ravaging/infected/agitated/cautious possibly-rabbie-slobbering natural widlife. And hey, I am REALLY good at killing things, so it works! And a lot of fun too, no puzzles, no over-thinking, just plain simple go kill things in an amazing number of ways.

Edit:
 * So as to be perfectly clear, in my personal opinion this game is in no way Pay To Win. All of the cash items are either cosmetic or purely convienence, there is nothing you can get with cash that you are unable to get without, with the exception of garments which have no stats attached to them. In addition, only a small ammount of the in-game currencies are available for cash, and are available in ample supply simply by playing the game. Finally, you also receive the "cash currency" in small ammounts simply by playing.

author: {'steamid': '76561197987604579', 'num_games_owned': 245, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 2071, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2071, 'last_played': 1511635094}
review:
Ein Grundsätzlich gutes Spiel das aber aufgrund seiner enormen unzugänglichkeit nicht zu empfehlen ist.
Damit ist nicht gemeint es wäre schwierig, im Gegenteil es ist sogar sehr einfach aber ab einem gewisen Punkt im Spiel kann man nur weiterspielen indem man sich Gruppen sucht die es nicht gibt da Spieler alles Solo machen (Da einfacher wenn man das Level hat)und man nichtmal genug Punkte erreicht mit dem klassischen Progress durch den Solo Content um sich auch nur eine einzige andere Klasse zu erspielen.

Ein weiterer Negativer Punkt ist die enorme unübersichtlichkeit. Man bekommt nicht wirklich mitgeteilt woher man wann und wie welche der unzähligen Währungen bekommt um Verbesserungen freizuschalten, selbst die Punkte die man benötigt für die Göttliche Gestalt, erfährt man nicht woher sie kommen. Es gibt nur den Tutorial hinweis dass die Gestalt einen Preis hat und man aufpassen soll aber das war es.

In meinen Augen macht sich SKyforge du rch viele Design Entscheidungen selbst unattraktiv obwohl es ein rundes und schön anzusehendes Spiel ist.
