author: {'steamid': '76561198218313599', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 3840, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3840, 'last_played': 1511824882}
review:
Es un buen juego sinceramente. Me tiene bastante enviciado, tiene mecánicas de un MMO pero sin llegar a serlo, tiene clases muuuy buenas, la historia es bastante buena, la jugabilidad es excelente, la música está bastante bien, para ser F2P tiene la calidad de un B2P. Si vas a comprar alguno de los packs te doy una advertencia... Los únicos que valen la pena son: El que te da 60 días premium, los 30,000 Argents y los 500,000 créditos, que ojo, los créditos sirven para poco más que mejorar tu inventario y donar a tu Panteón para subirlo de nivel, la moneda del juego son los Argents que de por si te dan una buena cantidad haciendo eventos y subiendo de prestigio. Otro pack que vale la pena es el que te da todas las clases, porque de por si es una de las cosas más complicadas del juego, ya que cada clase cuesta entre 15,000 y 35,000 sparks de transmutación, que te tardas bastante en farmear. Los demás packs sinceramente no valen la pena ya que son skins y poco más, sin mencionar que los que te dan 2,000 knowledge no valen la pena porque consigues 10,000 o más cada 5 mapas que avanzas(si es que lo haces bien). Punto negativo a resaltar... cambiaron el sistema de habilidades que había antes... antes tenías que tirarte HORAS leveleando una clase para desbloquear partes de su rama de skills y podías tardarte meses en completar una clase, ahora es tan fácil como ir a cualquier mapa y matar todos los mobs(bichos) que veas y te va subiendo automáticamente las habilidades, eso era lo que le daba cierta dificultad y lo hacía más disfrutable, pero ojo, no me malentiendas, aún sin esto el juego se puede disfrutar y bastante. Otro punto negativo es que el juego sólo está en inglés, francés y alemán, ni si quiera en portugués y casi no hay(por no decir que no existen) panteones hispanoblantes. Así que generalmente te la pasarás en panteones de habla inglesa. A pesar de estos puntos negativos recalco el hecho de que el juego se puede disfrutar y es entretenido, cuando te quedas sin nada que hacer le puedes hechar unos minutos a este juego para pasar el rato que no te vas a lamentar. 

Puntuación general personal: 8,6/9.0

author: {'steamid': '76561198133986116', 'num_games_owned': 257, 'num_reviews': 32, 'playtime_forever': 43782, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 32487, 'last_played': 1618726139}
review:
No início não parecia bom, a dificuldade do jogo é grande, nem toda missão você conseguirá fazer sozinho, este é o ponto forte deste jogo.

O jogo é muito gostoso de jogar e existem bastante desafios, o principal deles é se tornar um deus e posterior um deus ancião, enfrentando missões mais difíceis ainda e só poderão completadas com a ajuda de outros jogadores e que trabalharem em equipe.

Recomendo e boa jogatina.

author: {'steamid': '76561198273869950', 'num_games_owned': 91, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 2213, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 180, 'last_played': 1604054541}
review:
Que dire de Skyforge?
Un jeu qui arrive à mélanger une ambiance futuriste et heroic fantasy à la fois. MAIS C'EST GENIAL!!!
Nan sérieux allez le tester sans réflechir si vous kiffer les vaisseaux spatiaux, les bourrins de berserkers et les MMORPG!
Je joue a ce jeu depuis longtemps et j'ai arrêté pendant environ 6 mois (je sais c'est beaucoup mais bon...) et je viens de le reprendre de 0 pour kiffer et apprendre à mon pote qui est nouveau dans le monde du MEUPORG et là je comprend pas tout à changé et même le début xD. Je retrouve les physiques du jeu mais je n'ai plus l'impression de jouer au même c'et fou non?
EN BREF: Tu aimes la Sf et le seigneurs des anneaux, prend-le! et va kiffer.

PS: IL EST LOIN D'ETRE UN PAY2WIN juste quelques fontionnalités différentes mais à part ça tout est jouable gratuitement ^^

author: {'steamid': '76561198126546158', 'num_games_owned': 319, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 183, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 183, 'last_played': 1511189386}
review: So yeah i download the game, its free it looks cool hype is at the top, and then i realise that My com has to download some other things in there as well so i waited for that as well. Next thay i open up the game tried to adjust my gamma settings and guess what? Couldn't do anything about it (it automaticly wants you to adjust gamma settings.) Then i realised that i cant click next down there as well. So i started spamming everything like enter, space, escape nothing happens. I tried to close the game no option for that so i alt + f4'd. Then i started to search for solutions which lead me to "verify and fix the game files" option in the interface. Clicked that it took like 10 mins nothing much then i try the game again. And the same thing happened. So i found other 2 solutions since that didn't work. Both of the solutions are old and not usable so i deleted the game and redownloading it rn. Idk if it works or not but this is a big issue and they havent even have an original solution released. Many people has this problem.

author: {'steamid': '76561198148189976', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 778, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 778, 'last_played': 1511058751}
review:
Perdida de tiempo, lo juge hace años, cuando la dianmica y el juego tenia otra forma y en ese entonces me termino aburriendo, costaba mucho alcanzar las clases.
Luego de desinstalarlo y volverlo a instalar este año me di cuenta que cambio la jugabilidad, el contenido y mapas era el mismo pero hubo un cambio en la obtencion de las clases, que dentro de todo es un avanze enorme.
no obstante, la dificultad aumento, mas si jugas solo, no lo recomiendo.
la verdad una perdida de tiempo.

author: {'steamid': '76561198069705220', 'num_games_owned': 1525, 'num_reviews': 230, 'playtime_forever': 22856, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 20316, 'last_played': 1577162813}
review:
Skyforge, me voila avec maintenant plus de 300h de jeux sur ce jeux.

Comme j'édite ma première évaluation qui était plutôt positive, je vais maintenant donner quelque précision.

Skyforge est graphiquement bien. 
Son gameplay est merveilleux j'adore vraiment le revenant.

Le Système de leveling est sans fin. Même après 300h je ne suis toujours pas maxé.
Je suis asser fort, ca oui. Mes je suis encore très loin du end game pur et dur.

Je trouve ca dommage car c'est un jeux qui peux avoir un potentiel énorme !

Mes la c'est clairement sois tu paye, sois tu sacrifie ta vie.

Skyforge n'est pas un mauvais jeux. Si vous chercher un jeux pour taper sur des mobs pour le plaisirs, aller-y il est gratuit finalement.

Mes si vous penser un jours atteindre le '' End Game'' passer votre chemin. Vous pouvez tellement trouver mieux.

allez sur Tera ou encore BDO c'est plus mieux pour le prix.

author: {'steamid': '76561198063592473', 'num_games_owned': 544, 'num_reviews': 77, 'playtime_forever': 4532, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3740, 'last_played': 1596665410}
review:
This game is great, one of the best target/action mmos there is. Gameplay is spettacular, the graphics are outstanding, great art direction, lots of content to do, 3-man, 5-man, 10-man dungeons are very good, interesting and with fun mechanics. 

Now the bad part:

The grind is real, you need to grind a lot, and as you go up the grind intensifies.
So many broken and unbalanced things, like: skills and symbols, god form, talents in a bunch of different skill trees.
PvP is unbalanced and not focus on competitive play.
The game is dead, there is absolut no WAY for you to FIND anyone in any tipe of dungeon or pvp finder. If you playing with 5-more friends then you are fine, but if you don't, you need to spam in the general chat all the time to do group things, or try to do with your guild mates.

I would recommend this game to anyone that likes to grind, love mmos and fast paced, well designed gameplay.

review: This is very fun and addicting. i love the way the class system works too. i feel like the game could do better at transitionning players from beginner to veteran. after a certain point when you have to raly on groups i feel like i don't really know what to do but other than that the game is very good and well done. amazing graphics too, if your computer can handle it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198335085571', 'num_games_owned': 62, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 9918, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7800, 'last_played': 1581850976}
review: Very nice game. Recommended for any player. I’ve played over 100 hrs and every single one of those hours were very fun. The graphics aren’t bad, animations and visual aspects are good. The community is not toxic at all, and there is always someone who is willing to help. As for the gameplay, it’s not super difficult to become better but it’s not that easy either. However, once you do reach higher ranks and levels, it’s extremely satisfying and rewarding. It isn’t unfair and you don’t have to waste as much time as other MMOs. Definitely recommended.

author: {'steamid': '76561198008617438', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 39, 'playtime_forever': 1019, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 933, 'last_played': 1574389882}
review:
1st thing, I played this game way before the "Streamline" patch and enjoyed it, i liked the grid system they had in place, i liked being able to see my statue in the Hall of greatness.... that is now gone for this system with the new systems that game is still fun, but no longer feels lived in or alive like it did before, everything is just numbers now. the game is still fun, but now its just that, and what was unique in the leveling sysetem is gone, granted somethings need to change, Like for the grid i would have removed the 3 type of sparks and use a more smiple one, or lower the cast of each node, i was at the point it was 450 sparks.... the class grid was perfect, keep me in the class along enogh for me to learn it

That being said i dont hate the New system, i just like the old one much better

author: {'steamid': '76561198045043149', 'num_games_owned': 115, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 4773, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4773, 'last_played': 1523486116}
review:
This game has very poor endgame and becomes pay2win very quickly with crawling progression. The balance is also poor. The game is either near impossible or wickedly easy. It's disappointing because the story is a very interesting concept and the combat is fun when it's in the sweet spot of challenge. 

Original Review: Reviews seem pretty unfavorable but I have been pleasantly surprised by this game. Good quality, lots of variety in classes. I wish classes were easier to unlock or that they gave you a free unlock for your second class but not bad. F2P seems pretty fair so far, though I am early. Not sure how long I'll last but I'm definitely enjoying it now.

author: {'steamid': '76561198093684079', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 21085, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5961, 'last_played': 1608686711}
review:
Předem chci řičí, že se nemohu porovnávat s hráči, kteří zde mají nahráno 2000 hodin a podobně...
Hra vás zanese do světa jménem Aelion, kde zuří bitvy o nadvládu nad tímto světem a hrozbou je několik „mimozemských druhů“. Rychle zjistíte že jste jeden z málo vyvolených, kteří jsou nesmrtelní. Jako nesmrtelný máte možnost se stát dokonce i bohem, pokud Vaše skutky budou natolik hrdinské až božské že ve vás lidé začnou věřit a budete mít své uctívače, protože z nich čerpáte jakožto nesmrtelná bytost sílu (s tímto nápadem se můžeme sekat už v několik filmech jako novy souboj titánů nebo v knihách od Pratcheta) Story line Q vás provedou postupně takřka celým světem a ukážou co to znamená být bohem na Aelionu…. To by k lore v kostce stačilo…

Na začátku hry mate k dispozici spelly od classy paladin, ale následně si můžete vybrat jinou, na začátku je odemčen jen Paladin, Crymancer a Lightbinder… během hry si můžete odemknout další classy, ale k tomu se ještě dostanu.

Questy byly fajn a opravdu mě to zatáhlo do děje a dost jsem to hltal, bohužel po dvou až třech dnech jsem dohrál všechny story line Q + něco jako vedlejší Q čím zde jsou region a zjistil jsem že aktuálně jediné co je moje práce je vylepšovat si prestigue level, který nemá omezení a to tak že těch několik lokací, které jsem už i tak byl třeba 3x musím chodit stále dokola abych si vylepšoval Bastions a Laboratory lvl…. Takže mě hra dost rychle omrzela, jelikož její end game content je prostě dost slabí….
 Komunita jako taková není špatná, ale připadal jsem si jak na WoW serveru s menší populací, jelikož každý se zná se všema….
Hra je Free to Play, ale pokud chcete mít rychlejší postup a nějaké další výhody musíte zaplatit, není to mnoho. Řekl bych že investice do této hry jednorázově se vyplatí, jelikož váš postup bude rychlejší a zpříjemní to celkové Questění v této hře… Bohužel bych hru přirovnal k Diablu s lepší grafikou, ale jen k její demoverzi, jelikož příběh byl dobrý ale velice velice krátký…. Údajně se můžete dostat k dalším jeho útržkům, ale až se dostanete na poměrně vysoký level… Takže pokud nebudete hru tryhardit…. Tak se k dalšímu kusu lore dostanete třeba za měsíc až dva … docela nic moc…
Combat systém bych řekl že je velice lehký a snadno pochopitelný PvE v této hře je ulehčeno i tím že se objevují nápovědy po čas fightu s bossem…
Další classy si odemknete po dokončení provincií/regionů... takže jak jsem řekl dělaté ty samé lokace i 3x jelikož vas sem již pošle Quest z lore chainu.. další classy si odemknete prostřednictvím specialního platidla...dle toho co jsem se o hře našel se to behem roku asi 3x předělalo.. takže kdo ví jak to bude za měsíc či dva...
Nejsem moc fanda teto možnosti switchování class... i když mohu říci že zde to není zlé, ale je to jen drobné plus..

Není tu tlačítku neutrál, ale bohužel hru spíše nedoporučuji… je to tak že když nevíte co, zahrajete si fajn story jako v nějaké single player game, jelikož vždy když plníte Q jste ve svojí instanci (sami)😉

author: {'steamid': '76561197981677807', 'num_games_owned': 127, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 48, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 48, 'last_played': 1510069587}

author: {'steamid': '76561198037684212', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 2322, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1190, 'last_played': 1510897678}

author: {'steamid': '76561198250044460', 'num_games_owned': 132, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 21964, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 21881, 'last_played': 1523506092}
review:
I personally found this fun for the first 365.2 hours, but afterwards it got rather boring. I absolutely hate the fact that you can get the highest tier generation, but have to still get 3 or more prestige levels in order to even get the gear! I feel as if once you get to the highest generation out and do Hero mode missions, you should be able to immediately receive the gear. 

Also, I feel as if pantheon wars is rather unfair last I checked due to PTW, or just hardcore players, being able to use their fancy battle mounts. This provides one side, I feel, a really unfair advantage due to the tankiness of the battle mounts. This creates a rather unpleasant battlefield especially if one is fighting for glory and the right to use the Pantheon war rewards.

For the first few generations it is fun and pretty easy, but once you start reaching higher tiers, it becomes a grind like no other. I personally have nothing against grinding in MMORPGs since that is what I mainly play; however, I feel as if the grind in this game is rather unpleasant and rather unmotivating once one gets into the higher generations. Also, PVP in this game could use a serious rework in general.

author: {'steamid': '76561198022393736', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 1152, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1141, 'last_played': 1540962497}

When a payment finally went through they took the money out of my account and gave me nothing in game. I only have 1 account on NA so its not a wrong server mistake as I triple checked everything. As of writing this they still have not refunded me or even addressed the issue of them stealing money from my account.

**UPDATE** they keep taking money out of my account and their CS department says "Sorry nothing we can do" So this company is a thief. BEWARE spending anything with them or giving them any info

author: {'steamid': '76561198125872012', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 577, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 70, 'last_played': 1524174446}
review:

author: {'steamid': '76561198339514312', 'num_games_owned': 317, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 6614, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1844, 'last_played': 1521897151}
review:
Решил установить, поиграть и очень рад! Игра интересная и красивая, конечно не единственный проект подобного рода, но очень успешный.
Хорошая оптимизация, атмосфера и возможности кастомизации!
Очень понравилось проходить соло, мультиплеер хорош для рейдов, но целиком возлагать на него составляющую игры не стоит. 
Пока не взаимодействовал с другими игроками, не узнал как создать пати, просто брал задания, отправлялся в локации и проходил, и очень даже доволен =^-^=

+Не надо создавать много разных персов, вы можете овладеть всеми классами одним и переключать их.
Понятно что фактически это ммо, но похоже больше на хорошие кооперативные игры, где ты можешь пройти что-то в одиночку а что-то в команде)

Не понимаю негатива, есть донат игры и похуже, здесь не ощущается того что донат портит игру. 
[Не надо завидовать донатерам, они быстро получают всё -и наступает пустота и скука, остается только пвп.]
Всё что мне нужно -это хороший геймплей, оптимизация, и кастомизация.
Хорошо также что игра в стим, так как мэйл.ру фогеймы и прочие унылые коммерческие платформы бесят просто самим фактом своего существования, из-за чего не играл в некоторые игры работающие с ними.

Все лишнее от старых ммо как гринд, торговля шмотом на донате и фарм бесполезного дерьма забивающего инвентарь надо уже забыть как страшный сон.
Пора покончить с теми ммо где "собери по 10 того да убей этого 100 раз, прокачайся потратив месяцы а может и годы а потом бегай по пустым картам заброшенной игры, фарм, гринд тот же донат (можнт быть) и трата времени...

Если вам не нравится эта игра то вам надо вернуться в прошое и поиграть в какой нибудь убитый клон вов с говеной графикой, багами, по настоящему злоебучим донатом, где вы даже шмот перекрасить не сможете без него...

Если всё же вам хочется чего-то более традиционного и хорошего то обратите внимание на ESO (The Elder Scrolls Online) там лор и большая вселенная игры создавались поколениями сингловых частей.

author: {'steamid': '76561198066102827', 'num_games_owned': 260, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 5084, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3109, 'last_played': 1619729787}
review:
Exellent jeu mais répétif.

-Pay2Win ? = NON
-Abonnement ? = Oui pour des bonus mes absoluments pas obligatoire  et a 9.99 euro / 10$ usd pour supporter un jeu ca tuera pas personne (sinon appeler un healer :D )
- Max level ? = plus ou moin 160
- High HP / DPS ? = LOL vous pourrez monter jusqua + de 80 Billions D'HP
- Friendly / Causual = Yup
- Le jeu est mort ? = Non , 80-90% des joueurs ne sont pas par steam.
- Costume ? = Oué , y'en n'a des tonnes.
-Cadeau ? = Plusieurs events peuve vous permettre d'avoir toute sorte de chose GRATUITEMENT et facilement.
----------
Note : Les serveurs Américain et Europe sont indépendant. incluants l'achats d'items (real money)
----------

N'arretez pas après 1h ou 2h d'essais sur ce jeux, vous devrez investir quelques heures pour bien tester .

author: {'steamid': '76561198213890632', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 1325, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 240, 'last_played': 1554150706}
review:
Игра интересая и для тех, кто не играл в нее со времен начала ОБТ, она кажется невероятно инновационной. Но я скажу просто. раньше было лучше. Раньше в этой игре была такая восхитиельная вещь, как атлас (подобное есть в игре path of exile)). В атласе можно было прокачивать своего героя как угодно, делать упор на любой важный аспект и по сути, дизбаланса не было, так как возможность прокачать тот или иной перк была у всех. сейчас же ее похерили. Атлас убрали. Сейчас разрабы в поиске новых игроков, которые придут на место старых, тех, кого привлекла нестандартная система прокачки, пилят новые классы. И вроде бы делают это неплохо. но есть много но.  И главное из этого - донат. Понимаю, донат был и раньше, но раньше так же можно было купить аргенты за кредиты, чего сейчас нельзя. К тому же, игроки раньше действительно долго играли и закрывали классы, что сейчас сделать проще простого, я, к примеру, прокачал палладина до максимума с нуля за час игры.
Как итог, хочу отметить, что игра неплохая, они красивая, интересная, там много разнообразных механник, но это уже не тот Skyforge, который полюбил я и огромное количество фанатов. Эпоха прошла и я могу лишь надеяться, что она однажды вернется. Игру бы я рекомендовать не стал, потому что она скатилась. из хорошей игры в один момент убрали все хорошее.

author: {'steamid': '76561198322709726', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 102, 'playtime_forever': 26836, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 16343, 'last_played': 1587492084}
review: La dernière mise à jour (New horizons) a copieusement saccagé le plaisir de jeu. Graphiquement le jeu est toujours soigné, pas de plantages lié à un code mal optimisé mais des désagréments comme le fait de rester coincé dans le décor (la nouvelle planète est particulièrement sensible à ce problème), un nouvel arbre de talents qui dispersent vos anciens talents divins et vous oblige à refarmer des fragments pour revenir à votre niveau précédents.

author: {'steamid': '76561198306526174', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 19320, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 18153, 'last_played': 1519307219}
review:
[h1]--[/h1]
Başlıca bunu diyeyim, Oyunda Tekrarlama var, Ekipmanının bir üstü, veya herhangi bir etkinlik için tekrar ediyorsunuz zindanları Bunu bilmiş olun :)
[h1]--[/h1]Bu zamana kadar mmorpg oyunu oynadım ,
    İsmini zikredemeyeceğim kadar, ilk defa bu tarz bir  mmorpg oyuna denk geldim,

[h1]--[/h1]Öncelikle Karakterinizi oluştururken dikkatle oluşturun, gerçi oyunda 1 değiştirme hakkınız bulunuyor 
   yinede dikkatle oluşturun,
  (Çünkü ben paldır küldür isim oluşturdum, pişmandım fakat sonunda değiştirebildim. (: )

[h1]--[/h1]Oyuna girdiğinizde 3 sınıf ile başlıyorsunuz, ve oyunun size ücretsiz olarak sunduğu, Dlc paketindeki
   Outlaw - Silahşör sınıfı ile birlikte 4 sınıf ile başlıyorsunuz, 3 günlük premium ile birlikte, 
    Paladin, Cyromancer, Ligtbinder, ve outlaw-

[h1]--[/h1]Öyle Büyücü acayım kasayım, yok efenime söyliyim savaşcı acayım kasayım, ona item buna item 
   derdi yok,  sadece sınıfların silahi için arayışa girersiniz, diğer itemler için çaba sarfetmeniz gerekiyor
   farklı sınıflar mevcut ve oyunda istediğiniz sınıfa geçiş yapabilirsiniz tek tıkla :) tabi istisnai durumlar 
   olabiliyor bazı haritalarda, ve atack halinde iken değiştiremiyebiliyorsunuz
   Size sadece istediğiniz sınıfın skillerini geliştirmek kalıyor, herhangi bir sınıfın skilleri değiştirirken,
   Alan skili gelince  ''R'' skili 1 zırh veriliyor v sınıfın skil quest bittikten sonra 1 zırh daha veriliyor, 
  + o Sınıfın Başarımını kazanıyorsunuz.

[h1]--[/h1]Oyun ingilizce fakat, başlarken çorba gibi gelebilir size, fakat oynamak isterseniz  engel değil 
   ingilizce olması emin olun. eğer başlıyorsanız bana ulaşın, bilgili arkadaşlar ile oynuyoruz,
   bende cahilim şuanlık :)

[h1]--[/h1]Bunu yazmasam olmaz dı :) Oyunda enterasan birşey var, herif Nerelerden atlıyor ölmüyorda suya 
   girince ölüyor  :)
[h1]--[/h1] Oyuna başladığınızda  binek vermekte, belirli bir süre sonra bineğin süresi doluyor, ve
               Skyforge'nin koca haritasinda yürümek zorunda kaliyorsunuz, Bu  kötü :)
               Size verilen çoğu binekler süreli oluyor,
               normal kullanılabilen bir binek yok maalesef, elmas ile satın alınması gerekiyor :)

[h1]--[/h1]Solo olarak yada grup halinde görevlerini yapabilirsiniz,ki bazı bölümler var gerçekten zor  tek yapılmaz, Grup yada sağlam bir arkadaşınız olmalı.
[h1]--[/h1]Grup Veya Solo
 Öncelikle, Solo yapabildiğiniz, sadece, sizin seviyenize uygun,  zindanlar mevcut, oyun için, Bastion, yani, sizin, pasif, becerileriniz  ve bazıları aktif olarak gerçekleşebilen becerilerinizin, geliştirdiğiniz zindanlara girebilirsiniz, solo olarak, Ki  bazen 158 seviye üstü gelmekte, 
Grup olarak yapabileceğiniz, bir çok görev mevcut ki,  yapamıyorsunuz, herifler gruba almamakta, Bizim türk vatandaşlarımı katmıyorum bile, onlar - lerde, yardım sıfır,
itemlerinizin bir üst seviyeye geliştirmek isterseniz sizden karakterinizin saglam olması istenir, Gavatlar,+130, +158 üstü arıyorlar, Sanki oyuna başlarken 130 level ile başlıyoruz ,Anlıyacağınız, İşiniz yaş, ben oynarım dersen gel, yoksa gelme kardeşş :)

[h1]--[/h1]Kıyafetler  müthiş gerçekten umduğumdan iyi çıktı, zaten oyun içindeki etkileşimlere diyecek birşey 
   yok :))
[h1]--[/h1]  Bazen canınız o kadar sıkılır ki, aynı zindanı 2.  kez gördüğünüzde, Lan gene mi aynı yer ya , 
   dersiniz, 
   Bol bol, aynı zindanlara gire çıka, artık ezberlersiniz, o zindanın neresinde hangi sınıf ile oynuyacağınızı,
   1 zindanda 3 sınıf değiştirip zindan bitiriyor insan belkide daha fazladır bilemem, ben 3 yaptım en son :) 
[h1]--[/h1]Açıkcası, bi indirin, başlayın derim, user sayısı sanıldığından fazla değil 
 türk oyuncu ise, sanırım 20  veya daha az, daha çok
 
 ya yok, denemekte fayda var .
[h1]--[/h1]ilerledikçe yazarım,

author: {'steamid': '76561198037862594', 'num_games_owned': 119, 'num_reviews': 59, 'playtime_forever': 3234, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2707, 'last_played': 1626189717}
review:
How does one start, and where do I begin...Well...Lets try the more honed points.

Skyforge is an ARPMMOG (Action Role Playing Massively Multiplayer Online Game) It features relavent playstyles to that of a cross between TERA Online and Riders Of Icarus, two other titles I've played. Both of which feature a non-target locking system and smart spell casting layout that put a lot of stock into hand-eye-coordination and combination abilities. Safe to say, if you have tunnel vision or lack of your surroundings this game may not be for you, but it is pretty forgivable in that sense, so if you have trouble in that area, it's a good game to get training in.

Skyforge features all the works of an MMO and a little bit more; All in all, I gave it a pretty good run and didn't find myself wanting anything more. The Allods Team did a good job with this one.

+++
--PvP/PvE
--Open Area for grinding and questing
--A Campaign and Story
--Several Unique classes, and unlockables
--Free To Play
--Grind isn't overtaxing
--In-Game Store and Cosmetic Items
--Dungeons & Raids
--Guild Leveling System
--Character Leveling System (Might) The more you get, the higher your strength.}
--Multiple Weekly Events
--Garrison type Loot System
--Individual Loot System, No MORE ROLLING!!!
--Great Community and friendly players that benefit from helping others.
--Daily Loot Boxes, Turn-Ins and Bonus Quests
--High repeat-ability

===
--PvP is a bit imbalanced with the item restrictions. Some pieces of a gear are a little silly for certain classes.
--PvP is very skill based, There is always a player who knows more.
--Dungeon Q'ing is non-existent, you will have to find players with the same quest or type LFG (Abbreviation for zone goes here to get invites)
--Some players are Elitist and want quick clear times and don't wait for players, You might want to invest your Argents into a fast 18k Mount.

As a starter player for this game, obviously you are reading this Steam Review, I recommend you get the "Steam New Players Kit" which is a great starter kit, It gives you a bit of premium time which helps you accelerate past the first 30 prestige levels with ease, Prestige is your overrall character level which is gained from collecting items, completing quests and might. Try to be patient with your playthrough and enjoy the wonderful scenery with no framerate drops.

I don't like to tell people too much about the game in the review because it sours a flavor. So I will just pop up and say that this game deserves a bit more attention for it's well organized system.

Give Skyforge a try.
My ratings are wierd but I give this game a 21/25 There are a few bugs, but nothing gamebreaking. Enjoy! :D

author: {'steamid': '76561198082837044', 'num_games_owned': 129, 'num_reviews': 36, 'playtime_forever': 397, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 397, 'last_played': 1507601911}
review: Pushing this game as an MMORPG is a very bad idea. The world is very closed and instanced, you don't level up, you don't have crafting or housing, you don't get the same experience as you would expect from an MMORPG. That doesn't mean it's a bad game either. The graphics are stunning. It has a lot of voice acting which, while the quality is mediocre, I very much appreciate. The missions are fun and it has a decent story line. It seems like there are some paywall restrictions in the game that are probably frustrating for long time players. Overall It's a good game but for the pay mechanics and the fact that it doesn't deliver on the experience it markets I have to so no on recommending it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198060926440', 'num_games_owned': 981, 'num_reviews': 248, 'playtime_forever': 878, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 779, 'last_played': 1508564740}
review:
This game is pretty trash.

-The menus are pretty confusing for a beginner.
-You can oly hold like 20 items before you're over encumbered and start moving really slow
-The game uses it's own launcher which means that once you do want to play the game you'll open it up on steam and it will start the update process when you actually want to play
-The games community is pretty fragmented due to the game making the way to play with other people you know stupid and tedious
-the friends list is useless
-The observatory looks full, but really everyone is just in waiting for game
-Bosses are tedious and don't feel rewarding to beat.
(This is just kind of a pet peeve)-The damage and health in this game is measured in the quadrillions and more when you get a bit far into the game and this make the game feel like an over exagerated parody of itself, kinda like URF in LoL when you lok at the damage that killed you and it just says "Tons"

When trying to play by yourself and unlock classes the game will be super easy and you just walk in a circle around the boss for like 5 minutes holding down left click. All of a sudden you will encounter a boss that you just can't beat because it has too much HP and does too much  damage with locked on abilities. At that point you wil have to switch classes because there are just some classes that deal with some bosses better.

This game also has that kind of combat that isn't even fun to do, you just kite if you're ranged and even some times as melee. Some of the classes feel the same but just do different damage numbers making them better. Cryomancer has a better protection spell then light bender... what? cryomance is the beginning damaga class and linght bender is the beginning support class. light benders support spells are trash, while cryomancer has a sheild that will make him invinsible.

Many of the places you can travel to in the overworld are useless. They serve no purpose other than to be there for a tutorial and you can travel there anytime for... no reason. no one to talk to, nothing to do there. 

This game tries to be like an MMO where you grind but they made the levels so fragmented that the community is snuffed out from it. All there is really to do is unlock all the classes find your favorite and then grind or PVP which takes quite a grind to get to that level.

No point in this game due to how bad it's designed and how stupid the setup is.

author: {'steamid': '76561198021903868', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 45, 'playtime_forever': 884, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 831, 'last_played': 1507785375}
review:
For a free MMO, this game is damned impressive. The graphics are beautiful, and the gameplay is very action-oriented, containing a lot more depth than hitting hotkeys in a rotation. The story isn't really anything new and exciting, but there's a lot of lore packed into it if you're willing to take the time to look around and read up.

Perhaps most rewarding is the fact that there's no Pay-to-Win structure in place. You can earn just about anything you can buy for real money in-game. You might have a bit of a grind involved, but if you're enjoying the game, that really can't be counted as a negative. The game even liberally hands out 3-day terms of its Premium status for completing various objectives. There are a lot of classes available, and they all play pretty distinctly different from one another. You can also change classes whenever you please (except in combat), so if something isn't working out for the content you're in, you can switch it up and try another approach. 

Skyforge is also very solo-friendly, allowing you to complete most missions and quests on your own. There are instanced dungeon-type areas, as well as large open-world maps where you can complete new objectives as you make your way around. You can take the dungeons solo or with a group, and the open-world areas allow you to meet up with other players as you play, so you can play however you want to.

A lot of people will spit venom about my.com or Allods (a previous game done by these developers), but having played Allods a lot back in the day, I really don't have anything bad to say about them. If you're willing to put time into the game, you'll be able to get whatever you're after and enjoy yourself.

review: Game plays awesome, love the combat all that good stuff, but man, those god damn sparks of transformation ruins everything. Paywalls are not ok in my book, even tho game is good, just go B2P.
developer_response:
Hey there, 

Thank you for your feedback!

While unlocking new classes through Sparks of Transformation can feel a bit grindy, please understand that players aren't meant to unlock all the classes from the start, it's a process that should take quite a bit of time, and players can prioritize which classes they want to get their hands on first.

Locked classes don't prevent you from enjoying the game either, for example, among basic classes there's Cryomancer, one of the most potent classes in both PvE and PvP.

Have you already completed the storyline campaign? The Sparks you get from it is enough to unlock a couple of classes.

Cheers!

author: {'steamid': '76561198049490615', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 35, 'playtime_forever': 2291, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2291, 'last_played': 1496301110}
review:
//SKYFORGE//

Climb the ladder to godhood by quelling all threats that plague Aelion and its people.

/PROS/
Dear zeus the visuals are amazing.
By jupiter's beard are the classes fun to use.
Missions and sidequests will leave you busier than sisyphus.
Levels that give daedalus a run for his money.
Plenty of events with ample rewards behind them. Sadly can not earn a god pun as a reward.

/CONS/
Warframe levels of unfortunate mediocrity.
Very grind happy, especially the most reccent update. (red flag one)
Not entirely solo friendly so grab a buddy asap.
Went through the entire game feeling as if i was juuust below adequate sufficiency with weapons and abilities.
Delete the game and you delete your save, think twice!
On the cusp of being a vacant game dispite being free to play. (red flag two)

Not many fond memories with this game so im keeping the conslusion of reasonable length. Skyforge is the very definition of a gilded turd. This game will fish you in hook, line, and sinker with its enticing easy start and then sets up a pretty thick grindwall with the in-game store just in sight. I'm not knocking the devs for trying to make money i'm knocking them for making me play a repetitive content devoid game then asking for donations. Players will only buy microtransaction money if they feel the game has respected their time and gave a solid experience in return for their patience and effort, this game doesn't do that in the slightest nor has it shown signs of trying. Even after pouring real life money into this game you will almost never feel as if the purchase was justified as there will just be more grinding to do afterwards. The game is a low wage discount magician that has one trick and asks you for a donation after doing its sole performance twelve times consecutively with the promise of doing it twelve times more.

Destiny was a better MMO, and that game was a failure to itself and its playerbase.

Solid 5 out of 10.

(will return later for revisions)

author: {'steamid': '76561198242013538', 'num_games_owned': 256, 'num_reviews': 48, 'playtime_forever': 4786, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3878, 'last_played': 1587432185}
review:
If you want to play Skyforge prepare to be confused all the time. Never in any videogame before have I had no clue what to do for such a long time. To this day I haven't a clue to how to unlock the new classes that skyforge keeps talking about. (Update: thought the power of google it was discovered i have to farm for "sparks" to unlock classes but this was never explained ingame. I had to google the information but for some reason there so much conflicting information your better off asking your girlfriend where she wants to go for dinner)
14 NEW CLASSES TO CHOOSE FROM but not really though as we wont tell you how to unlock new classes other than your three starters. GROW POWERFUL ENOUGH TO ASCEND TO GODHOOD.. another thing that isnt explained nor ever will be )Update: I actually just stumbled across a mission to recieve my god for. Its a reward for the first "story" mission if your wondering). Not even the games two wiki pages helped me figure out what to do. It kept bringing up an Ascension Atlas, which no one knows how to access.     But if you can by some black magic get past all that it actually is a fun game, combat is fun and can be difficult so all you dank soul players can come can get your ass violated if you want, and when you do get you god form its non-stop fun until you die.

author: {'steamid': '76561198089658387', 'num_games_owned': 519, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 6619, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6364, 'last_played': 1618057096}
review:
Played the game for almost 100 hour and i can say that the game is "almost" dead. Low player base , unbalance (PvP) classes and ect. if you want to  play go ahead and enjoy until you hit the "grind-wall" or "pay to win-wall"( it mostly depends what kind of player you are). Just so you know early content is the best that i have seen in MMO. So give it a try  if you want but for me the game is done.

Edit: After 6 days friends drag me back to help with dungeon completing and i can only say it would be nice that the game would show how many people are  queue in up. To farm easily Sparks of Transformation you need to play PvP(you get 250 sparks) or help New players (you get 500).
developer_response:
Hi there!

Thank you for the feedback.

While unlocking new classes through Sparks of Transformation can feel a bit grindy, please understand that players aren't meant to unlock all the classes from the start, it's a process that should take quite a bit of time, and players can prioritize which classes they want to get their hands on first.

As to the imbalanced classes, very recently we've conducted a survey about Skyforge classes on social media, and one of the most prominent things we've gathered from it was indeed about PvP imbalance, so hopefully this will be addressed in the future.

author: {'steamid': '76561198125825933', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 77, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 77, 'last_played': 1506142685}
review: fuckin sucked. skill tree used to be awsome now its just trashy
developer_response:
Hi there,

Thank you for your feedback.

The only difference in class customization is before Ascension you had all talents and abilities available to choose make your own build for classes, and when Ascension arrived, these were separated into PvE or PvP specific builds, and unnecessary talents and abilities were removed. But you don't need to select a different build for PvP or PvE now, you will automatically change talent and ability set up, based on whether you're engaged in PvP or PvE content.

Hope this clears things up a bit, cheers!

author: {'steamid': '76561198068033126', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 66154, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 51557, 'last_played': 1512745471}
review:
Skyforge like any other mmorpg would ultimately be a grind but that is to be expected. Its a struggle sometimes but the end level brackets (140 to 160 rank) do make you feel really strong and powerful which ultimately is all that matters. The reward is good at the end and you feel like the time spent getting there was well worth it. 

The idea is to make friends, join a good pantheon and get youself to the top ranks where you can participate in the end game content. The end game invasion keeps rotating every 1.5 to 2 months so the content is always fresh. Well atleast for someone who is new. If you play through all the invasions and complete all the distortions only then you can say I have done and explored everything and now i can move on to another game. But for people writing reviews with less than 100 hours into the game are not giving you the full picture. Would you listen to the endless negative reviews or think about those of us who are still playing ?...some even more then 2 years. 

This game can be played by putting zero dollars into it, the difference between a premium and non premium is only a little matter of time. Sure maybe the top premium rank person would be 2 months ahead of you....so what. If things were too easy then no one would stick around to stay. Besides that the game does reward a lot with events, you can spend a month farming your credits and then comes an event and you get easy rewards because you saved all the credits which were useless anyways besides putting them in events. Since i have joined, it has been over 4 months and I have collected a lot of freebies from events. So it doesnt make you feel like you have to purchase anything with real money.

The P2W elements are there somewhat but its more like a rich guy has to put an insane amount of money to get quick progress (There are limitations how much you can progress per day). You really dont need to progress that fast. Yes i have put money in the game and I am premium rank 8 as of now but i got my friend to start playing and he is a 100% f2p player and he reached rank 143 (max rank now is 160) in 1 month by focusing on prestige boosting activities only rather than wasting time in anything else. He even managed to save a lot of credits to complete one page of event and get all the rewards. So if a f2p player can do it then anybody else can.

Play and learn everything about the game, get better, master all the classes, get all the top gear and do the distortions. Without this, you havent seen skyforge.

Dont let all these negative reviews discourage you. Whatever it is, the game is surviving well and there are many players and we are doing a lot of stuff and enjoying ourself daily. So you decide, Play or Not your call :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198022939833', 'num_games_owned': 9317, 'num_reviews': 113, 'playtime_forever': 10826, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 10765, 'last_played': 1623266138}
review:
[h1]Vorwort[/h1]

Jeder kennt das Gesetz:
[i]"Die Würde des Menschen ist unantastbar."[/i]. 

Wenn man das Spiel allerdings mit Erfolg spielen möchte, muss man seine Würde über Bord werfen.

Wieso? Weil es keinen wirklichen Low Level Content gibt. Alle Gruppeninstanzen sind ab Level 150+ (160 ist max Level). Man wird zwar, wenn man als Lowie eine solche Instanz betritt, hochgestuft, aber wir kennen das ja alle, wenn man hochgestuft wird, ist man nie so stark als hätte man tatsächlich das erforderliche Level erreicht.

Alle die sich darauf freuen, wie früher, eine Gruppe zusammenzustellen und Gruppeninstanzen zu gehen, sind hier fehl am Platz. Denn nur wenn man sich bis max Level von den Highleveler durchziehen lässt kann man Erfolg haben. 

[h1]Pay to win?[/h1]

Nun die Frage die jeden beschäftigt, p2w oder nicht? Ganz klares Jein, mit der Tendenz zu Ja. Man [b]kann[/b] das Spiel wunderbar ohne Geld spielen da man jeden Tag auch immer diese Shopwährung kostenlos erhält, aber es wäre, vorallem für den Ausbau der Türme von Vorteil Geld auszugeben da man so schnell max Level erreicht. Außerdem, die 2 Mounts die man geschenkt bekommt, halten nicht ewig (Ablaufdatum) und man wird gezwungen sich eines für Echtgeld zu kaufen außer man hat Bock ständig zu Fuß zu laufen.

[h1]Balanced?[/h1]

Ob das Spiel balanced ist? Definitiv nicht. Alle neueren Klassen rotzen den DMG nur so raus ohne das man etwas dafür tun muss. Den Gunner und Revenant machen ungefähr 10x soviel Schaden wie alle anderen DMG Klassen zusammen. Wenn man das z. B. mit dem Berserker vergleicht, der eine 2-Hand Waffe trägt, denkt man natürlich das er krassen Burst raushaut, aber man liegt da komplett falsch. Der Berserker macht da weniger Schaden als der Heiler -.-

[h1]Fazit[/h1]

Es macht Spaß, ganz klar. Aber das machen auch andere MMO's, zu Anfang. 
Ob ichs empfehlen würde? Eher nicht. Wieso? Weil es kein Klassisches MMO ist. Ich möchte kein MMO spielen wo man in der Hauptstadt 99% Gunner und Revenants antrifft und jeder das selbe Equiptment besitzt.

For game play, like korean farming games

author: {'steamid': '76561198020520809', 'num_games_owned': 324, 'num_reviews': 82, 'playtime_forever': 1769, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1253, 'last_played': 1611077853}
review:
I don't play MMOs regularly, especially RPGs. However, when I pick up one that catches my attention, it's unlikely that I let it go after just a couple minutes, and in the end I never toss it in the trash can. I'm absolutely sure that, as far as my personal preference is involved, Skyforge is one of such games.

The only thing that would complete it: to allow switching to Russian language even from the EU client. I had both clients for some time because - as a student of Russian language - there was no way I wouldn't play the game in its original language. However, that's bit of a long process to accomplish. Hopefully the devs will consider this option.

All in all, it's quite a nice game, the characters feel satisfyingly powerful, the visuals are great, it's even free - why not give it a try at least?

author: {'steamid': '76561198139225985', 'num_games_owned': 566, 'num_reviews': 66, 'playtime_forever': 28, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 28, 'last_played': 1505265344}
review:
I give the game itself a thumbs up, but not this launcher.

If you download this one, MAKE SURE you don't have the website version on your computer. It will break the website launcher so that you can not run your original account, and basically tries to force you to restart through the steam launcher. It took me a long time until I figured out what was happening by uninstalling both and reinstalling the website version.

The game itself is actually quite good. Both I and my boyfriend enjoy it. You can choose whether or not to play stories by yourself, or do missions with other people. You get to change your class or outfit anytime you want, so you can always try new things. The missions go in solo, 3 players, 5 players, or 10 players.

author: {'steamid': '76561198178616369', 'num_games_owned': 112, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 63948, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 35285, 'last_played': 1604499187}
review:
Short review about this game

Negative: 

> Repeative game.
> Combat is bad, limited action and movement is like on a rail. You cant change class during combat. If one of your teammate enter combat, entire team will be force to enter combat as well, regardless of where you are and how far you are from the "In combat" teammate. Absolutely not like in the trailer.
> Bad map design, stuck points everywhere.
> Lost most of its interesting mechanics overtime, like Equipment upgrade, Ascension and interactive Cathedral...
> Grind alot.
> Bad optimize.
> Cant swim.
> Stupid devs, what the hell make you think that add level and level limit system is a good idea???
> Animation are stupid, sticky and interrupt when taking damage (even when you are in your god form).
> DLCs with inflated price.

Positive:

> Fun when play with trusty pantheon (guild) members / family members
> Feel the OP of the god form
> Fight aliens and kick their gods's avatar.
> Have too much money and want to spend them.
> Shiny graphics

review:

C'est un Warframe en moins bien, moins beau et plus ... russe.

Je trouve que ça manque de contenu à la longue, le but est juste de faire le max d'objectif à 100% et d'optimiser pour toucher le plafond.

author: {'steamid': '76561198085759352', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 1679, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1679, 'last_played': 1505870137}
review: had fun. Until the grind for Sparks of Transformation.
developer_response:
Hey there, 

Thank you for your feedback!

While I agree that with Sparks of Transformation the process of unlocking new classes became more time-consuming, but please understand that in Skyforge this process is one of the major parts of gameplay, like leveling in some other MMOs. It is a challenge with a reward at the end of it. 

Have you already completed the storyline campaign? The Sparks you get from it is enough to unlock a couple of classes.

Cheers!

author: {'steamid': '76561198052565997', 'num_games_owned': 213, 'num_reviews': 44, 'playtime_forever': 86, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 86, 'last_played': 1504997313}
review: The game is awesome, except for one fatal flaw that will likely ruin the whole experience for some. You can only create one (1) character. That's right, there is no deleting your character so you can start and enjoy the first levels again, or simply have a back up in case you messed up something in your first attempt. Sure you get a single free character re-make, but after that you have to pay.

author: {'steamid': '76561198144420129', 'num_games_owned': 194, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 3422, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3422, 'last_played': 1502252091}
review: Was good until "Spark of Transformations" were added so now the game is essentially P2P.
developer_response:
Hey there, 

Thank you for your feedback!

While I agree that with Sparks of Transformation the process of unlocking new classes became more time-consuming, but please understand that in Skyforge this process is one of the major parts of gameplay, like leveling in some other MMOs. It is a challenge with a reward at the end of it. 

I also want to point out that Skyforge can't be considered P2W since anything that affects gameplay and the strength of your character can be obtained without spending a dime. 

Cheers!

review:
For the simple fact that the game open on my secondary monitor.
Tried to switch screen in game and it still not working and after a quick search on google it seems like there's a lot of people that have the same problem. Only solution was to manually set my main screen as my secondary in windows and I have to do it again if I want to play another game. Pretty anoying, wasn't expecting such bs from a game in 2017.. 
Seriously if they can't fix something that simple it makes me fear for the in-game content.

author: {'steamid': '76561198173525757', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 74, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 74, 'last_played': 1501708804}
review:
Ну что можно сказать об игре? Да много чего,только стоит учесть тот факт, что игра до 2016 выглядела интересней и живее, чем сейчас после выпуска в стиме(откуда я знаю? я играл в эту игру, когда она была еще на МЫЛО 
 ---} mail.ru,наиграл больше 1к часов лучше б не играл)
Изменилось многое, а именно вся ветвь в развитии нету привычного атласа, искр которые приходилось фармить ради усиления, теперь достаточно задротить на класе и он сам прокачается как и твой акк.
Если фармить шмот падает чисто КАЛЛ (сравнение 2017 и до 2017).
ПВП теперь никакое просто блеать живое дерьмо!!!! Еще очень долгое ожидание пати ААААаа!!!!
Чуть-чуть изменился сюжет вот прям чуть-чуть, теже унылые фразы НПС, интерфейс стал буд-то живым мутантом.
Все что я хочу сказать об игре, росто дохуя минусов которые даже вспоминать не охото из-за тупости разрабов и их нерфа половины классов стали просто калом, примером служит, когда забрали обилки которые делали класс уникальным.
Самое главное оценка, оценка блеать 10 дохлых голубей из 10!!!!
Игра просто скатилась. Я даже врагу это рекомендовать не стану.

author: {'steamid': '76561198079468674', 'num_games_owned': 589, 'num_reviews': 48, 'playtime_forever': 13230, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6387, 'last_played': 1627704539}
review:
A bit of backstory, I started playing this game about a few months ago, and I absolutely loved how convenient it was to get and level up the classes, so much so that I even purchased Ardents just for the sake of supporting the game. If the class acquisition had been this way when I started, I likely wouldn't have spent any time on this game, let alone cash for supporting it. Acquiring a class was just about as hard as clearing the required quests in one's Province. 

I absolutely loathe the new way you've introduced to acquire classes. Judging from my Steam Achievements, I had them all maxed out even before getting my god form, because I just had to reach the corresponding temples to get the classes. That served as a drive for me to keep going, knowing something new is always around the corner as I went through the Provinces. Now, new players will see that there's still that something, but they're locked behind behind a door called "Sparks of Transformation." What a waste. The system was absolutely lovely, and I even recommended this game to friends, because the old class acquisition system allowed us to experiment with any of the existing classes we want to with a bit of effort. 

Please revert that for new players. I'm obviously not speaking for myself as I have every class maxed out. I just feel bad for the new players who have this wall put in between them and the classes they want. RNG isn't always better, even in an MMORPG where RNG is a trope. Thanks a lot if you consider it.

review: Not very interesting. when compared to other MMORPGs out there it brings nothing new to the table worse yet the game forces you to unlock classes as you go, there are only two tank classes and they are both the same class with differnt weapons (both use shield and a sword/spear). hey are you one of thoes players that like to heal? guess what? there are support classes but they get one heal with kind of a cool down you will never use because healing orbs. the rest of the classes are kind of bad DPS classes that have been done in other games already. worst wet each class only has 6 spells and a few passives that buff said spells, there is not alot of variety so if your coming from playing any of the Blizzard MMOs, SWTOR. In my opinion this game is a bad version of a much older free to play mmorpg called global agenda.

author: {'steamid': '76561198125686701', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 68, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 68, 'last_played': 1503523214}
review:
Telling people they can play whatever class they want and then making them grind for it is bad game making and marketing.
PROTIP: All classes should be open from the start.
"HECK YEAH! You can be an X... just start with one of these shitty classes and in 40 hours you MIGHT unlock the class you signed up for.
DUMB. Also, capping progression is dumb too. Like, maybe if I blew through early content, I can be an X? Naw. Pace yourself. FFS, this MIGHT as well be a mobile game.
I'd turn this thumb sideways, at least, if you could pick a class you want from the start.

author: {'steamid': '76561198044306034', 'num_games_owned': 233, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 2950, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2880, 'last_played': 1504786780}
review:
_____New Review________________________________
EDIT : So, I've played a lot more of the game and it is entirely pay to win. It continuously offers you "75% off!" and "80% off!" bundles in-game, that can only be bought in-game, and can only be bought with money from debit, credit or gift card. No steam purchase allowed apparently. If you want to buy the bundles they offer you, it takes an absurd amount of effort, for example. My friend wanted to buy a bundle in-game and had to go get a gift card, then pay through paypal in-game, which took a lot to do, it's not simple.

Because of this purchase I, who did not purchase the bundle am left behind. Far. Far behind. I would explain it but it would take up the character limit of the review. Let's put it this way, the bundle gave my friend so much of the in-game / in-store purchasable currency + in-game items, that he boosted from prestige 40 to 60 and essentially skipped 2 weeks of grinding that it would take to get those levels and can do pretty much what ever he wants in-game.

If you want a casual game to waste some time on, go for it. This is the game for you.
If you have no money and want a free to play game that you can play competitively / comfortably without buying any bundles. Go somewhere else, because it's not this one.

_____OLD REVIEWS BELOW_____________________________
I've only played a few hours of this game but so far love it. I spent 12 years playing WoW and recently left it to give other games a chance. I like this one a lot.

Pros and cons
--------------------
Pros:
Cool spell animations
Gives you 3 days of "Premium status" when you install it for the first time from steam
Everything in the game can be unlocked through gameplay
Very fast loading when teleporting / entering an area
The whole story line is solo-able, you don't HAVE to play with others unless you want to.
=============================================================
Cons:
Takes an insane amount of the currency called "Sparks" to unlock 1 class.
Some robot follows you around that is apparently your companion that never stops talking. Ever.
The female voice in the game, I think it's name is Argus, has the most shrill voice I have ever heard in my life. But you get used to it.
Make sure your region is chosen on the launcher. I'm in North America and it auto selected Europe for me, which caused a massive amount of lag causing the game to be un-playable which led to me needing to switch servers and of course... leave my level 15 behind. (good thing level 15 isn't that high) Though this can be much MUCH more punishing, for example, it did it to my friend and now his European account has 3 days of premium status and outlaw unlocked, but his North America Account does not. PAY ATTENTION TO WHAT YOUR REGION IS!

<>><><><><><><><><><
Other than that the game is so far very fun, Lots of grinding, which isn't bothering me but like I said, I played an MMORPG for 12 years before this. So your experience may not be the same as mine.

I would reccommend you try the game, don't give up if you get confused, just give it a good 1-2 hours and you'll get the hang of it. And if you need help the community seems VERY friendly, I had lots of people helping me, telling me what I need to do, what I get for doing it, the best farming spots, I even had people offering to "boost" me through the story line.
___________________________________________________________________________

Edit: At the end of the campaign I was rewarded the Monk, Alchemist and Warlock / Witch Classes for free.

Over all rating so far: 7/10. It holds my attention as it should, but just like any other multiplayer game, it's not multiplayer. Groups are a myth.

author: {'steamid': '76561198136516232', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 42, 'playtime_forever': 1326, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1326, 'last_played': 1503295715}
review:
As ive played the game before then now is good to be back and i like. Ok, there is not so many abilitys, but you can have many more classes.....at least lol, yeah i know, i prefer to master with one guy. Some classes are better and faster than others. Some classes  are like combo classes and i found out that combo classes (like paladin) are a bit slow. We can have support, but theres no any actual healing, at least we can shield up or give shields. Theres no any skill tree anymore, but there is now might (increases = all damage, defence and so on), symbols that give different things, armor and so on. 
Its not so grindi like some other mmorpgs. You can choose how challenging is your instance- nice, but be careful! Action combat is nice and i like how you can dodge and leave behinde treats that can harm  or something else. i like how you can equip dead enemy weapons to hit other anamys.....it wont happen always.  And now again about the missing skill tree- it is now instance tree....well you can see yourself...and it aint so bad at all! Good luck and have some fun!

author: {'steamid': '76561198026096122', 'num_games_owned': 237, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 11708, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3294, 'last_played': 1587082308}
review:
Скачано и установлено ради скуки.
Плюсы:
- Графика. Как по мне так там неплохая графика.
- Кастомизация персонажа неплохая.
- Сюжет, отчасти напоминающий лайв стори GW2/
- Анимации.
Минусы:
- ЛФГ. Я думал, что двухчасовое ожидание в лфр в WoW это долго. Я жестоко ошибался, прождав ШЕСТЬ(!!!) часов в какой-то инст.
- Цены. Вам предлагают пак ништяков за 600р? Сперва сто раз подумайте перед покупкой, так как вы его будете покупать не за 600р, а за 877.
- Система non target. Интересно, какой даун придумал эту систему?
- Покупка классов. По дефолту тебе дают на выбор только среди 3-х классов(маг, паладин, и что-то типа саппорта). Если загрузил халявный пак из стима, то откроется доступ к стрелку. Чуть дальше по сюжету станет доступен берсерк, этайкий махатель пиломечом. Но для открытия других классов надо их покупать. Либо за один из видов внутриигровой валюты, либо пак в стиме за реал.
- Система опыта. Престиж? Который повышается одеванием новой шмотки? Это, конечно, оригинально, но не настолько, так как в большинстве своем "шмот" падает один и тот-же. Хочешь новый шмот? Дрочи инсты, зачищай локации, проходи сюжетку. Ну или вливай валюту.

author: {'steamid': '76561198352568162', 'num_games_owned': 137, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 7173, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 321, 'last_played': 1697898417}
review: 传统职业赋予了新的游戏背景和玩法，职业之间有类似的技能但又有不同的细节差异。在游戏操作上能够做出细节问题的游戏为数不多，这个游戏真的值得尝试。剧情上虽然是很古板客套：外来生物入侵，作为神族勇士的主角去和其他人拯救世界。但是游戏本身的细节做的很有趣。唯独不好的就是没有汉化…毕竟没有中国服务器，要是能有个中文界面也是非常好的了。

author: {'steamid': '76561198352444980', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 8852, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6347, 'last_played': 1505694608}
review:
很优秀的游戏，画面精致，优化做得非常好
这是俄罗斯大兄弟做的游戏，有兴趣的可以来感受下俄罗斯风情的网游
游戏几乎没有氪金点，钻石每天日常会给，除了会员一切东西都可以用钻石买，而且会员也经常送，反正我没断过
由于是全英文，可能国人们会望而却步，我在这里给大家简单介绍下游戏初期的内容
在玩家生存的星球上，一切人都有机会成为不朽者（immortal），不朽者在死后可以重生，并且可以修炼成神
一天，这个星球的主神消失了，于是各种邪恶生物开始入侵
玩家一开始只是一个对抗入侵者的士兵，在敌人的包围下战死沙场
但是随后发现自己在尸体堆中复活
前来救援的士兵们告诉玩家已经成为了不朽者，并将玩家带到这个星球的首都
在首都，玩家遇到一位蓝头发的elder god，叫Herdria（不确定是不是这几个字），她向主角介绍不朽者的使命，以及修炼成神的方法
主线还会把玩家带到测试中心（test area），这里会遇到科技之神Flavius，他将教会玩家如何使用不朽者的力量，也就是选职业
Herdria告诉玩家这个星球上一共有九个行省（province)，这九个行省目前都被敌人入侵了，玩家需要解放他们
每个行省有四到五个单人副本，还有一到两片公共地图（单人本的故事实际上就发生在公共地图的某个地方），还有一到两个小队副本和职业圣堂（tample），打通一个行省还会解锁堡垒（bastion）,可以学习通用技能
打通所有行省以后，Herdria将指引玩家开始获得神格的任务，完成一系列任务以后，玩家就可以成为神（God）了
对于新人来说，玩到成神基本上就算入坑成功，剩下的就是刷刷刷了
在这个游戏中，玩家的等级并不是通过获得经验提升，而是通过积累神力（Might）和获取装备
神力可以通过投资建设首都（capital）界面的教堂和知识之塔，还有完成任务提升行省中堡垒等级来提升
提高神力可以装备更好的装备，而装备和神力共同决定了玩家的战力
至于职业，玩家需要首先通关职业圣堂所在的行省，然后花Transformer Park这种货币来解锁
打怪会随机掉获得Transformer Park的道具，每个加一百，两万五解锁一个职业，差不多要刷一周
初始圣骑士，冰术士和光祭司三个职业是免费的，打通全部行省可以解锁狂战士，武僧，女巫和炼金术师
STEAM的免费礼包可以解锁法外狂徒（这名字...），所以不要把宝贵的Transformer Park花在这几个职业上



和其他网络游戏一样，这个游戏到了后期的玩法依然是刷刷刷，但是它的运营非常良心，一切氪金能获得的东西都可以通过在游戏中刷钻石来获得，每天还有登录奖励，超级丰富，登录送永久时装、七天会员或者直接送钻石的我都遇见过
再加上出色的画面以及优化，多样的时装，哪怕把这个游戏玩成换装拍照游戏都可以

最重要的是完全不用花钱

author: {'steamid': '76561198090633060', 'num_games_owned': 377, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 5847, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5415, 'last_played': 1502379381}
review:
Normally, I don't do review much , especially with F2P game, because I always encourage people to try new things before they decided whether they like it or not, and partially because we all knew the problem of F2P game and I think if people spent and suffered with it as much as i did, it couldn't be any worse. Especially since i have been though with the game before, 2 yrs ago. Been replaying Warframe for about 6 month, started doing the end game contents (without paying anything) and thought i could played something else waiting for Plains of Eidolon, then remembered play this before and wanted to play it again. But I was dead wrong. After 2 weeks bearing with it, 77 prestige; two massive, 2.5g-health-bar bears convinced me to write this.

Pros:
-A unique and beautifully world. All NPC (even background ones) have voice, and some special NPC have their own animation scene when talking
-The idea of creating and evolving a god of your own sure is interesting
-You can (in a way of speaking) played all classes. 
-The gameplay of all classes is fun, and unique ( compare to themselves and to other games)
-A surprisingly great story (for a MMO)
-Open-world maps, with a good mission system and story within each
-A close-to-non-target playing (it isn't entirely non-target, but it's actually have active dodging, and a combo-style gameplay that make an illusion of nontarget playing and overall, of fast action gameplay)
-The overall strength of character isn't entirely rely on equipment
-The skill-tree, building and mission types system is really fresh
-God system really is god system, you'll have to gather followers to worship you, and you can send them to do something or off on a journey to spead your ideal and faith and with more faith, you 'll get stronger (you'll have to earn their faith by doing quest too, a very real god system i must say)

So if you bother enough to read this far, right now, you might think: This game as far sounded like a really interesting one, so why? Yeah, that's the reason i first played it 2 yrs ago, and now, is the reason why i dropped it after 2 wks returned.

Cons:
- If you are in the same situation as mine and want to get back in the game through Steam after 2 yr+, i must warn you: you can't replace or combine the Steam account with your old My.com account from before. If you don't want to replay so many hrs, don't bother return. If you aren't, proceed below.
-You will be overwhelm by how many kind of currencies you need in this game, and in some way they can be grind, but still, with a game that doesn't have any crafting (up until the time i wrote this review) that was too much, and also means that you have to grind, hard.
-The drop system for the equipment, which hard to understand first but then eventually found out, is broke. It's rely on the Might, the overall strength indicator of this game. That mean, if you ain't got enough Might, no matter how hard the mission you gone through, now matter how many tries to achieved it, no mater how rare that piece of equipment, you'll only got the ones fit with your might and no more). Some might say it fair. I thought so too, but the problem come from the others too.
-The Might system is also the problem. The Prestige is your level, and even though after less than 10 min of that night I've gone straight from 47 - 74 pretige after achieved my God form, I realized that Prestige isn't the main factor of the might, too. And also the Prestige isn't up by grinding quest. So basically grinding won't help you "level up", and also "level up" won't help you get much stronger nor better equipment. Some too might say this still fair, then come the problem with getting Might
-The Bastion, the Cathedral (i called it Church for short) and the Tower of Knowledge (ToK) is the main source for Might. They level up by using your resource (Church and ToK) and doing some specific quest (Bastion), and the higher they are, the higher the Might bonus you might recieve. The problem is, first, those resource need either grinding hard, or buying using another type of resource (Argent). And you can still receive Argent from ingame. Some based on that and say this game is grindy but not P2W. But guest what? You can buy a LOT of them with Argent, and Argent can be bought with real $. That mean you can easily got a LOT stronger in a LOT shorter time than grinding. And since this is classic RPG, got stronger fast meaning very much. And know what? These constructions, they have daily limited for the amount of resources you can contribute, but you can get over it by Stimulants, a resource specifically to "skip" through anything, and you can get a small amount of it through some basic activities in game, or just BUY it using Argent. And I can guarantee to you guys, you can't get enough Argent for all this just by farming ingame. Oh, I forgot to mention that the higher the constuction is, the higher the resource and stimulants for it'll required? Yeah, that mean, the more you give, the much more you get stronger compares to those grinding peasants like me. I remembered when i was playing this before, it isn't that much cash grabbing as it is right now. There were limits for sure, but not as much.
-You won't get classes and talent for each (a way to called skill in this game) for free. You'll get 3 first basic, 1 more after the 2nd province clear , and 3 more after complete the main map line through all province. I wouldn't say anything if it's all, but then you need to grind hard for 5 more classes (actually 6, I got Outlaw thanks to Steam Welcome Gift but, I fell bad for newcomers in original server right now) and it's not easy. Before, you used to get all the classes with just complete the first main mission in all provinces and now that ain't gonna happen anymore. And also, before the 1st season story uses to be the main maps line and up on complete that, you 'll get all the reward but now, they split it in to "Stories Tab" and forces people to play it again for 1 costume? But back to the grinding, you will need 25k Spark of Transformation (let's called it SoT) to unlock a locked class, and the only places to farm it is through the 5-man raid, which was impossible for 1 man to solo since the boss all way got about a few xxxxxxx times than your health and even a normal thug or minion with less than 1 heath bar can f*** you up. Nothing to say if i can find a good team, but the community (at least in NA server) is THE S****IEST. I have sit for 5 min until i can get a team and the guy just dumped us because we were all new gods with less than 100 Pres level, even though with a gen 7 equipment set and 200k might he could just carried us, and we wouldn't have any attention of letting him carry us all and tried to help him the best we could ( i even wasted 1 divine change - cost a lot at low level - to help) and no one care about the public matchmaking. The 5-10 man raid is also the main source for high quipment as we said, even though equipments isn't the main strength, it's dead important after you get a god form if you want to go higher. That means in order to get higher equipment, you have to get Might and Prestige lot faster. And the most efficient way to get it is ... well now you know. 

So that mean though 4 system, they've made a systemically, intentionally failure that makes newbie incredibly harder if not almost imposible to go further, unless paying a little more, and also a big gap which can't be filled between richs and farmers. Some might say since all resource can be farmed, it's not P2W. After this, you will decide if it's true or just another beautiful lie. And it's important to say that at the time i played this 2 yrs ago, all of this didn't happened. This game got good potential, and it used to be great, but not anymore. Since it got all the beauties of an unique MMO, I truly encourage to just try it's a few hr, but after hitting that wall, well, it's your choice. With me, I just got enough.

author: {'steamid': '76561198150281618', 'num_games_owned': 287, 'num_reviews': 47, 'playtime_forever': 5721, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5265, 'last_played': 1543207900}
review: 游戏很好玩，有闲钱想玩的建议买全职业包，职业有十三四个，开始送三个，分别是 剑盾，冰法和光法，然后前期还会解锁一个狂战士，这几个都挺强的，不想买的玩这几个也够玩。然后是游戏动作比较流畅，打击感还好，画质也感觉不错，有些地图景色也算不错，有好有坏，缺点就是肝，爆肝，疯狂爆肝爆肝爆到你怀疑人生。爆肝的同时也会觉得很枯燥，而且注意是极度枯燥，非常非常的枯燥，超级超级枯燥。重要的话说三遍都不够的枯燥。而且升级曲线很不平滑，快的时候很快慢的时候呀会特别慢，没耐心可能玩不下去，建议国内朋友们入坑时候尽量加个群，看看老玩家怎么玩和群里的攻略，能省很多事。

author: {'steamid': '76561198138849278', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 28310, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 13149, 'last_played': 1514651965}
review: I've been playing Skyforge for a few weeks now, and I must say: I feel really challenged while playing this. Yes, There are still LOTS of problems when it comes to glitching, bad acting, getting new classes (death to the Sparks of Transformation. They could at least make the classes more affordable, not asking for 25k for a class), but there are many features to grind, which can be pointed out as a bad side, but it's the very core not just for a MMORPG, but Skyforge itself. This isn't quite talked about, but the 'level' system, is completely different from anything I've seen so far, since you don't rely on experience (in other words, killing mobs) to advance on the game, you gotta search for new equipments, pay attention to your Followers, Adepts, and buildings to level up your Prestige and eventually becoming a better god. I really hope they fix these twisty 'edges' that makes the game quite unappealing for some ppl, because this game has the potential to be great. Greater than already is, for me. You should try it for a few hours to see if it fits your style, if not, well, it's just a game you don't have to make a fuss out of it anyway.

review:
官方你们膨胀了？不想要新玩家了？我估计也是一大群人进来看一眼，直到玩到云里雾里，头都大了，然后卸载游戏。
要是还想吸收新血液多赚点钱，就给我把前期改容易点！

not the Skyforge ,should be "Missionforge"
剧情没有深度，迷迷糊糊的就成神了。而且变身后的那是什么鬼东西？我捏的帅哥呢？怎么变成了一个warframe？
