author: {'steamid': '76561198142543136', 'num_games_owned': 132, 'num_reviews': 64, 'playtime_forever': 5003, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4310, 'last_played': 1501540091}
review:
I enjoy this game a lot, I've been playing it for the pass week and it's been distracting me. I've played way back when the Atlas System was still a thing, glad that they removed it because it was crap. I also enjoy the classes so much, this game has one of the best class developers with great skills. Playing these kind of classes just makes you feel cool, period. Now I'm going to tell you the bad things in this game.

* You're being lied to if you believe this is an actual MMORPG -The game basically has a great population to find another partner to play with. You're assigned a mission where you have to spam the global chat for hours while people just ignore you, or you can choose to play alone while in the later missions, become hard. You can join a pantheon but, sell your player to them when majority of the pantheons force you to do stuff like donate all the time.
* Mission is so repetitive - You might be like "Of course, it's a grinding game", I know that but in every mission, you are forced to kill monsters that are just plain annoying and have to kill 3 bosses that all you have to do is dodge their attacks. There's not one mission that stands out from the others, they're all basically the same. You spam abilities and collect the loot.
* Group Finder is terrible - Unless you wanna stay in the capital and spam chat for an hour, you're going to have to do your mission online. The only Group Finder in the game now is "Random Squad Finder" where it's impossible to find a group. Also, they removed Group Finder from missions so now, only option is if you spam chat and you'll be lucky enough to get a reply.
* https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kcgysvQy9jM&ab_channel=PrettyGoodGaming - This video explains the overpower items.
* Sparks of Transformation - Even though they removed the Atlas System, they basically replaced it with this. It is required to get 25k Sparks of Transformation for one class. Here's how you get those - You grind a mission and probably get 500 sparks. Not guaranteed, some missions you can get 500,100 or even none. Unless you feel like playing 12 hours a day to get 12k sparks of transformation (Again, not guaranteed), you'll have a hard time unlocking classes as a newbie.
* Being New - Hard to catchup with the other players because of all these reasons, I'm not rewritting them.

If you're okay with all of these then the game might be for you. I personally just wrote my opinions, some people might agree, some people might disagree. Eitherway, I think it's a bad game. Goodbye :) ~ Windder

author: {'steamid': '76561198031436026', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 69, 'playtime_forever': 9, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 9, 'last_played': 1501516013}
review: I play a lot of hrs of this game using the original version of it not the steam one, i actualy just download it so i can post this. This game was fun, now is full Pay to win. Its a realy realy grinding game, no surprise there, but the fun thing was playig new maps and unlocking new classes for free as you played new maps, but in the last patch they change that. Now new players and not so new but stuck between patches (like me) need to pay for all the clases a ridiculous amount, 25k of some strange coin that only drops in packs of 100 IF you are lucky to get the drop, is not even 100% lol or pay real money. They make events where you can farm for hrs and hrs to get almost nothing or  pay a lot of real money to advance lol they actualy put the events on and at the same time they make a "sale" for the real money item you need to actualy advance, and is realy buggy, i cant remember how many times i got stuck with a little rock in the grass and needed to unstuck my self, missing textures and glitches. Support is realy bad, they rarely solve anything for me, and in the last ticket i send they actualy answer me in a very unprofesional way, and my claims for refunds were totaly ignored too. Overal i dont recomend this game at all. Sorry for my english.

review:
Si que recomiendo este juego, gracias a la estructura que tiene a la hora de aceptar misiones (una ciudad principal donde se te teletransporta al lugar de la misión), se hace mucho más rápido que en los que tienes que recorrer parte del mundo para poder realizarla y que servirá muchísimo para la gente que juega una temporada, para y luego no sabe si volver a jugar porque no recuerda ni que estaba haciendo o a donde tenia que ir, o para la gente que le gusta este tipo de juegos pero no puede dedicarle demasiado tiempo.

El sistema de batallas es cómodo, lo que consigue que te hagas a el con facilidad.

El poder cambiar de clase y ropa donde quieras y cuando quieras es un puntazo.

Lo malo, es el no poder tener más de un personaje.

author: {'steamid': '76561198136464545', 'num_games_owned': 417, 'num_reviews': 48, 'playtime_forever': 3198, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1583, 'last_played': 1603122648}
review:
Esse jogo é bom. Começa o jogo com 3 classes iniciais: Cryomancer (ataque), Paladin (defesa) e Lightbinder (suporte). É possível liberar o Outlaw (ataque) com o gift gratuito que oferecem pra quem joga via Steam. Conforme você upa de nível, você vai liberando outras classes (requer confirmação).
É um jogo F2P, como podem ver. Porém, segundo alguns jogadores mais experientes relatam, ele não é P2W. 
A jogabilidade dele se assimila um pouco a Heroes of the Storm, porém em mundo aberto. Pode ser confusa no começo, porém logo se acostuma.
Já os gráficos, sou incapaz de opinar, pois estou jogando no meu notebook e ele não consegue rodar no ultra (irei atualizar assim que jogar no meu PC).

Caso você queria começar a jogar, pode me adicionar. Estou a procura de novatos, pois também sou um. Se você já joga a mais tempo, também, pois preciso de um tutorial mais avançado.
:woodlehappy:

author: {'steamid': '76561197994769717', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 1268, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1204, 'last_played': 1577975438}
review:
Don't know why this has recieved so many negative review's It's a very solid action mmorpg with very fluid reticle combat.

There does seem to be a lack of any real sense of it being a mmo in the fact that it can be difficult to find willing people to do group content, however the game cant be blamed for that.

That being said questing and the sheer ammount of content can be a little overwhelming considering its all thrown at you relativly quickly with vague instruction remeniscant of Vindictus with more emphasis on the hub content.

I really enjoy the combat its so seamless its unreal how well combos can flow together, again thinking of Vindictus, and even Tera its so much more here. Skyforge just nailed it.

Graphicly its super shiney and chrome even on my nvidea gtx 1050, with only some frame loss during large encounters.

The only downside I can find is the combination of both a cash shop and a monthly fee to enjoy Patreon status. Pretty sure most f2p games get by with either one or the other but rarely are both present. That said I will be continuing this free 2 play hands on review in the future because currently im still enjoying the hell out of this.

author: {'steamid': '76561198140822604', 'num_games_owned': 333, 'num_reviews': 92, 'playtime_forever': 9530, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 535, 'last_played': 1622644704}
review: Si vous recherchez un MMO classique, passez votre chemin. Skyforge propose en effet sa propre vision du genre et s’avance avec un concept de missions à la carte tournées vers un unique but : développer tout le potentiel de votre personnage. Le titre ne laisse malheureusement pas de grande marge de manœuvre pour un jeu en ligne. À force d’heures de jeu, le joueur sera capable d’endosser tous les rôles avec son personnage, véritable couteau suisse doté d’un système de progression solide et engageant. Le tout est servi par un système de combat dynamique et des graphismes convaincants. Skyforge bénéficie en plus d’un modèle économique free-to-play relativement équitable pour tous les joueurs. Une réussite pleine de potentiel qui trouve aujourd’hui sa place au sein d’un secteur du MMO en pleine mutation… Have fun ! XD

author: {'steamid': '76561198259639584', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 11221, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 11221, 'last_played': 1499968077}
review:
This game is barely functional at best. Graphical bugs abound and I've lost track of how many times I've become imbedded in scenery or been killed by an attack that missed by several feet. Beyond the dodgy hit detection this is a game that loves one-hits that ignore health and defence. So enjoy clipping through the floor or drowning in knee deep water. There are achievments for that.
This is a MMO that actively discourages player interaction by isolating them in questionable coding. Play areas are set up for(and sometimes require) groups of 3, 5, or 10, but if you have any sort of story quest going on you are locked into solo play. Getting into pvp or grouping for a dungeon is so broken that players have to stand in the hub area begging for another 10 or more people to attempt to use the nonfunctional matchmaker and hope they are not the one left in the lobby. A ritual taking more than a halfhour on a good day. Five times I attempted to join the netoriously unbalance 'Battle of Golems' before I just started using one of the three freeium currencies to skip pvp assignments.
Now after spending weeks grinding along the endless tutorials that perminently bugged my menus on day two, I've hit a wall. There was some pacing as the base mission worked up to about lvl 55 before I unlocked divine form and the system decided I was ready for lvl100+content. Now I'm trapped at 60 indefinely. You need ingame money to progress, to buy exp, and I've been cut off. You can get little scraps by re-running basic areas without an objective, but you need to do 'directives', sets of randomly generated area assignments to get any real cash(or credits, the base nonfreemium). Now that the game is only giving me impossible to complete endgame tasks I can't grind up to at any sane rate.
It will be two more months of slow tedium before I can even consider attempting the lowend of their cheap trap ridden dungeons with their forced failule bosses.
I'm just done.

edit:skimmed for typos

author: {'steamid': '76561198082717633', 'num_games_owned': 90, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 3843, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3817, 'last_played': 1500666941}
review:
Bom, tenho pouco mais de 50Horas de jogo, então acho que posso OPINAR, em algumas coisas, as opiniões serão expostas aqui por meio de topicos.

PONTOS POSITIVOS !!!

1° Jogabilidade muito simples.
2° Facilidade em evoluir dentro do jogo.
3° Personalização de personagem completa (sem ser um Black Desert da vida).
4° Muitos players online.
5° Facilidade em conseguir itens dentro do jogo.
6° No começo do jogo o "sistema" te da varias ajudas.
7° Diversos tipos de "roupas" (fantasias, costumes).
8° Podemos usar mais de uma classe em um unico personagem (Ao total são 13).
9° Grande facilidade de ser jogado solo.
10° Graficos muito bonitos.
11° Eventos diferentes dos demais jogos de MmoRpgs

PONTOS NEGATIVOS !!!

1° Precisa-se de muito tempo e paciencia para conseguir os itens dentro do jogo.
2° Itens equipavei não alteram a aparencia do personagem, com excesão da arma.
3° PvP praticamente deserto
4° Numero de jogadores brasileiros extremamente baixo.
5° Muito monotono.
6° Todas as montarias são por cash.
8° Pré-Pay to win, pois alguns itens para evoluir algumas cosias no jogo, podem ser compradas por cash.

author: {'steamid': '76561198158165654', 'num_games_owned': 165, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 224, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 222, 'last_played': 1499811707}
review:
i like mmo rpgs and this is by far one the most viaualy appealing one ive played i like the story premies semmed nice you know going from human to god i pretty cool i think the touch of adding magic with tecchnolgy was a nice touch but thats where all the positives end 

1 combat syestem is plain and not enjoyable 
for me what makes or breaks a mmo rpg is the combat syestem and this one broke it for me its not engaging you can littalry  just hold down you primairy attack with the cryomancer in early stages in the game which gets very boring after ten mins

2 class syestem im kinda on the edge with this one while i think its a neat idea to be able to change class depending on the situation but that class may be incredably under-leveld because you spent all your time on paladin when the situation calls for a cryomancer but whoops you havent touched your cryomancer and now good luck with the boss with mmo rpgs it may seem cliche to have one set class but its there because it works and only having one character per account wtf is that about  

3 quests 
omg where to begain
you get your starting quest at the main hub and you telaport to it all warframe like and you are just bombarded with side quests that you may not want to do but nope you steped close to the thing you have to do it now oh you dont want to do that one well heres another and another and when you try to complte them if you walk too far away you drop the quest for the love of god its annoyying if i want to do a side quest i would like to accept it manually and not just have them shoved down my throat when i walk five feet in any direction 


all and all this "game" feels like some big movie with some gamplay in between and every thing and i mean almost everything is behind some sort of pay wall essentialy its a pay to win game and the devs dont gives a rats ass about the game they are trying to sell by looks alone and its a shame this game could have been a really big fleashed out fun to play mmo rpg but just crushed it with their greedy eyes 

but if your into an absolute shitshow of a game go right a ahed but if your a normal human being with a pulse stay away from this game its not woth the time tbh

author: {'steamid': '76561198170848583', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 84, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 84, 'last_played': 1499608989}
review:
Essa é minha analise sobre o jogo ''Skyforge'', lembrando que o ultimo MMORPG do tipo que joguei foi ''Priston Tale Brazil'' confere ai :D

I- Graficos ;3

Os graficos desse jogo são maravilhosos para um ''FTP'', são realistas e cheios de detalhes, as skills são lindas e da vontade de ficar invocando elas o tempo todo só pra ver os efeitos que saem dela, isso é maravilhoso!

II- Classes :D

Nesse jogo existem varias classes com habilidades e estilos de jogo difererntes, no inicio você ganha três classes: cryomancer, paladin e lightbinder, comprando o ''conteudo adcional'' que é disponibilizado de graça, você ganha uma classe a mais de graça! Cada classe tem sua importancia na hora de combate, as 3 iniciais são assim...

Cryomancer: Serve para dar dano, consegue usar uma skill de dano em area de poucos em poucos segundos.

Paladin: Ele é o Tank, costuma ficar na frente dos demais recebendo o dano em si. Tem ataques medianos e tambem possui um dano em area.

Lightbinder: Serve como suporte, pode recuperar a vida de seus companheiros e tem um ataque padrão que da um pouco de dano.

Todas as classes possuem uma skill de defesa que gera um escudo temporario em volta delas, no jogo existe a opção de alternar de classe quando você quiser e isso ajuda na formação de grupos!

III- Personalização de personagem :)

A personalização de personagem é muito boa, pois existem diversas opções de costumização, cores de cabelo, cores de pele, cores dos olhos, você pode mudar praticamente tudo em seu personagem, alem conforme você vai jogando varias roupas podem ser desbloqueadas para deixar seu personagem mais bonito e ganhar uns status extras.

IV- Jogabilidade ._.

Jogabilidade execelente, mecanicas de jogo modernas e divertidas, o jogador tem que mirar em cima do monstro para poder acertar as skills em seus oponentes, isso é algo que eu não via nos MMORPGS que eu jogava

V- Conclusão '='

Jogo moderno, com graficos e classes ótimos, jogabilidade divertida, história interessante entre outros pontos positivos que eu adorei no jogo.

VI- Recomendo ou não ? -.-

Recomendo pra caramba, me surpreendi com o game e garanto que você vai se surpreender e adorar ele assim como eu!

author: {'steamid': '76561198018394101', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 50, 'playtime_forever': 1297, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1297, 'last_played': 1497237969}
review:
The game is very grind oriented. To even think about getting better items, leveling up and acquiring materials you need to be doing bonus missions for runes and the huge islands before moving on to the next zone. What I found helps is leveling up all current classes to max before moving on to the next zone. (Archer is garbage, just a heads up)

I would say that paying money and upgrading is the only way you can progress anywhere near decently fast in this. Using the free 3 days you get from leveling up early on really shows you how much better players with the buff do in terms of money and materials.

There are a good amount of high level players running around in the low level islands (!!!) so that if you encounter problems, then you should just ask.

I like that you unlock a costume each time you max out a class.

author: {'steamid': '76561198075200926', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 145, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 145, 'last_played': 1498771834}
review:
ANALISE COMPLETA E SINCERA DE UM EX PRO PLAYER NO SKYFORGE 
Parte 1: Então, voltando lá pra quando lançou eu joguei e confeso que me perdi um pouquim mas nada que um pouco de atenção e dedicação não ajuda-se, eu tentei trazer 5 amigos de outro mmropg com abreviação de PW mas eles nem se quer passaram 1h jogando e desistiram por não animarem, acho que estranharam o game ou sei lá... eu continuei e fiquei mega viciado e me diverti muuuuito, muito mesmo até que fiquei um nivel forte e oque eu mais me encantei nesse game foi o pvp que era muito dificil de se conseguir, esgamadora parte dos players preferem o pve do jogo que na minha opinião é severamente repetitivo mas eu fiz sim o pve e fiz muito mesmo sempre indo atras dos pvp de cada um por si 3x3 5x5 10x10 e me dava muito bem no pvp, só perdia quando tinha um cara de poder muito equivalente, exemplo o dobro do meu poder, que mesmo as instancias tendo um sistema de equilibrar poder, não funcionava como deveria hehe, finalizando sobre o pvp, as filas pro pvp eram as mais demoradas e eu lembrava de cor os nomes da galera que ia pvp e até fiz amizade com alguns e talz, mas se você procura por pvp nesse game, pode tirar o cavalinho da chuva, é bem sofrido conseguir tirar um bom pvp do game mesmo depois da atualizaçao que colocou pvp na lista de missões diaria do povo. 

Outra coisa ruim do game é sobre o pay to win ou free to play, olha eu não sei agora mas pelo que li, acho que o jogo se tornou oficialmente pay to win, antes quando eu joguei era super tranquilo, o cash comprava em sua maioria, itens visuais antigos e novos, como roupas,montarias etc... mas pelo que vi nos ultimos players, por possuirem um poder extremamente longe dos players comuns acho que sim!, virou um pay to win!

Situação do Jogo: Eu tinha lido muito sobre o game, parece que no lançamento ele conseguiu bater 1 milhão de contas mas como é um game diferenciado e como eu falei antes, muitos amigos meus desanimaram por ser diferente e complicado, acredito que grande parte desses 1 milhão de players, tbm... eu vi um vídeo na net sobre um gringo falando que antes o game estava com 200 guilds/facção/clãs... e hoje em dia tem oque ? 5 ? sendo que uma é a dominante de longe ? a guild BR que é a Lunaticos são uns zé ninguem liderados por um cara que se acha o dono do game só porque é um tipo de GM, pensa em um cara arrogante até com os proprios players da guild rs... infelizmente você só avança no game sendo de uma guild que é outro defeito do game, não tem como jogar sem uma guild, você é forçado a entrar pra conseguir avançar em poder... e pra finalizar, o game deve possuir um log diario inferior a mil jogadores (falencia), antes mesmo de vir a expansão que estragou o game(conto jaja) as filas já eram demoradas de mais pra algumas dgs, era mais facil você ir sozinho mesmo, as vezes filas de 15 a 20 minutos, eu mesmo já fiquei 1 hora e vinte em uma fila de pvp e desisti assim como muitas outras vezes...

Terminando: Então, vamos falar sobre a expansão e mudança bruta do sistema do game, foi a expansão que trouxe o outlaw de classe nova e junto um monte de desgraça ?, quando anunciaram as mudanças teve até petição dos players endgame para não chegar essa att no servidor do NA, só no EU e mesmo assim não aconteceu e chegou a expansão, e oque aconteceu ? mudaram o sistema de poder... eu que antes tinha 843k de poder fui pra 1.8kk no dia que atualizou e nos 3 primeiros dias eu já peguei 10kk e jogando algumas semanas acabei com 33kk até parar de jogar por conta do sistema novo incluir varias quests diarias repetitivas que me davam nojo, vi muitos amigos inclusive mais fortes que eu pararem antes de mim e isso tambem foi um dos motivos que me fez largar o jogo... loguei ah um mes atras e vi que o jogo estava vazio e fui dar uma olhada nos mapas, fui até onde tem um boss forte pra caramba que nasce de tempos em tempos (Eternys) e lá vi 4 players, 3 deles tinham 500kk + e outro 150kk, enquanto no lobby do game tinha uns 15 players e só player inferior a 1k de poder, logo deduzi que o jogo acabou naquilo mesmo, nego não anima jogar e para antes mesmo de passar de 1k e os que passam são cashers, obvio que vai ter exceções.

Finalizando... 
Vantagens do jogo: diversão até chegar na parte de repetições de quests e é só questão de tempo pra vc enjoar...
Desvantagens: Paytowin, log baixo, jogo 90% pve e 10% pvp, isso tinha que ser equilibrado, não tem como jogar sem uma pantheon/guild/clã/facção, jogo em dollar e sem tradução...

author: {'steamid': '76561198171965287', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 1381, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1175, 'last_played': 1500364836}

author: {'steamid': '76561198162195119', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 52, 'playtime_forever': 527, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 527, 'last_played': 1499007945}
review:
10 FPS on i5 3570K OC 4.6 ghz, 12 gb ram and GTX 950 OC +210 gpu +710 memory. I test a lot of drivers.  Funny thing with GTX 275(2009) on very low settings, i can play at stable 30 FPS, but no more.  So, this game run LIKE SHIT on Directx11/12 cards.

Problem is GPU usage on 950 is 0-25%. Same problem on GTX 970. SLI GTX 970 same problem.  EVEN the GTX 275(2009) GPU usage low/medium/ultra settings doesen t matter it's  0-60% MAX, gpu usage. Game looks good, i think it's fun to play, but runs like SHIT. Windows 10 last version 3 fresh install, no miner or virus. Sad, i can't play this game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198088138688', 'num_games_owned': 272, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 174, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 174, 'last_played': 1514145478}
review:
CPU i5-4460，GTX 970，RAM 16GB，特效、畫面全部開最低，FPS 最高只有 20。
這款遊戲不知道程式做了什麼事，會完全耗盡你的 CPU，無法正常體驗遊戲，FPS 都在 10-18。
沒有部屬伺服器在亞洲，延遲超過 400ms。

2017/12/25 回來試一下，官方終於把 CPU 會被耗盡的 bug 修掉了，但網路延遲還是 3xx ms，仍然沒有部屬伺服器在亞洲。

author: {'steamid': '76561198001599576', 'num_games_owned': 1574, 'num_reviews': 38, 'playtime_forever': 234, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 234, 'last_played': 1493668632}
review:
I can see value here, but it didnt do it for me...

Dunno what is happening, but I just can't play any MMORPGs anymore...
Its always the same deal:  some farming; some farfetched plotline; then some starring at other peoples gear only to find out its actually paid for; some more farming; wikipedia to check stuff out and farm again; and so on...
On the process you might have a few moments of bliss when getting some rare shit, but this is neither fun playing nor skill demanding... (not an issue with this game specific, this applyies for most MMORPGs out there).

Skyforge at least tryies to do good... If you like grinding and exploring maps spiced with some community feeling, maybe you'll have more fun than I did. Cheers!

author: {'steamid': '76561198137866454', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 81, 'playtime_forever': 95, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 95, 'last_played': 1501685690}
review:
除了那个VIP卡结算时加成一倍有点吓人，其它看起来都还好，尤其是画面，第一关森林就给了人不小的惊喜，在网游中确实惊艳。
战斗系统直接让我想起了自毁前程的某灵，当然我在这里是褒义，我喜欢这种半锁定式的半角色半动作体验，一次带的技能不算多但是设计比较合理。
玩法和剧情有点老套，标准的：主城→副本→回城，没有开放世界也是比较可惜，本来可以和画面结合得很好。剧情嘛，，玩多人在线角色扮演我想也没多少人在乎吧，我是觉得天选之人的套路有点太多了，前有奈非天，后有抓根宝，当个平民英雄创造传奇不好么？
总得来说，游戏还值得一玩，推荐

author: {'steamid': '76561197978706908', 'num_games_owned': 296, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 4281, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4265, 'last_played': 1496909055}
review:
Ich hab das Spiel auf der RPC in Köln angespielt und fand es recht amüsant. Das Spiel versucht dinge anders anzugehen, wie zum Beispiel, dass es kein Levelsystem gibt sondern Prestige. Es gibt instanzierte Gebiete (ähnlich wie in Guildwars 1) nur dass man hier nicht den selben Fehler gemacht hat. Alle Spieler sammeln sich immer wieder in der Haupthalle und wenn man sich einmal etwas reingefuchst hat, was die ganzen Abkürzungen bedeuten mit dennen die Spieler um sich werfen, findet man auch schnell eine Gruppe für diverse Dungeons. Das eingebaute LFG Tool kann man ansonsten nicht benutzen. Das LFG Tool sucht nach gleichwertigen Leuten (also Leute die in deiner Prestige Range sind) und die variert viel zu stark, so dass man schonmal 2 Stunden (nochmal in Worten: zwei... ZWEI STUNDEN?! Ernsthaft?) warten kann bis man evtl. eine Gruppe gefunden hat. Dagegen sind 5 Minuten in der Haupthalle nen Witz. 

Es ist ein Action MMO RPG, wobei man gefühlt zu Anfang das MMO raus streichen kann. Man startet als Unsterblicher und ist auf den Weg ein Gott zu werden. Als Unsterblicher bedient man sich diverser Klassen, wo sich jede auch anders spielen lässt. Spielt die Klasse, die euch am besten gefällt und mit der ihr am besten klar kommt. Lest euch vor allen Dingen die Fertigkeiten durch, sobald ihr alles freigeschaltet habt. Einige Klassen haben Kombofähigkeiten, die man nicht auf den ersten Blick erkennt. Das Spiel nimmt euch da auch nicht an die Hand und erklärt die Besonderheiten der Klasse. Wer Weg zum Gott ist beschwerlich und langweilig. Ihr müsst Missionen machen, die eine gewisse Schwierigkeit haben. Die Missionen sagen sogar, wie viel Prestige vorrausgesetzt wird, um diese Mission gut zu spielen. Doch da läuft man irgendwann gegen eine Wand. Warum? Weil die möglichkeiten Prestige zu bekommen einfach mies gemacht sind. Es gibt zwei Institute wo man täglich mehrfach forschen kann mit jeweils anderer Währung (beides unproblematisch wenn man die Nebenquest und Co. mitmacht). Diese sind Möglichkeiten sind aber täglich begrenzt. Spricht, das Game entscheidet, wann du genug gemacht hast für den Tag. Danach bringt es nichts, ich wiederhole, NICHTS... dieses Spiel weiter zu spielen. Bevor man jetzt meckert "Es gibt doch noch die Bastionen die auch Macht / Prestige" geben, ja, aber auch da kann man nur eine Quest täglich machen, auch wenn die sich bis zu 7 Queststacks aufsparen lassen. Danach ist auch Ende. 

Ach ja, warum kein MMO, weil du diese Hauptmissionen am besten alleine machst, je mehr Leute dabei sind, umso schwieriger wird es. Hast du jemanden dabei, der stärker ist, sind die Gegner automatisch auf seinen Level. In den Openworld Elementen sind andere Spieler auch nervig, da du Quest hast, wie "Töte x davon" und mehrere Spieler am Spawn stehen und alles wegknallen.

Wie auch immer, ich hab mich da durchgequält und mein Charackter ist ein Gott geworden. Ab jetzt soll das Spiel erst richtig los gehen, so sagte man mir auf der RPC... Ok, ich hab jetzt eine Gottform, quasi, den Bad Ass Battle Modus im Transformer Stil. Das Ding kostet jedoch Glauben, der sich so langsam anhäuft, dasss du quasi eine Woche spielst um es in einer Mission für 15 Minuten zu nutzen. Also spielst du so wie bisher.

Zusätzlich gibt es irgendwann auf den ganzen Missionsweg die Freischaltung für die "Directives". Die Dailymissionen, die man ebenfalls noch machen sollte. Zu Anfang sind die noch ganz nett gehalten auch wenn man da auch nur Solo durch rennt. Später als Gott kommt nochmal die doppelte Anzahl an Quest hinzu, aber die Belohnung wird auch besser. Man bekommt neben den Standardquest, mache Mission X (solo möglich), Töte X von Rasse Y, Töte Named Mob (du hast zwar eine Ahnung auf welcher Karte, aber nicht wo --> Google), kommen plötzlich noch Quest hinzu wie, mache Mission X (Gruppe), Invasionsmission (Gruppe). Spätestens ab diesen Punkt lernt man was die Leute schreiben in der Haupthalle, da das LFG Tool wie schon mal erwähnt, keinen nutzen hat. Hier tritt nun die Problematik auf, die man schon bei den Missionen hat, die solo machbar sind und man mit mehreren machen möchte. Die Mobs passen sich an den stärksten Spieler an. Wenn der stärkste Spieler dann noch seine Gottform hat, klappen die Missionen sogar erstaunlich gut, auch wenn man selber nur hinterher rennt und nichts tut. Hat der Spieler nicht seine Gottform und der Rest der Gruppe hat nicht annähernd das selbe Prestige, klappt die Mission nicht. Solltet ihr so glücklich sein und alle Missionen schaffen können, ist die Belohnung immens. Da gibt es Freischaltungen von 5 Rängen in den Instituten (ein Prestige Boost), der sonst Wochen in Anspruch nimmt oder auch Ränge in Bastionen frei schaltet (Prestige Boost & neue Nebenfertigkeiten) wofür man sonst auch Tage brauch. Um essentiel voranzukommen, ein MUSS. Für Leute die mit Freunden spielen entweder nur gemeinsam machen, wobei dann die Missionen echt happig werden oder mehrere Wochen nur einloggen, Währung ausgeben, ausloggen, ehe man annähernd die nächsten Ziele angehen kann.

Frustierend...

Kleinigkeiten, die einen noch sehr stören:
- du suchst nach Informationen über das Spiel mit google, was man noch so machen kann und findest nur veralteten Mist. Das Spiel irgendwann im Frühling komplett geändert. Es gibt gewisse Mechaniken gar nicht mehr.
- PVP Missionen in den "Directives" (nur über LFG Tool richtig möglich - Bitte nehmen Sie sich Zeit, die nächste Freie Arena ist für Sie schon reserviert). Diese kann man Skippen mit einer speziellen Währung, die man regelmäßig bekommt, wenn man sich einloggt, aber das schließt alle anderen Optionen aus diese irgendwo anders zu benutzen.
- Es gibt sowas wie ne Story in dem Spiel, aber die ist mehr als müßig und völliger Nonsense in diesem Spiel.
- Die Mimik der NPCs ist nur creppy.
- Kein vorhandenes Lootsystem & Ausrüstung nur bei Questabschluss/Missionsabschluss.
- Openworld Elemente unsinnig mit nicht Partyspieler

Fazit:
Alle Characktere sind gleich, die Ausrüstung unterscheidet sich nur in wenigen Punkten, was keine Varianz in das Spiel rein bringt. Dreh und Angelpunkt ist die Macht / Prestige, die es nur begrenzt am Tag gibt. Für mich kein gutes Spiel.

author: {'steamid': '76561198244658562', 'num_games_owned': 20, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 2101, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 881, 'last_played': 1648603087}
review:
good game
- great views
- strong story
- fun

author: {'steamid': '76561198021252986', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 354, 'playtime_forever': 7282, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3627, 'last_played': 1572463137}
review: Хорошая игра, даже слишком хорошая по стандартам игр российскогоп роисхождения. Пример удачного "собирательного плагиата": система боя очень похожа на Newerwinter, графика, маунты, дизайн уровней , анимация, поведение монстров - на James Cameron`s Avatar:the game и Dragon Age: Inquisition, классы персонажа - прямые отсылки к фильмам, книгам и играм разных времён и стран. Приведу несколько примеров. Берсерк - это вылитый Гатс, только с цепным мечом, напоминающим мечи и топоры берсеркеров Кхорна из Warhammer 400000:Dawn of War; при этом игра про Гатса вышла на 2 года позже, чем Skyroge. Стрелок-наёмник в шляпе  с двумя пистолетами - нечто среднее между Данте из серии Devil May Cry и Ван Хельсингом из фильма. Палладин сочетает навыки "товарищей" из Warcarft 3 и серии Heroes of Might and Magic. Стрелок с различными типами стрел - The Lord of the rings: conquest. Богатырь в представлении не нуждается (классический из былин). Чувствуется, что среди разработчиков был хотя бы один палеонтолог, как минимум-любитель. Лесной щиторог - гибрид эмболотерия (древнего носорога с раздвоенным коротким рогом на носу) и бобра, моа похожи на настоящих вымерших моа, только с гребнем казуара, живут на острове наори, а в реальной жизни их всех съели люди племени маори - аборигены Новой Зеландии; моазавр - вылитый ютараптор, только с рогом на носу (и действительно, эволюционные пути динозавров и птиц разошлись очень давно - во времена первых динозавров, либо птицы и динозавры произошли от общего предка, интересующиеся могут почитать про протоависа). Главная особенность игры - прокачка одного персонажа. способного менять классы в любой момент вне боя. Только оружие и артефакты сильно различаются и подходят для кастомизации класса, остальные предметы инвентаря одинаково пассивно усиливают персонажа (есть только один тип кольца, браслета, амулета и т.п., просто "низкоуровневые" предметы усиливают слабее). Конечно, есть и минусы. Без доната (премиум аккаунта) прокачка идёт вдвое медленнее, невозможно получить постоянного ездового животного (за исключением усердного фарма и редких конкурсов/событий), место в инвентаре покупается за внутриигровую валюту (кредиты, начисляют за выполнение миссий), стоят дорого. С другой стороны, однотипность предметов позволяет продавать экипировку низкого уровня после получения и надевания новой, высокоуровневой (в инвентаре красная стрелка означает, что можно заменить вещь на лучшую, сам инвентарь очень удобный; карты местности и мира чуть менее удобны). В принципе, без доната можно неплохо прокачаться (первые 3 дня премиум дают бесплатно) и постепенно пройти примерно половину игры в одиночку. Полубогов в сети не очень много, поэтому велик шанс приглашения в группу и в пантеон, что позволит проходить групповые задания/идти в рейд на боссов и даст небольшие пассивные бонусы каждому игроку, как минимум, в пантеоне). Игра очень проста, но быстро не надоедает благодаря возможности сменить класс. Рекомендую широкому кругу аудитории, опять же, из-за множества отсылок к другим, зачастую дорогим, играм. Те, кто хотят попробовать - сразу загрузите бесплатное "DLC (free steam welcome gift)", позволит быстро прокачаться в первые 3 дня. За это время я прошёл около четверти кампании и развил до максимума 4 класса из 13, очень быстро для игр такого типа. Большую часть механики игры можно освоить за первые 2-3 часа.

review: Skyforge was without a doubt an MMO brimming with potential but the developers just keep pushing the game in the wrong direction , causing most of the game's mechanics to be tedious and boring . Most elements are also P2W heavy as people who pay can easily edge over those who dont . Players who pay also receive legendary unique gear which is without a doubt very strong in PVE . I cant recommend this game because it just isnt what it promised to be.

author: {'steamid': '76561197994862876', 'num_games_owned': 184, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 38, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 38, 'last_played': 1497544168}
review: Also zuerst möchte ich sagen, ein kostenloses Spiel ist immer eine freine Sache, jedoch ist dieses Spiel so dermaßen fehlerhaft, es bluten einem die Augen. Schon im Prolog bekommt man endlose Ladebildschirme zusehen, welche einem nur einen hard reset des Rechners als Möglichkeit lassen, um diesen Schmutz zu beenden. Ständig werden einem beim Starten des Spiels hunderte verschiedene Fehlercodes angezeit... Finger weg von diesem Dreck. Sehr schade, denn die wenigen Minuten haben echt Spaß aufkommen lassen. Aber es ist eben unspielbar mit diesen ganzen Fehlern. Hauptsache das Payment System funktioniert...

While it's not make-or-break, i was also running it on Maximum and the game is nowhere near as good looking at the screenshots in the store would lead you to believe. 5/10. Passable, but not worth the time.

author: {'steamid': '76561198080503579', 'num_games_owned': 1307, 'num_reviews': 132, 'playtime_forever': 427, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 408, 'last_played': 1497781747}
review:
Really fun game for solo and co op with friends. There's 13 classes, 3 to start, the others you earn as you play. The graphics are good and gameplay is really solid and unique for MMO's. 
Good character custimization, this game resembles Phantasy star to me in some ways. DESPITE WHAT IT SAYS this game DOES HAVE CONTROLLER COMPATABILITY! It is in beta still, but it does work prety well though the controls aree odd, and it changes the look of the UI completely when using a controller. You do have to have Enable controller and then it changes your entire interfacve to controller (whether it be xbox or ps). navigating menus can be a little weird but its pretyty well done and again, is still in beta for controller so it will fix over time. 
This is not a pay 2 win game, all you get with paying is boosts to level up faster and get more credits, and you earn premium currency which you can use to buy Aesthetics that dont offer anything besides looking cool (and yes they are permanent items). You can earn the premium items in gam,e already thoughby doing harder missions so really its just a matter of patience. 

This is a great game one I personally am a fan of, it has good story, unique character stuff, some of the acting is good some kinda meh, overall I'd give it a 8.5/10 and would highly recommend, especially for a good MMO that ppl who want to use controllers can play, and a game you dont have to click a bunch of icons in a bar of abilitys, its just a set amount of stuff.

author: {'steamid': '76561198051449893', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 2274, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 985, 'last_played': 1538344244}
review:
Il gico è bello! Sopratutto per essere un free to play. Per alcuni versi è anche migliore di altri mmorpg che ho P2P. Il sitema di combo rende il gamplay, anche il grinding, molto divertente. Il sistema di customizzazione in-game funziona ed il fatto di poter cambiare classe in ogni momento è fantastico. Aspetto di proseguire, perchè, di solito, le peggiori pecche di questi giochi spuntano nei contenuti endgame, che non ho ancora raggiunto.
Ah, per quanto sia poco master race, questo gioco (apparte i menù) rende molto bene se giocato con un controller, lo consiglio vivamente.

review:
El juego en sí, básicamente es muy bueno y la idea del mismo es novedosa y diferente, pero solo una cosa me molesta y es que no es un mundo totalmente abierto, uno no tiene la posibilidad de moverse libremente a través de los mapas si no es por una epecie de teletransportación y eso no hace dinámico a SkyForge. Yo lo considero como un mmo semi mundo abierto instanciado. Una idea que en lo personal es pésima y hace aburrida la experiencia final de este juego. Ah! no se pueden tener alts.

Lo positivo es el dinamismo en las peleas y lo configurable que llegan a ser los personajes

review: Ich finde das spiel für Zwischen durch OKAY aber wenn man jemand ist der das spiel 30Std Durch suchtet dann hat man einfach kein bock auf das spiel und finde es ziemlich doof das man für eine raid ca. 50min warten muss und für Kleinere Dungeons ca 20min, [FAZIT] es ist kein Gutes Solo Spiel und man sollte es mit mehreren Freunde Zusammen Anfangen und auch Zusammen Hoch Spielen Oder wenn einer etwas höher ist von der Story kann er ihn auch ein bishen helfen weil es dauert echt wenn man null ahnung in das game reingeworfen wird. [TIPPS] Für die leute die diesen Review Lesen und gerade erst Anfangen wollen Spielt den Paladin/RevolverMan den man durch das Wilkommen's Paket Bekommt auf der shop seite ist Sogar Kostenlos! Oder etwas Später Den Nekromancer weil die Klassen Sehr Großen Schaden Besitzen und Sehr viel Aushalten.

author: {'steamid': '76561198074470929', 'num_games_owned': 61, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 21567, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5357, 'last_played': 1616272723}
review: I have been playing Skyforge for a couple of weeks now and am hooked. It is different enough to other MMO's that I have played to be interesting and similar enough that it has been an easy transition. There are some bugs and graphics glitches but the world is awesome. I am not overly happy with their customer service, but it is not enough to take me away from the game. There seems to be a good world population in the EU servers and I can only imagine that the US servers are even more populated. Very worth the time to create an account and see for yourself. Free-to-Play with in-game purchases.

author: {'steamid': '76561198130720269', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 15981, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 12942, 'last_played': 1498229219}
review:
Skyforge est un mmo qui sort du lot autant pas ses qualités et ses défauts.

  -Aucune prise de tête pour le stuff et build.
  -Des mécaniques de combat bien spécifique a chaque classe.
  -Pas de p2w abusif.
  -Le jeu est guider sous forme d'instance, avec quelques zones ouvertes.
  -Ce joue très bien a la manette malgré certains bugs génant.
  -Les joueurs sont mis a niveaux pour les dj et raid.
  -recherche de groupe très long.
  -très répétitif.

J'ai une certaines frustration aufaite qu'on ne puisse ce faire un vrai build. Les tutos et même le site officiel ne sont plus a jour ce qui n'aide pas les débutants.
Le jeu peut etre rapide ou long, chaque fois que vous faites une instances sont niveaux de difficulté augmente.
Les maps sont belles et grande mais affreusement vide, quelques fidèles a récuperer dans les couloirs et des petits objectif secondaire.

En gros j'apprécie le faite que ce n'est pas un jeu prise de tête et surtout chronophage, en duo ou en groupe il a un fort potentiel. Il est très beau et peu groumand.
Il me fais fortement pencer a warframe mais en style fantastique/médiéval.

review: I would really recommend this game, but there are a few things to note. There are glitches, and things that can throw people off. Graphic, and gameplay. I encounter a lot of launching, logging in, and logging off glitches, and it crashes a lot. However, the pros knock that off. It is a very cosmetic game, plenty of choices to costume your character. From boxers, to a frickin power suit. The game play is not boring, and it brings a lot of hack in slash and stragedy into it. Combos and such. Therefore, play it! It's free, you got nothing to lose!

author: {'steamid': '76561198055808639', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 3697, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3142, 'last_played': 1540444443}
review:
FYI. This game is good. If you think this is P2W game, please. You need more effort to be good in this game because this game is so limitless. In PvE, you need more grinding to be stronger. and if you play on PvP, go on a PvP with same level play.

Don't get rid of any review, trust me this game is better with people that having a grind enthusiast. 28 hours and still doing better without using money to play. Eventually you'll get that 7 or 8 digit of prestige if you are loved this game.

and you need to know that you don't have to waste money on this if you have good effort to play this. No need to be good, but slowly better. You'll get what you want.

CLASS :
You can get it by more quest so you can get all class without spending money at the beginning.

COSTUME :
This one is simple, mastery more class to get more costumes, or else just quest to get 1 million to buy another color, this is so simple to get all of the costumes.

MOUNT :
There's a quest to get a coolest bike, kick your lazy ass and get into it.

PRESTIGE/MIGHT :
Worship more, gain more followers, and you'll get stronger. Slow but sure. If you want to play PvP. Try PvP with same level match. This will be fun and killing time~

EQUIPMENT :
Git gud without money? Simple, try raid with another players to get a good equipment. Equipment surely doesn't really matter if you calculate all.

ANY OF STARTER PACKS IN STEAM :
Buy that things and login in your prefered server, you might be in wrong server input if you get your outlaw in another server, shame on you if you do this.

DUDE THAT IS SO SIMPLE, NO P2W IN THIS GAME. PLS.

Thankyou. Best game ever. Good game Allods.

author: {'steamid': '76561197993855271', 'num_games_owned': 217, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 309, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 301, 'last_played': 1496734282}
review:
Don't even try. You'll think it's okay for 5 minutes until you'll want to add a friend and play with them.

If you want to play Solo, you might be able to play for about a day before killing yourself.
If you want to play with more the 3 friends, forget it, it's stuck at three.
If you want to be introduced by the game with friends, forget it. you'll first have to complete an hour of crap before being able to group (At which point in your life do you think this is a good idea?)

If you just want to connect, show your shitty elephant mount in the HUB to strangers, this is the game for you.
If you want to have fun in an MMO, play world of warcraft.


F2P ? not good enough, they should pay us for playing their game.

It's always very sad these games. they start off with good ideas and beautifull graphics and then they forget people are actually going to play it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198307312666', 'num_games_owned': 108, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 5140, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3628, 'last_played': 1527686026}
review: Graphics are nice, combat is really fun but all the enjoyment stops when you realize that as free player there is not possibility on earth to catch up with others, you just can't, group finder doesn't work, no one queues for pvp zones so daily objectives for pvp win have to be completed with currency which you may eventually run out of and have to buy argents to supplement it. Even the ingame EVENTS are designed so you have to buy Argents for real money to be able to reach final rewards in events. I played it on release with original Ascension Atlass and now with Ascension update with Atlass removed but it is still very much pay to progress. Play it unless you want pure fun of combat and repeatable dungeons and dont absolutely care about group pvp/pve and progression high.

author: {'steamid': '76561198072813317', 'num_games_owned': 125, 'num_reviews': 51, 'playtime_forever': 807, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 807, 'last_played': 1496163248}
review:
¿Qué le han hecho al juego? Han quitado las únicas dos cosas que creo que merecían la pena...

El juego consiste en que eres un tipo o una tipa inmortal (al que el agua sí le puede matar) que aunque lleva una metralleta enorme (u otra arma similar de gran envergadura) puede ir vestido de colegial/a y va por el mundo matando y matando sin parar, mientras una inteligencia artificial con la voz de una "cantante" de reggaeton le va dando alguna pista ocasional que ayuda más bien poco. Además, es capaz de montar en bestias y máquinas voladoras que les resulta costoso subir las cuestas cuando una piedrecita de 5 cm se interpone en su camino.



PROS:

1- Buenos gráficos y paisajes. En ese aspecto, el juego está muy bien.

2- Buena jugabilidad (aunque con sus fallos) y sistema non target, es fácil manejar a tu pj.

3- Gran, aunque relativa, posibilidad de persopnalizar a tu ÚNICO personaje.

4- Con tu ÚNICO personaje puedes tener todas las clases.

5- En general el juego parece estar bien optimizado y, salvo en un par de ocasioens puntuales, no he tenido lag.

6- Al ser un juego nuevo, aún le queda mucho tiempo para evolucionar y meter mucho contenido... aunque más les vale que se den prisa...




CONTRAS:

1- Instanciado y aburrido. Te toca repetir mucha veces mapas (aunque tienes la opción de saltarte las misiones con unas monedas) y el sistema de leveo (bueno, no leveas, consigues prestigio) es lo mismo de siempre, sin originalidad y, además, monótono. Me recuerda mucho en eso al Neverwinter Online... y para eso, juego al Neverwinter.

2- Solo puedes tener un personaje, el cual esta ligado a tu cuenta, sin posiblidad de borrarlo o crear más. ¿En serio? Me encanta (y seguro a mucha otra gente) tener muchos personaje con diferentes modos de jugarlo y diferentes clases... aquí no lo hacen así porque puedes tenerlas todas... pero me parece una chorrada. Y ya ni te cuento de a quien le guste el rolplay...

3- Quitaron la posibilidad de conseguir diamantes con créditos, una de las dos cosas por lo que yo salvaba el juego. No solo demuestra que abrieron el camino al pay to win, sino que además no tienen grandes ideas para aportar contenido nuevo con el que mejorar el juego (ver contra 6). En vez de eso, podían haber pensado en otro tipo de moneda (que solo se consiga con dinero real) que pagara ciertos artículos cosméticos o que estos solo se pudieran comprar con dinero real... anda que...

4- Quitaron el atlas, la segunda cosa por la que salvaba este juego... y tampoco era gran cosa y necesitaba de mucha mejora. Con el pretexto de que a la gente no le gustaba jugar con una clase que no era la que tenía en mente la quitaron porque decía que la progresión era muy lenta (o eso he leído en foros). Ahora juegas una de las clases al principio hasta ir desbloqueando otras... joder, como antes... solo han cambiado el sistema, que es más aburrido y unidireccional....

5- Todas las clases son iguales. Me explico: salvo por matices, todos duelistas son iguales, los paladines lo mismo y así con todas. Quitaron el atlas y ahora todas las clases son idénticas (aunque antes el atlas lo podías rellenar del todo y el resultado sería el mismo a la larga). Un juego que no ofrece la posiblidad de hacerte un personaje "único" (en las características y forma de jugarlo) pierde mucho para mi.

6- La tienda es muy pobre. Tiene muy pocos artículos y desde que quitaron la opción de cambiar créditos por diamantes te imposbilita comprar muchas cosas. ¿Para eso quitasteis esa opción, porque no teníais mucho que ofrecer? ¿Pagas diamantes por ser premium y poco más en un juego tan monónono e instanciado?



Conclusión: el juego no está mal y te lo puedes pasar bien, pero en la mayoría de los aspectos no es para tirar cohetes. En lo gráfico y poco más (que es en lo que parece que a la gente más le gusta)... pero hay otras cosas que creo que son más importante. Me parece aburrido en muchos aspectos.

Francamente, no auguro un buen futuro para el juego (puede que me equivoque y cinco años después la gente se ria de mi análisis). Aún así, tienen de reconducirlo... aunque como no espabilen...

author: {'steamid': '76561198145313040', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 11789, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5761, 'last_played': 1533143158}
review:
Because of the complete lack of any actual customer service or assistance.. In fact there has only been blatant attempts at goading and actively not assisting.. This is the review I will be posting not only on Steam, but every forum and every thread for your game I can find.

"A pretty unique gameplay setup and for those who like to grind, this game is fun for free to play and I fully recommend it on the free to play side However.. you need to make sure you are selecting the correct server for virtually everything. 

There was nothing showing this game even had a different server for North America and Europe so I had to start over. If that wasn't bad enough, when I decided to jump from free to play to paying something for the game the nightmare began.

As far as making a purchase in this game: "This game is fraud, plain and simple." They deliver purchases to the wrong server then refuse to do anything about it. I had to reach out to my financial institution and dispute the charges because of this. What a headache!"

author: {'steamid': '76561198203961431', 'num_games_owned': 192, 'num_reviews': 1356, 'playtime_forever': 81, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 81, 'last_played': 1495874987}
review:
Skyforge - это старая игра.
Графон в целом неплох, но размытость иногда зашкаливает.
Музончик тоже неплох, но диалоги иногда не имеют синхронизации с губками.
Сюжет интересен, ну как интересен, мы знаем , что диалог будет связан с тем, чтобы пойти куда-то и убивать, но это ММО.
Геймплей имеет разнообразность, но не в начале.
Минусы этой игры- это ошибки, во время загрузки локаций(либо вы потеряете соединение с интернетом, либо будет бесконечная загрузка). Помогает перезагрузка.
Если вы готовы играть в эту игру , перезагружая ее, то можете качать.
Можно было бы добавить парочку патчей, но нет.
Я бы не советовал эту игру, если бы не сиськи, после которых я передернул. Я против копирования игр в стим без каких-либо изменений. Хотя я не похотливое животное. 
Надеюсь, что над игрой поработают.
Ах да, для запуска игры требуется лаунчер от издателя.

author: {'steamid': '76561197968143195', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 56419, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 10618, 'last_played': 1507041725}
review:
这游戏真好玩？不坑钱。

那是我的错觉。

这个游戏的开端并不是你独立完成成为神的主线任务。

而是你开始装备副本的，才是噩梦体验的开始。

满世界外国字就不说了，有些外国人其实是非常歧视新人的。

在副本里，他们可以莫名其妙的把你踢掉，让你拿不到奖励，让他们自己的人进副本打。

你想玩这个游戏？

OK

1，英语还是要好的，不然你被人家当傻叉是绝对可能的

2，遇到坏的外国人不能软，要斗争到底，TMD还当现在是1842年？

3，一定要团结，遇到不讲中国字的装逼外国人，一定要在副本最后一刻飞了。

4，外国人也是有好人的，相对来说人渣还是有的。

author: {'steamid': '76561198001826330', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 79, 'playtime_forever': 854, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 854, 'last_played': 1494760045}
review:
Fun for about 12-15 hours, than the Pay-2-have-fun hits you right in the face.

PvP obviously is P2W, but that's common in games like this.

All in all enjoyable though. Just know that after 12 hours of gameplay or 8 different daily log-ins you'll be faced with a system that almost doesn't progress on a F2P basis.
Now if you're ok with that, then you have a very good looking actionbased game with simple controls that is a decent mix of sci-fi and fantasy.

author: {'steamid': '76561198083026163', 'num_games_owned': 56, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 23709, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1688, 'last_played': 1621506909}
review: I've played this game for a while, got heavily addicted back when it first came out with the massive talent trees. People's issues are all the same, they believe it's p2w. It's really not, paying for premium can speed up the gameplay but you get there all the same. I've played without premium, havn't even used my free premium days yet, and I dont see anything wrong. Plus its a free to play game, ofcourse it's going to have the option of in game purchases, how else do they continue to update the game and put work into it? making games aint free and it aint easy either people got to remember that. Buying premium is supporting the developers, and there is nothing wrong with that.

author: {'steamid': '76561198181170903', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 5792, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5021, 'last_played': 1497173927}
review: Oyun gerçekten muhteşem. Gerek pvp gerek sınıf sistemi olsun. Standart MMO oyunları unutun. Yeni bir oyun keşfetmek isteyen kesinlikle başlamalı. Bildiğimiz bütün MMORPG oyunlar birbirinin aynısı. Karakterlerin skill yapılarından tutun özelliklerine kadar. Fakat SKYFORGE bu konuyu tamamen baştan yazmış. Açtığınız sınıf ne olursa olsun istediğiniz sınıfa anında geçiş yapabiliyorsunuz. Partyde healer mı eksik kenara geçin ve support oynayın. Tek yapmanız gereken skilleri açmak. Tamamen emek oyunu. P2W kesinlikle değil. En fazla alabileceğiniz premiumdur. Oda her oyunda standart. Oyunda aldığınız elmaslar ile yapabileceğiniz şeyler kostüm, görev geçme taşı vs. Öyle çin mmorpg leri gibi bas parayı vur kır parçala mantığı yok. Ayrıca detaylı rehber tarzında tanıtım videosu youtube de yeterince mevcut. Ben oradan izleyerek başladım. Fikir sahibi olmak isteyenler izleyebilir. Herkese iyi oyunlar dilerim.

author: {'steamid': '76561198027808066', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 142, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 142, 'last_played': 1495194650}
review:
J'avais commencé en Beta.

Le jeu était très répétitif, mais les nombreuses possibilités d'amélioration et l'Atlas de l'Ascension avait le mérite de proposer quelque chose de nouveau dans le domaine du MMORPG. Le jeu était intéressant et donnait le vertige par moments, il ne restait qu'à rajouter du contenu.

A la place, ils ont preferé simplifier et faire perdre de l'intérêt à leur jeu pour attirer le plus grand nombre... Ca se fera sans moi.

author: {'steamid': '76561197987007593', 'num_games_owned': 728, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 9567, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7014, 'last_played': 1624143350}
review:
So being 100+ hours into the game now, you can definitely accomplish a lot more than many folks here would suggest without paying. I recently passed 1 million prestige, and the only money I spent on the game that influenced my advancement was the second starter pack thing they offer you when you're new, outside of that I bought a couple mounts. There are some points were progress really slows down (just before you get your God form), and it seems almost as if you have hit the "pay wall" many talk about, but you really just need to stick with it, as you'll soon have your God form, and from there progress jumps to a speed that seems insane at first as long as you complete your daily directives. Yes, you'll usually have a PVP quest in your directives, but you are also given 2 stimulants per day that can be used to skip that, and the rest will be provincial adventures that you should easily be able to solo, or group adventures, that you can always find people looking for more in region chat.

I haven't really had any issues with free progression so far, and really don't see the point in "paying to win" as a lot of the PVE content is either equalized, or scales to your current power, and nobody does PVP. Even if PVP were active, and you couldn't pay to power up, there's always going to be the no lifers that are still far ahead of everybody else messing with the balance of it, equalized PVP is the way to go in games like this, though I can't say if it has any equalized PVP as this is not something I was looking for in the game anyway.

Another thing I will touch on is the population of the game, as I see many negative reviews stating the game is dead. I have not experienced this, at very off hours, there are still plenty of players around, enough that you can still run full group content, during peak hours, there's tons of people around. I will note that I play on the North American server, and that this may not be the case on the European server.

Something fairly important to note is that the default server for the game is Europe, if you would like to play on the North American server, you will need to select it in a dropdown in the launcher, so make sure you do this before playing for the first time if you grabbed the free starter pack, or any other packs, as they will be registered to whichever server you enter after obtaining them.

tl;dr
I haven't encountered any issues with "pay to win" players as I only play PVE and it is somewhat irrelevant to do there (and in general as progression is quite fast after you get your God form), and the populations is fine on the NA server. If you enjoy action games, it's definitely worth a look.

author: {'steamid': '76561198166557277', 'num_games_owned': 113, 'num_reviews': 73, 'playtime_forever': 30883, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 25214, 'last_played': 1658428069}
review: In the 400 hours I have recorded on the game, I had the opportunity to know and understand what this game is based on. The game works on the principle that you are constantly improving the character in the same adventures and missions. Overall, it seems to me that for how much so-called grind you are forced to take in the game, in return I would expect at least some lively gameplay, some dynamic gameplay, but I was disappointed. The developers haven't added anything proper during the few years I've been watching this game. The only thing that can be done in the game are the so-called invasions and it is extremely boring, it's like a "robot" all the same mechanically, so you won't really enjoy the game. I don't know, I used to really enjoy this game, but after those 400 hours, my passion for these recurring adventures somehow disappeared ...

author: {'steamid': '76561198070548785', 'num_games_owned': 498, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 2951, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2895, 'last_played': 1598205716}
review:
After about 45 hours in i can make a decent review so lets get to it first things first with MY experience with the game i haven't noticed any pay-2-win that said you can pay money for items but mostly on costumes and transport u can also earn most these items just by playing the game, the game does take a little to really start up but if you've played warframe and games like it where you need to grind this isnt a big deal its a very fun and entertaining game in my opinion i think you should give the game a chance i mean what have you to lose i mean you might even enjoy it the community has been fun for me all i did was dance with a random many others joined in and then we formed a pantheon called dance party.

For players who dislike grinding still give this game a chance its a FTP its good to past timee and have fun with friends.
Some of you who've played the game longer then me may have better judgement like i said i only have around 45 hours in the game at the time of this reveiw so have fun eveyone.

author: {'steamid': '76561198020823636', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 125, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 125, 'last_played': 1492517436}
review: Chcę przeprowadzić recenzję tej gry, aby ostrzec innych przed niepotrzebnym marnowaniem czasu potrzebnym na pobranie tej gry. Otóż gdy zaczynałem grać w tą jakże zacną grę, wydawało mi się wszystko cacy. Grze poświęciłem około 2 godziny lecz to wystarczyło bym mógł się o niej w pełni wypowiedzieć. Po przejściu prologu i zdaniu sobie sprawy, że to jedna z tych gier gdzie jesteś nieśmiertelnym arcybogiem i musisz ratować świat przed złem, dostałem solidny strzał w ryj. Kiedy z nadzieją i zachłannością pochłaniałem kolejne ficzery jakie ta gra mi podsuwała, zorientowałem się, że ta gra polega wyłącznie na powtarzaniu zamkniętych niewielkich plansz. Grafika robi dobre wrażenie, lecz jest to jedna z tych tzw. wydmuszek. Tu jest arcynudno. Mimo paru fajnych pomysłów, takich jak dość nieźle wymyślony świat czy swobodne przemieszczanie się pomiędzy poszczególnymi klasami to jest to pusta i monotonna gra. Przechodząc do pozytywów, jest dość widowiskowy system walki oraz parę fajnych pomysłów o których wspomniałem wcześniej. Gdyby to tak lepiej sklecić wyszłaby przyzwoita gra, no ale wyszło jak wyszło. Solidne 2/10. Nie polecam.

author: {'steamid': '76561198063840417', 'num_games_owned': 744, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 567, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 567, 'last_played': 1509241368}
review:
Edit 2 : Kullanıcı adım Ertadis Aldies. isteyen ekleyebilir 141 prestijdeyim item kasmanıza yardımcı olurum.


Edit : Yeni güncelleme geldi prestij sistemi değişmiş lvl sistemine benzetmişler.



Yaklaşık 2 senedir oynuyorum. Oyun aşırı gelişme gösterdi. Eski versiyonlarında prestij kasma çok zordu şimdi çok daha basitleştirilmiş.Harita ve skill sistemi değişti. Özellikle İnvasionlar çok işe yarıyor. 

Kısacası 

Artıları ;


-Tek karakterde 14 sınıf kontrol edilebiliyor.


-Her sınıfın kendine has özellikleri ve sistemi var. Şimdiki sistemde sınıflar eşitlenmiş.


-Her sınıfın ayrı bir zevki ve zorluğu var. Gerçi düellolarda bazı sınıflar biraz daha baskın kalıyor ama o kadar da olsun :)


-Harita sistemi çok güzel hem açık haritalar hem solo ve grup haritaları var. Grup haritalarında 3-4 boss kesip haritadan güzel bir ödülle çıkıyorsunuz. Özellikle 10 kişilik party haritaları çok iyi eşyalar veriyor.


-Bir tane temel silah takabiliyorsunuz. Ek olarak Hp buff ı veren kalkan benzeri eşya çeşitleri de var ama onlar karakter üzerinde görsel olarak görünmüyor. Sadece bileklik,kolye,yüzük ve küpe var. Ayrıca 4 tane de amblem takabiliyorsunuz. Geri kalan kıyafetler tamamen görsel.


-Kıyafetler ve karakter ayarları konusunda zengin. Günümüzden yada sınıflara özel kıyafetler giyebiliyorsunuz. Dövme var ve renk çeşidi bol.


- Oyun insan, ölümsüz ve tanrı evreninde geçtiği için insanlar ölümsüzlere yani size hizmet ediyorlar. Size hizmet eden yaklaşık 10 tane(sayısını tam hatırlamıyorum)  Adeptiniz var ve onları günlük göreve gönderiyorsunuz. Görevden döndüklerinde rastgele şeyler yada FAİTH getiriyorlar.FAİTH ne işe yarıyor onu da aşağı da anlatıcam.


-Özellikle bu özellik çok hoşuma gidiyor. Şuan kaç tam bilmiyorum ama eskiden 30 bindeydi sanırım şimdi de öyle 30 bin prestije gelince size bir görev serisi veriliyor. Tamamını bitirip sonda devasa bir boss var onu öldürdüğünüzde belki oyunun videolarında da görmüşsünüzdür DİVİNE FORM yada GOD MOD diye bir özellik geliyor. Belli bir miktar FAİTH kullanarak (Türkçe'si İNANÇ  :P :D ) divine formu açınca devasa uçan bir insan , robot yada bir şeytana ( onu görevi bitirince soruyor ve sürekli de öyle kalıyor.) dönüşüyorsunuz. Canınınız yaklaşık 2, 3, 5 civarında katlar oranlarında ( tam hesaplamadım :D ) saldırı gücünüz ve hatta skill etki alanlarınız artıyor. Tabi bu mod başta 15 dk sürüyor ama kendinizi geliştirdikçe süresini arttırabiliyorsunuz.


-Ayda bir İnvasion yani dünya saldırısı geliyor. Toplam 6 çeşit yaratık var ve bu yaratıklardan 1 yada 2 si aynı anda yaklaşık 1 ay ek görev zindan haritaları getiriyor. 


Pythonides , Reapers of Death, Ocenaids , Mechanoids, Demons , Gorgonides. 


-Oyunda bir anda hızla yükselemiyorsunuz belli bir zaman harcamanız gerekiyor. Sizi geliştircek olan harita sistemi size günlük bir geliştirme izni veriyor. Günlük girmezseniz en fazla 7 gün birikiyor.


-Her türlü özel günde ( cadılar bayramı, sevgililer günü gibi ) 2-3 hafta süren etkinlik ve oyunlar düzenleniyor. 


-Hikaye zindan haritalarına çok güzel bağlanmış.



Eksileri; 


-Oyun eksileri yok mu var tabiki. Hala bazı haritalarda bug oluşabiliyor. Oluştukça ticket atıyorum ve geri dönüşle en kısa sürede çözeceklerini belirtiyorlar ve bir süre sonra o sorun çözülüyor gerçi bunu neden eksilere yazdım bende bilmiyorum :D 


-Yeni gelen premium seviyesi sistemi oyunu hafif bi pay2win e yaklaştırdı. 


-Oyuna günlük yada haftalık girmezseniz bazen kafanız karışabilir çünkü çok kısa süre içinde birçok şey ekleyebiliyorlar.


-Ne kadar bol harita olsa da sürekli aynı haritalara girmek ve aynı bossları kesmek biraz sıkmıyor değil.

author: {'steamid': '76561198019767959', 'num_games_owned': 176, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 9338, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8861, 'last_played': 1494683967}
review:
The game starts out ok but then its just a grind with little options. Grind to 30k might so you can upgrade to generation 1 gear. Then grind to 50k might and upgrade to Gen.2 gear. After that you get to grind to 75k might and upgrade to Gen3 gear and over and over. Everything of substance is either a 5 or 10 man instance and they get old fast. 

If you play through steam be aware there are huge issues with purchasing Argents which is basically gems to buy from ingame store. If you do purchase them and dont recieve them be prepared for them to never deliver them and hope and pray your banks has a good claims department. I can't reccomend this game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198082181301', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 81, 'playtime_forever': 3613, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3613, 'last_played': 1494958305}
review:
Les développeurs ont-ils seulement déjà essayer de se battre avec des talons aiguilles avant de créer ce type de chaussure pour presque toutes les tenues féminines ? Non parce qu'à part dans un mauvais film d'action ou dans les productions hollywoodiennes incluant une bimbo soit disant femme forte, ça ne se voyait que dans les mauvais jeux. Et pourtant ce jeu est loin d'être mauvais et ce petit détail vous paraîtra vite à oublier.

Graphiquement, il est visuellement beau, voire très beau. Les décors sont magnifiques on ne va pas jusqu'à y trainer, mais on apprécie tout de même leurs beautés. Les personnages de base proposer ne sont pas franchement des critères de beauté, mais la personnalisation du personnage est génial, on peut même changer la taille du c*l, s'est  dire à quel point on peut le personnaliser son personnage et en faire quelque chose qui soit à notre gout.

La musique ressemble à tout ce qu'on peut attendre d'un jeu vidéo ce passant dans un univers entre futur et magie. En soit elle n'est pas inoubliable et même si sa présence passera souvent inaperçue, elle reste très agréable à l'oreille et colle très bien aux différents décors du jeu.

Le scénario n'est pas très facile à comprendre dans un premier lieu, voire à trouver, je le cherche moi même encore. Mais on appréciera cependant le fait de ne pas être l'élu ou je ne sais quel personnage important pour les pnjs nommés. Là on se contentera d'être un simple soldat (immortel) parmi tant d'autre, qui fait le travail qu'on lui demande jusqu'à accéder à la divinité et ainsi développer plus en détail son culte, sans pour autant ne jamais oublier son devoir de soldat. Ah oui vous n'êtes pas dieu, comme le dit la description du jeu, vous êtes UN dieu parmi tant d'autres..  Et en soit les seuls pnjs pour qui vous serez important sont le compteur de fidèle dans votre temple et vos adeptes.

Pour conclure: ça reste un de ces mmo dit d'action, à la Phantasy Star Online, ou l'on peut à loisir devenir mage ou paladin, selon la classe incarnée ( Changeable à loisir ). En soit celui-ci n'est pas le plus mauvais des jeux, le meilleur ? Non mais il plaira grandement aux gens pour peu qu'on n'abandonne pas dès les premières difficultés. Un conseil serait aussi de vous trouver des amis avec qui jouer, le jeu est faisable en solo, mais les avantages largement plus nombreux lorsqu'on joue en groupe.

author: {'steamid': '76561198296610769', 'num_games_owned': 69, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 279, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 279, 'last_played': 1494999489}
review: Wonderful game! HOWEVER, please allow me to choose the monitor that I play the game on! Nvidia geforce experience doesn't have the ability to optimise the game either, to fix this issue before starting it up. The only fix I can find is to disable the second monitor, then start the game, then enable it again. This may be because both monitors are pugged into the same gpu (only gpu) , and the game can't discern the difference between the monitors connected as such. Otherwise, I love the game, but I plead the developers to look into these issues as it makes my expereince much less enjoyable.

author: {'steamid': '76561198054589886', 'num_games_owned': 481, 'num_reviews': 42, 'playtime_forever': 64, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 63, 'last_played': 1553518985}
review:
Hallo,
nach langem rummachen kann ich die PC Version leider nicht empfehlen trotz mehrer Starken Pc Systene habe ich Skyforge nicht Spielbar zum laufen gebracht. Das 1 System war ein I5-6600k, 8gb DDR4 3200mhz, GTX 970 und WIndows 10 und ich habe selbst auf minimalsten EInstellungen nur 21FPS geschafft. Das reicht für mich nicht für ein Spielvergnügen. Selbst mit diversen Tricks auf You..... oder anderen Seiten konnte ich keine Lösung für mein Problem finden selbst die HArdware war nie richtig ausgelastet oder dergleichen. DIe Geschichte des Spiels ist gut und auch die Idee ist schcön umgesetzt. Leider merkt man dann schnell nach ein paar Tagen, dass dann extrem auf Pay-to-play usw. aufgebaut wird. Man hat dann sehr lange Zeiten für ein Levelaufstieg usw.. Nach testen auf der PS4 kann ich sagen die Idee ist gut leider habe ich es Nie auf dem REchner/PC zum laufen bekommen. (nur auf der ps4 lief es flüssig)

Kann aber jeden es nur mal empfehlen zu testen, ich spiele es leider nicht mehr.

review: It's fun for a bit, I liked the classes, enjoyed the zones and the quest lines, but progress gets very slow and gated without using real cash to move forward faster than a snails pace. some of the bosses are buggy and can be near impossible to kill solo without have a dozen tries. it just gets very old and stale quick. with a few minor changes and bug fixes this would be a real gem, ut in current state I would stay away.

author: {'steamid': '76561198083463988', 'num_games_owned': 2786, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 1791, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 150, 'last_played': 1588510221}
review:
Alors je trouve les évaluations du jeu en accord avec le jeu lui même, je comprends que certains n'aiment pas, cependant pour mon évaluation elle sera basé sur ma première phase de gameplay soit environ 1h30 et pour le coup elle est positive. 
En détails du coté positif : 
-Le jeu est quand même vachement beau
-La BO du jeu est magnifique elle aussi, elle saura vous bercer durant vos missions. 
-Je trouve (ceci est mon avis) que la prise en main est addictive, ni compliqué ni simple. 
-La possibilité de switch de classe comme on le veut est assez originale et plus efficace. 

Maintenant le négatif :
-Le jeu est assez buggé, on peut voir sous la map, ou même très facilement glitch le personnage.
-Malgré que les musique soient superbes on a une appartition aléatoire, exemple : premier temps de chargement avec musique l'autre non. Enfin peut être que c'est voulu, mais en jeu c'est bizarre. 
- Et le plus dérangeant à mon gout c'est les doublages, c'est assez horrible de voir les personnages bouger leur lèvres pendant 3 secondes sans pour autant qu'une voix soit enregistrer pas dessus.   

Mon évaluation reste subjective, je n'ai qu'une heure de jeu, mais il ne faut pas négliger que le jeu est en F2P et qu'il ne peut être parfait. Malgré ses 15GB je n'ai pas regretté le petit temps de télechargement. 
En bref vous n'avez pas besoin d'hésiter, il est gratuit.

author: {'steamid': '76561198138832039', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 3327, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2298, 'last_played': 1692417186}
review: One of my favorite parts is the progression scheme. Every little thing you do that increases "might" increases your character's strength, instead of the usual grinding to the next level. The game is nothing like WoW or the WoW clones, and that is a good thing for me. There are a lot of interesting things to unlock, and instead of having to rush to get to end game to have fun, this game is fun almost the whole time you're playing it. I'm not playing this game for the PvP, so I don't know what that is like on here. One problem I've had with the game though is that the Steam compatibility isn't too good on their support website. You can't submit support tickets using an account created with Steam because it makes you put in your account email, but you can't link a Steam account to an email for this game, so you can't really submit support tickets.

author: {'steamid': '76561198011344869', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 174, 'playtime_forever': 140, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 140, 'last_played': 1494513753}
review:
畫面精美人物好看。
捏人好捏，還可設定跑姿。女人很騷。男人可以選啤酒肚。
界面很簡潔。
戰鬥有點像激戰2和洛奇英雄傳，半鎖定的,有一些連招，打擊感不好，不如龍之谷。
有很多科幻的高樓大廈和機器人和飛船，還有劍和魔法。
一開始就在打老鼠人，老鼠人很多遊戲都有，都俗套了。
然後就是做任務，刷副本，和warframe，dnf差不多。沒有開放世界可以亂跑，不好。
主角一開始就開掛，還可以變成神。
人物可以換裝，送了一些衣服帽子飾品，西裝休閒服什麼的，可以隨便換，還有一隻小飛機跟著你。
剛開始只能用三個職業不過可以切換。
畫質調最低很難看。
一般，不如玩激戰2
