author: {'steamid': '76561198040459088', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 1106, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1106, 'last_played': 1492723997}
review:
[b]First of[/b], if you'd like to try this game, make sure to download the FREE steam only DLC.  
The DLC will give you access to a really fun to play class.  

[b]Short[/b] : 
If you are looking for a game to play while listening to music
or watching a stream then I'd highly recommend this. 

[b]Alright, I have spend 11h in 1 1/2 days and this is how I feel so far :[/b]
+ The game looks good, kinda like Tera.
+ The gameplay is simple but very enjoyable.
+ The classes all look great and feel somewhat unique.
+ FPS and load times are good
+ No crashes and some free stuff for a pleasant start
+ The combat, especially with the Gunner is so much fun
+ Simple game, ideal to play to chill or while watching streams
+ It is FREE !

- The UI is pretty bad but not awful
- There is a premium system, some boosts and daily free stuff
- Most of the stuff seems to be instanced but there are also open maps
- Grinding game => repetetive (not like WoW isn't repetetive)
- So far it has been really easy for me but it still says tutorial soo..

author: {'steamid': '76561198304084064', 'num_games_owned': 54, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 309, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 12, 'last_played': 1492824973}
review:
Bom minha primeira analise, mais vale a pena por um game incrível.

Antes de mais nada recomendo o game sim vale muito apena. 

Bem vamos la jogo skyforge ainda na versão close beta. Antes de ter sofrido a grande atualização que para os mais íntimos é praticamente um "rework"  do jogo.

Skyforge é um mmorpg action de fantasia e mitologia. 

Prós.
-Jogos lindo (Cenário movimentos magias e os efeitos são excelentes.)
-Jogabilidade bem fluida.
-Muita coisa pra fazer.
-End game excelente.
-Sistema de classes dinâmico.
-Dificuldade tem instancias que realmente são extensas e bem difícil colocando a habilidade do grupo a prova.
-É ideal para todo tipo de player tanto o casual que é meu caso quanto um player hard core.
-Ping fica em media 180 a 220 porem dentro do jogo você quase não sente essa diferença.
-Jogo é action.
-Varias classes OBS: Cada classe tem seu papel dentro das instancias. Não menos importante vale falar que cada classe possuem suas habilidade suprema.(Ultimates únicas)
-Uma quantidade enorme de instancias.
-A lore do game é muito bacana.
-A os GOD Mods é muito bacana.
-Diárias sistemas de quest diárias que ajudam bastante um player não casher ou player casual.

Cons.
-Bom existe um sistema de premium (O que não é tão significativo dentro do game) Porem só é possível comprar com argent (Moeda de cash) OBS: Antes da atualização que houve em julho de 2016 era possível trocar dinheiro do jogo os credits por argent porem isso não existe mais
-População (Quero deixar claro que isso mudou bastante depois que o jogo entrou para a steam) Atualmente esta bem fácil de encontrar instancias em grupos.
-O sistema pra subir seu prestigio se você não tem paciência o jogo meio que te da a oportunidade de gastar"argent" pra digamos que suprir sua falta de paciência. Porem isso não é uma coisa que vai te deixar na desvantagem já explico o por que.
-Otimização.-> Hoje em dia o jogo já melhorou 100% em questão de otimização, não gosto nem de lembrar em 2015 como era ruim a otimização. No entanto ainda vejo pessoas reclamando sobre a má otimização. Jogo em full hd a 60 fps tudo no máximo. OBS: uma coisa que eu notei que o jogo ele precisa muito do seu processador ou seja caso você não tenho um processador bom talvez sinta um pouco essas percas de fps.
-PVP eu particularmente amo pvp só que em skyforge o foco é PVE. Isso no começo era um problema pra mim só que com o tempo me acostumei ao jogo ser focado no PVE e hoje posso dizer sou apaixonado pelo PVE do jogo.
-Repetitivo bom isso é uma questão delicada, realmente ele é repetitivo porem isso não tira a diversão do jogo até por que é bacana você fazer as instancias com cada classe diferente e isso meio que tira um pouco essa repetitividade.
-Bug existem bugs não muitos mais existem, porem nada que possa prejudicar sua game play.

Bom pessoa diria que o jogo não é Pay to Win pelo fato de conseguir praticamente tudo in game porem tem alguns elementos que podem favorecer quem coloca cashe.

Então pessoal o que posso dizer sobre o game é um game excelente teve alguns deslizes que alguns foram corrigidos outros ainda não. 
A pushiber a my.com e a desenvolvedora ela realmente da suporte ao jogador e escuta os player tanto é que a atualização de 2016 foi baseada no feedback dos jogadores.
A Questão de subir seu prestigio gastando argent (O Casher). Bem o que ajuda bastante um player casual e um player hard core ou um casher de um player comum é o fato do sistema de nivelamento.
O que é o nivelamento: Bom toda as vezes que você faz um instancia em grupo com pessoas aleatórias e prestígios diferentes o jogo nivela seu prestigio. 
Exemplo: 3 player com prestigio diferentes.
O mais forte tem 30k de prestigio 
O mais fraco 5k
O do meio 15k
O jogo nivela isso para o mais forte ou seja todos vão ter 30k de prestigio naquela instancia os players terão o mesmo ataque mesma vida e defesa de um player de 30k de prestigio os mobs vão ser nivelados pelo mais forte também.

Bom galera desculpas caso tenha cometido algum erro.

Nick in game: Luckas Barros qual quer duvida só chamar.


Abraço pessoal.

author: {'steamid': '76561198087034003', 'num_games_owned': 629, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 197, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 197, 'last_played': 1492434759}
review:
So many reviews on here complaining about it being grindy if you don't pay $$$ (It's free to play, DUH!).

A few reviews say there are technical issues - me & my friends found no such issues, but we're technically competent ;)

More reviews comparing it to this game and that - it's none of those, try it, FOR FREE!

It looks great (once you push the 3 D slider to max!). Very polished. Great combat. I'll sink lots of hours into this.

author: {'steamid': '76561198087227118', 'num_games_owned': 831, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 1284, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 945, 'last_played': 1545595972}
review:
Remek játék bár nem MMORPG inkább azt mondanám olyan mint a Warframe csak itt egész pofás karaktereket összelehet hozni!
Nem sokat játszottam eddig vele de ami nagyon tetszik:
-Csak 1 karaktert kreálhatunk de cserébe bármikor kasztot tudunk váltani (a játék elején csak 3+1 kaszt elérhető a többit később lehet feloldani ahogy csinálod a küldiket.)
-Különböző vizuális kiegészitőket is bármikor módosíthatjuk (sapkák,ruhák, szemüvegek, tetoválások stb...)
-Az irányítás végtelenül egyszerű (jobb/bal egérgomb, 1,2,3,4,c,r,e kb ezek mindent lefognak)
-Magas beállítások mellett is elég neki egy közepes gép.
Eddig egy hibával találkoztam, akkor egy mob nem spawnolt vissza a küldihez és már ott álltunk vagy 40en...
Free to Play, pörgős játék! Egy próbát megér szerintem mindenkinek! Jó játékot!

author: {'steamid': '76561198010178759', 'num_games_owned': 499, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 15, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 15, 'last_played': 1492202477}
review:
It's heavily pay-to-win nowadays - you cannot catch up to older players by any means. This  results in a crumbling palyerbase at the top - the raid groups can't get new people because no matter how good you are at playing, your character takes too much damage and doesn't dish enough out.  

The PvP is a joke/chore and not enjoyable at all.  

Exploiters roam the place unpunished.  Support is so bad, it's unbelievable.

There is a monthly p2w "event" which requires massive amount of luck or at least 60€ worth of ingame currency. You need those perks to play with the big boys, and they are very expensive. While the RU version isn't as expensive to begin with, they also have sales right and left all the time. EU/NA is serverly lackign in proper sales that would help.  

The DLC on steam is expensive even by EU terms, that stuff can only be a joke.  

Content is literally based on repetition, the same instance will simply have more powerful monsters, often of the very sam etype and just increased hp/dps.  

All those issues overshadow the raid-content, which requires a credit card (or long-time players), hich is pretty good if it's not buggy.

author: {'steamid': '76561198135060129', 'num_games_owned': 157, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 1448, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 668, 'last_played': 1573490946}
review:
นี้คือเกมที่สนุกเอาเรื่องเลยออกมาได้หลายปีเเล้วกับ Skyforge ผมเคยเล่นตั้งแต่ตอนที่มันยังไม่ได้เอาลงใน Steam เลยถึงคราวนี้เลยเล่นใหม่หมดคือระบบดีกว่าเมื่อก่อนเยอะมากจากเมื่อก่อนที่ต้องหาแร่ทั้งสามอันมาอัพเกรดจนได้คลาสคราวนี้เขาได้ทำการเปลี่ยนระบบใหม่คือเล่นด่านไปเรื่อยๆจะปลดคลาสตามด่านอย่าถึง Chapter 2 อ่ะ(ผมขอเรียกแบบนั้นนะ) คือมันก็จะปลดล็อกคลาสใหม่ให้เราแต่เราต้องเล่นให้ถึงด่านนั้นมันถึงจะเปิดให้เราเล่นการอัพสกิลก็ง่ายขึ้นเพียงแค่กดเข้าไปในวิหารของคลาสนั้นเเล้วก็รับภารกิจเล่นให้จบก็ง่ายๆก็แค่ฆ่ามอนสเอตร์ให้ครบตามที่มันบอกมันก็จะปลดให้ EZ มีระบบ Open wolrd และอื่นๆอีกมากมายให้เล่นมีคลาสถึง 14 คลาสมีให้เราเล่นได้ 3 คลาส Cyromancer Paladin และ Lightbinder มีคลาสย่อยอีก 11 คลาส 11 คลาสนั้นต้องปลดเอาเองในด่านต่างๆและระบบที่ขาดไม่ได้เลยคือ The god ที่แม่งโครต Badass เลยสาสสเลเวลจะไม่มีในเกมนี้โดยจะมีพวกที่แทนเลเวลเรียกว่า PT 
สรุป
-เกมไม่กินสเปค
-ฟาร์มของง่ายมากแม้จะเล่นพึ่งเล่น
-ระบบ God ที่แม่งเท่สาสส
เอาเป็นว่าสนุกครับลองเล่นดู

author: {'steamid': '76561198029012767', 'num_games_owned': 387, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 414, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 303, 'last_played': 1493108558}
review:
游戏战斗不错，键位也不复杂，上手容易，换装也不少，刚开始游戏就有好几套衣服可以换
虽然有些人说延迟不高，但是我这里还是比较高的，欧洲服延迟大概在300到800之间，北美服在200到500之间，玩起来流畅度很受影响
还有一个很奇怪的问题不知道有没有别人碰到，无论是欧洲还是北美服在玩到50分钟左右的时候会断开服务器的链接，然后再也连接不上，只能退出游戏

author: {'steamid': '76561198067322920', 'num_games_owned': 196, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 5474, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3410, 'last_played': 1494096228}
review:
Likes
-So far I like it, but I'm still not sure what the hell I'm playing. It's futuristic, but it has immortal beings, fantasy mobs, what looks like half life city scanners, machineguns and all sorts of other stuff. It's awesome, but I don't know what exactly they were going for other than "What if we just put a bunch of cool shit in"
-It has built in time gates, which I kind of like because it keeps me from just blitzing through the whole thing and provides a good quit point. Do a bunch of stuff, hit a time gate, go do other ingame stuff or do/play something else.
-I can take a quick 15min break from a quest (or adventure, i forget which) without having to restart the whole thing. All areas have an estimated completion time, so I know about how much time I'm giving up and don't have to worry about not knowing how long I'm going to be doing something and possibly have to leave halfway through.
-Runs great on laptop and doesn't look like hot garbage
Unsure
-What exactly is this world? The Archer class uses bows, but the Gunner class uses a minigun. The Paladin class gets a shield and sword, but the Berzerker class gets a weird chainsaw sword thing. You play as an immortal/god but at the same time you need to do science and research. I don't really understand what this world is supposed to be.
-As of writing this I only have 17 hours (probably will if/when I get to 50 or 100) so I don't know what the endgame looks like if there is one
-I'm tempted to put this in dislike, but the health bars. Ive seen a few players with a bunch of numbers and then a G at the end, which at first I thought it was a grand, then I realized that there is already a k to show thousands. The only other number I can think of that starts with a G is a googol (really goddam big number). I don't know if thats just a bug, if I can't read, or if the numbers just start going crazy after a certain point in the game. At the moment it just makes it kind of hard to tell how many hits I can take before I need to start worrying.
Dislike
-Could do with a bit more handholding. You do the tutorial and then youre kind of just dumped into the world to do your own thing.
-Build costs get high very fast. I mostly play warframe so build costs don't go too high (dont think ive seen anything go over 50k creds), but I went from putting in a few thousand credits, to 10k each time on one building. I know there are items in the shop that are like 1.5M creds, but those are cosmetics. Those could be $500 cosmetics for all I care.
-Could do with a help button to just explain what all is going on  on screen (this is X, it does Y. that is R, it does L). If there is a button for that already, I haven't found it, which isn't helpful if I can't find something meant to help me.
-Voicelines cut off early for some reason. NPC is telling me about what I'm supposed to be doing and suddenly they stop mid sentence and I have to read subtitles. I don't want to read subtitles, I want to be a god and stab things with my sword.

This last bit isn't about the game itself, but from the divide between older players and new players. From what I've seen, some older players are pissed that it isn't the game that it used to be (whatever that is. I hadn't heard of it until last night), while new players like the game. While it would be nice to see whatever it is that they cut out, I'm kind of glad that they did because it is already confusing to start because it doesn't do too well with explaining the game. But at the same time, a beta is a beta, shit is gonna change whether you think it's a good change or not.

author: {'steamid': '76561197979240106', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 73, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 73, 'last_played': 1492381693}
review: The game is almost an immediate show stopper for me.  I get that 90% of gammers use WASD for whatever reason, but I use ESDF to give me access to other hot keys and to rest naturally on the keyboard (i.e. divits on the F key).  While you can kind of rekey movement, there is so much hard keyed that you cannot change.  Shift+key for dash, use of the F key as the mission completion dialog, and space for interactions.  All easily fixed things but have been an issue for longer than since it was free on steam as accounted by reddit.

author: {'steamid': '76561198115582130', 'num_games_owned': 375, 'num_reviews': 68, 'playtime_forever': 2811, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2810, 'last_played': 1682107307}
review:
Играл в своё время с Майла и игра понравилась. Вот и в стиме увидел, подумал, а почему бы и нет. И пофиг что английская, без истории поиграю. В принципе, играть можно. Даже интересно. (благо не заиграл до дыр, как бывало с многими ММО) Вижу что-то новое, что не может не радовать, однако донат явно не идёт на пользу игре, но это другая история (майл же). Игра интересна, по своему уникальна, те кто не знаком с данной игрой, советую поиграть. Если не напрягает отсутствие Русского, можно в стиме, или же вам дорога в сам Майл. Система классов здесь очень классная. Можно хоть каждую минуту их менять (из доступных вариантов (новые откроются по мере прохождения сюжета)). Жду момента, когда карточки будут падать. XD
П.С. Тут решил чекнуть русскую версию. Много же полезного вырезали, хотя тем, кто не играл, будет все равно, ведь не заметят.)

author: {'steamid': '76561198022082358', 'num_games_owned': 331, 'num_reviews': 62, 'playtime_forever': 52, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 52, 'last_played': 1492343916}
review:
Edit: Since many people are retarded and can't take a review by simply what it is AN OPINION and nothing more , calling me noob and joke reviewer (simply because they like this sh*t game)..... i'm going to be more specific this time .


Pros about the game : 
    -Good graphics ... i mean really good.
    -Something new in the art of MMORPG.
    -Cosmetics.

Cons about the game :
    -No individuality... you can change class whenever you want (why bother being good with 1 class when you can suck with all? )
    -No open map. It's like skyrim with dungeon system ... nothing more.
    -No pvp , only duels.
    -No hunting.
    -No factions.
    -DLC's ... only 1 dlc free which gives you 1 class.
    -Forgot to mention ... you start with 3 classes and get 1 free... the other classes are money related. >>> I get that the game is free to play but you can also go premium (if you can afford it...) and also you gotta pay for more classes oh and you get more credits/sh*ts as premium. So you're at disadvantage if you are playing truly free.
   

This is it.. i hope you guys like it or hate it .. now you can actually grade my review based on more then just 2 simple things about this game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198138539029', 'num_games_owned': 413, 'num_reviews': 41, 'playtime_forever': 3150, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3023, 'last_played': 1521049665}
review:
Skyforge ist ein sehr schönes MMORPG, welches zwar recht linear ist, aber dennoch riesen Spaß macht, besonders nachdem man die Kampagne abgeschlossen hat.

Dabei ist die Charaktererstellung umfangreich, einfach und gut zu überschauen. Und wer im Laufe des Spiels dann nochmal was ändern möchte kann dies beim ersten Besuch des Stylisten gratis unternehmen, danach wird's (vermutlich Ingame Währung kosten? Hab's noch nicht mal gratis geändert...). Bis auf den Namen lässt sich dann nochmal alles ändern.

Im Zuge dessen ist zu erwähnen das man sich bei Skyforge im Gegensatz zu vielen anderen Konkurrenten, nur einen Character erstellen kann, da man im Verlauf der Kampagne die einzelnen Klassen freischaltet und diese dann jederzeit (außerhalb des Kampfes bzw. solange man keinen Schaden nimmt) ändern kann. 
Es gibt insgesamt 14 Klassen, darunter 2 Supporter, 2 Tanks und 10 DD bzw. DPS. 
Das leveln der Klassen geht relativ schnell mit ca. 30-60 Minuten. 

Nach der Charaktererstellung folgt erstmal ein kurzes Tutorial, also die Basics der Steuerung, sowie die Einführung in die Story, denn man wird ein unsterblicher mit dem Streben ein Gott zu werden, was bis zum Obergott führt.

Die Kampagne ist in 8 Provinzen eingeteilt, welche es von Aliens, Mechanoiden, Oceaniden und anderen Kreaturen zu befreien gilt. Wenn man einen Abschnitt geschafft hat, kann man diesen nach und nach auf höheren Schwierigkeitsgraden und wechselnden Nebenmissionen erneut machen, was im Lategame auch zu besseren Equip führen kann.

Während man die Kampagne durch rushen kann, ist es doch empfohlen sich da Zeit zu lassen und nebenher schon andere Aufgaben verfolgen sollte, neues Equip farmen, und somit sein Prestige, bzw. die Macht zu erhöhen, damit man nach der Kampagne schonmal etwas gewapnet ist.
Die Stärke eines Charakters lässt sich am Prestige messen, das im Zusammenhang zu Macht steht, mit mehr Macht lassen sich bessere Items tragen und bessere Items erhöhen auch euer Prestige, also wie in jeden anderen RPG, gutes Equip = starker Character, fehlt ja dann nur noch Klassenverständnis und Skill.

Das Klassenverständnis ist recht schnell gegeben, da die Spells übersichtlich sind und nicht erdrückend viele wie z.B. früher bei WoW mit 1000000 Spells pro Klasse.. Kappa

Während der Skill mit der Zeit dann auch kommt, da man dann besser einschätzen kann, wann ich welchen Spell einsetze, wie viel CD drauf ist und sonstiger Käse.

Sowohl PVE als auch PVP hat man mit Skyforged ein f2p Titel, der auch f2p ist, wenn kaufen kann man sich überwiegend nur Premium Stati mit denen man Boni bekommt, z.B. 100% mehr Informationen über Feinde, 100% mehr Credits (ingame Währung). Argends also die Pay Währung ist im Grunde genommen nur für den Ingame Shop für bestimmte Recourcen (Credits, IüF, und ähnliches), neue Outfits und Mounts zu gebrauchen, was schonmal nice ist, da die Kleidung nur optisch was ändert.

Das Equip zum stärker werden sind Ringe, Ketten, Broschen usw und deren Gearscore wird direkt angezeigt, wenn man drüber hovert. 

Bevor der Review hier zu lang wird, fass ich es mal zusammen:

Ein wunderschön designtes Game, es ist free 2 play, man bekommt sogar vom Game aus für die erste Woche Geschenke, für's tägliche einloggen, z.B. Premium für 3 Tage, die Steuerung des ganzen ist präzise und einfach zu lernen. 

Schattenseiten gibt es auch, wie in jeden Spiel, hier ist es teils die Community, wo jeder Trottel im chat eigentlich englisch redet machen die Franzosen, Italiener und Russen was sie wollen und sprechen ihre jeweilige Sprache... Was durchaus nerven kann, wenn man zumindest ein wenig Verständnis für diese Sprachen hat, und man dann die Beleidigungen versteht... xD

Ja gut gibt auch ein wenig mehr was stören kann, z.B. die teils umständlichen Pfade, wenn man zu nem Ziel laufen will oder auch recht doofe unsichtbare Wände über kleinen Steinen über die man dann nicht springen kann, aber dann über Abgründe kann man wunderbar springen um zu sterben? Achja, man kann nicht schwimmen! xD

Aber dennoch, immerhin 8/10 Punkten gebe ich Skyforge insgesamt. :D

author: {'steamid': '76561198003555641', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 37, 'playtime_forever': 34, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 34, 'last_played': 1492360489}
review:
TL:DR
Community is unfriendly. Chatoptions limited (People use the region chat for lfgs). 
Settings, Gameplay & Character Creation riddled with bugs and 0 hints, beginner-unfriendly.

_____________________________________________

A more detailed review:

This game is a perfect example of poor game design.
I couldn't access the graphic settings in the character creation (It bugged out, found no option then) and thus I skipped most of it, so that I could enjoy the game at its fullest with better graphics.

Unfortunately for me, they didn't even mention that once you're done with the character creation there's no way to go back, reset, delete or change your name unless you spend money on it ~ $$$. 

All that would have been needed to fix that is a small textbox - a hint for the player.

When I logged into the game, I asked the community for help. There are only two chat-modes "region" and "vicinity".
This IS not enough. The region chat was flooded with lfg, there was no moderator but a few veterans who defended the game and it's poor choices at it's fullest. Blaming a beginner for making the poor choice  to skip through to get to the graphic settings.

The combat system itself seems to lack any tactics and has a lot of special effects. Not that much of a problem, considering it wants to be an action-rpg-mmo. But then again, the death animations of enemies are horrific and other free games do a much better job in that or even integrate physx.(Such as warframe, tera...)

The graphics are in the end just mediocre, not bad and definitely okay for a free mmo. Even if it would be worse I would have given this game a chance, if it weren't for the other problems.

author: {'steamid': '76561198086326661', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 460, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 365, 'last_played': 1493203538}
review: I was looking for a break from my normal MMORPG (WoW) and gave this a try. I have to say that I really enjoy it. It has it's problems yes. Cruddy dialogue, lack of customization early on and pay to play walls. However, it does plenty of stuff well. It is a quick fast-paced action rpg, almost in the vein of Mass Effect. Battles are quick and are more dynamic than most RPGs. The graphics and enemy designs are really enjoyable.

author: {'steamid': '76561198100195038', 'num_games_owned': 408, 'num_reviews': 50, 'playtime_forever': 13573, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6390, 'last_played': 1555150756}
review: 这游戏有美服和欧服大家可以先上去试试延迟，美服我裸连200不到，欧服600，不要像我这么弱智进了欧服玩了45个小时结果要去美服重新玩。首先这游戏非常良心，职业都能随着地图解锁，并且非常容易满级。所有职业的装备都是通用的，仅武器是各自的.职业虽然有辅助型但不能回血，只能套护盾，打比较高难度的副本有人划水的话还很不容易的。还有相当多的副本和野外地图，不少地图做的非常漂亮。优化也非常的厉害，我的笔记本GTX860M,I5-4210M.1920分辨率特效最高满地植被都能达到30帧。还有虽然延迟200看着很低，有时候也影响战斗体验。最重要的就是没有中文，好多技能都看不懂，还有各种组合技能看着心累。新增：现在的话不推荐你们玩的很高级，后期副本难度跨度太大，没有神带基本过不去，过不去就没有装备然后恶性循环，而且氪金氛围浓重，日常也要打很长时间

author: {'steamid': '76561197967474869', 'num_games_owned': 1398, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 23897, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 16766, 'last_played': 1501066661}
review:
[h1]Bad mmorpg, Good beat'em all[/h1]
If you expect an mmorpg [u]as advertised by the dev[/u], don't bother. If you want a game like Warframe, maybe you'll like it. But it is clearly not an "mmorpg" as Skyforge claims to be in the official FAQs.

There's no open world, you are given a mission, enter a small instanced linear zone, kill all the monsters, kill the zone boss, claim rewards, then leave the zone. Repeat, and that's it, that's the game. There are a few zones where you'll be doing daily missions along with other players, or more like "competing against other players in who's gonna tag them mobs". 

[b]Cons[/b]:
-It has time-gated content which you can bypass by spending real money, like on those Facebook social games.

-It has VIP ranks, the more $$$ you spend, the more bonuses you get (including bonuses which increase your DPS, number of loots from party missions, and more). 

-It has pay-walls, either you spend $10 or spend 1month of non-stop grinding to acquire the stuff.

-It has no immersive lore. You're an OP entity trying to become even more OP by completing crappy tasks for non-OP mortals.

-No crafting. At all.

-[b]Total lack of support.[/b] There are obvious bugs since Steam release and it still hasn't been fixed. But they sure did have time to release a cosmetic package and a cashgrab event. No proper patch notes either.

-The events which reward good items are p2w. 

-Annoying profanity filter which you CAN'T disable. The filter is really dumb, even the word "dumb" is filtered. It even filtered "put on" as in "put on your hat" and replaced it with stars *****. Meanwhile the racial slurs are rampants in game. 

-Horrible ergonomy. Can't even activate the cursor unless you are in a menu, so you can't even mouseover your current abilities/buff/debuff. You have to open the abilities screen to know what your stuff is doing. And the abilities screen is such a mess, some descriptions aren't even complete like some Lightbinder's abilities which behave differently whether you aim it at an ally or at an enemy. The tooltip will only display one effect. You gotta go fetch the missing data yourself somewhere else in the game. Many screens are missing shortcuts like the pvp group finder. To find it, you have to open the campaign map, click on the global overview map, then click on "list", then click on "battle" tab. Why not make 1-key shortcut for that? 

-Almost all in-game currencies i've come accross so far are purchasable with real money (credits, knowledge, medals). Those are used in upgrading your stuff/buildings/companions, resulting in a notable gain of DPS. You can litterally spend real money to get become more powerful compared to a non-paying player.

-Unbalanced difficulty content. It's either too hard or too easy.

Those are mainly the reasons why i cannot recommend that game as an mmorpg. it isn't a bad game but it cruelly lacks in many areas. It quickly becomes too frustrating to be really enjoyable.

[b]Pros[/b]:
-Well, it's fresh blood on Steam... Gives something to play a bit while waiting for something better.
-Gameplay is not bad.
-Graphics are fine but not "amazingly good" as i read in other comments (i run it with every graphic options maxed).
-[strike]Can be played with a pad, menu is console-peasants friendly.[/strike] Many users reporting controler bugging their game.
-It's f2p, it's worth giving it a try, maybe you'll like it, but don't expect an mmorpg at all. Expect an Online-Coop-Beat'em All-Dungeon Crawler.

author: {'steamid': '76561198093030186', 'num_games_owned': 1519, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 839, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 111, 'last_played': 1584822084}
review:
เกม mmorpg ที่เปิดมาได้2ปีกว่าๆ เกมมี story mission มีเนื้อเรื่อง มี cutscene โดยเราจะได้รับบทเป็นทหารกากๆ ตายในสนามรบ แล้วกลายเป็น the chosen one ซึ่งมีพลังของพระเจ้า (ร่าง god เท่บรรลัย) ออกฝึกฝน เก็บเวล หาสาวก เพื่อเปลี่ยนตัวเองจากเทพฝึกหัด ไปเป็นพระเจ้าเต็มตัว

ข้อดี
+ ภาพสวย เอฟเฟคอลังการ ปรับต่ำสุดยังดูดี
+ ระบบแต่งตัวของเกมนี้ เป็นอะไรที่ชอบมาก เพราะปรับได้แทบทุกอย่าง ตั้งแต่ รูปร่าง หน้าตา ท่าทางการวิ่ง ท่า idle สามารถปรับรูปร่างของ God Form ได้ด้วย และที่สำคัณ นมเด้งได้!!! ระบบ breast physics จัดว่าแจ่ม 
+ มี state map ประมาณ 50 ด่าน เล่น co-op ได้ตั้งแต่ 3-10 คน มี worlds map อีกนับ 10 และมีโหมด pvp ด้วย ตั้งแต่ 3v3 ถึง 10v10 เลยทีเดียว
+เลเวลในเกมจะเรียกว่า prestige หรือ PT และไม่มีขีดจำกัด  PT ต่างกันแค่ไหนก็เล่นด้วยกันได้ ต่อให้คุณเพิ่งเริ่มเล่นใหม่ PT แค่ 5k ก็สามารถเล่นร่วมกับคนที่ PT หลัก 100m ได้ โดยเกมจะ equal Stats ให้อัตโนมัติ หมดห่วงเรื่อง join ห้อง 100m แล้วกลัวโดนมอนตบทีเดียวตาย หรือตีไม่เข้า 
+ ไม่ p2w ไม่เทพทรู ของทุกอย่างหาได้ในเกม costume,pet,mounts มีใน shop หมด  
+ ของแจกเยอะ อีเว้นเพียบ costume ที่แจกใน event หลายอันสวยกว่าซื้อซะอีก
+ เงิน cash ในเกมนี้จะเรียกว่า Argents และสามารถหาจากในเกมได้ วันนึง อย่างต่ำจะหาได้ประมาณ 300-600 เดือนนึงก้เป็นหมื่นละ เล่นทุกวันซัก 2-3 เดือน ก็แทบจะเหมา costume กับ mounts ได้ทั้ง shop แล้ว 
+ Legendary weapon มีขายใน shop รอมันลด 50% จ่าย 4k argents จบ ไม่ต้องไปลงด่านหาให้เหนื่อย 

ข้อเสีย
- ฟาร์ม ฟาร์ม แล้วก็ ฟาร์ม เนื่องจาก story quest และ map ปลดตามระดับของ PT  กว่าจะเข้าสู่ช่วง endgame คงล่อไปเกือบ 100m ฟาร์มหนักกว่า warframe ซะอีก 
- ระบบ queue ที่โครตพ่อโครตแม่ไร้ประโยชน์ เพราะไม่มีคนใช้ เวลาเฉลี่ยของ que จะอยู่ที่ 5-10 นาทีสำหรับด่าน 3 คน แล้วเกินครึ่ง ช.ม. สำหรับด่าน 5 คน ส่วน 10 คน ไปนอนรอได้เลย  
- เล่นด่าน co-op ปิง200 จะไม่เป็นปัญหาเลย แต่ลง pvp เมื่อไหร่นี่รู้เรื่อง ตายแบบ งงๆ มึนๆบ่อยมาก ตีไม่โดนทั้งๆที่อยู่ใกล้จนแทบจะจับไข่กันได้แล้ว  
- cheat,bot,hack,exploits เพียบ 
- class ไม่มีความ balance เกมมีถึง 14 class แต่คนก็เล่นกันแค่ 3-4 คลาส  ที่เป็นตัวที่ดีที่สุดของแต่ละสายเท่านั้น  แถมแพทใหม่ ดันเปลี่ยนสกิลไม่ได้อีก แยกกันต่างหาก ระหว่าง pve กับ pvp สกิล fix เอาไว้หมด ทำให้ความหลากหลายในการเล่นหายไปจนเกือบหมด skill build ไม่มีเหลือเลย เป็นแพทที่โดนด่ามากที่สุด และทำให้คนหายเกินครึ่ง kinetic จากแต่ก่อน เทพมาก ทั้งใน pvp,pve ดาเมจอันดับต้นๆของเกม พออัพแพท skill fix นี่แทบเป็นขยะ ไม่มีใครเล่นเลย 
- บัคอีกประปราย และตัวค้างบ่อย ดีที่ยังแก้ stuck ได้เอง 

สรุปก็เป็นเกมที่ดีเกมนึง เล่นได้เพลินๆ  มีเพื่อนเล่นด้วยจะสนุกมาก และที่สำคัณคือไม่เทพทรูด้วย 

ปล1.ผมเล่นมาตั้งแต่ เปิด open beta ใหม่ๆ ช่วงกลางปี 15 สมัยนั้น คนไทยเล่นเพียบ และคนเก่งๆเยอะมาก PT 100k นี่ก็อันดับต้นๆของเซิฟแล้ว แต่ตอนนี้คนไทยคงไม่เหลือละ แคลนไทยยุบไปหมดแล้ว

****Tip**** เล็กน้อย เผื่อใครไม่รู้ว่าจะเล่น class ไหนเป็น main 
Tank-Knight ( ถ้า PT สูงแล้ว เล่นพาลาในด่าน 5-10 คน ระวังโดนด่า  knight จำเป็นมากสำหรับ endgame)
Mdamage-zerker (คลาสที่ดีที่สุดสำหรับ break เกราะบอส) 
Rdamage-Archer (อัลติ+gm จะทำดาเมจแรงสุดในเกม ฆ่าบอสไวมาก เหมาะกับเกมสั้นๆ ถ้าเกมยาวไป gunner,outlaw ดีกว่า)
support-Lightbinder,Alchemmist ดีทั้งคู่ 
solo class- monk,outlaw, (เล่นง่าย เหมาะกับมือใหม่)
witch,gunner ทำดาเมจได้ดีทั้งคู่แต่เล่นยาก gunner ช้า และบอสต้องอยู่นิ่ง ถึงจะทำดาเมจได้แรง, witch ดาเมจระยะไกลแรง มี 2 stances ต้องทำความเข้าใจเยอะ และเล่นยากสุดในเกม

author: {'steamid': '76561197980696115', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 181, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 181, 'last_played': 1492347492}
review:
I cant suggest this game. They have literally gutted the game from what it was in beta so that it will work on shitty laptops and ps4.

It used to have many great systems and graphics, now it is just a generic mess with 2d menus.

Combat is WAY too easy now, skil tree was gutted to 1/3 its size per class, graphics are 60% of what they were and you can see they are trying to make it appeal to 6yo kids or something.

What a shame, this game WAS great, now it is a generic piece of shit.

author: {'steamid': '76561198342746840', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 787, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 568, 'last_played': 1493865150}
review:
เป็นเกมสที่ดีมากครับ มีการตกแต่งตัวละคร ใบหน้า ใบหู หน้าตา ทุกส่วนทำให้ดูดีมีชีวิตขึ้นมากๆ 
ระบบเกมส์ก็ไม่ได้แย่อะไรมาก   มีการปรับแต่งชุด ได้ตลอด สามารถเปลี่ยน อาชีพ หรือ เปลี่ยน ชุด + ระบบสัตว์ขี่ + หุ่นยนต์ช่วยเหลือ เป็นต้น
แนว MMO RPG ที่มีผู้เล่นเยอะมาก  ไม่กลัวกังวลเกี่ยวกับอาการณ์ เน็ตกาก หรือ ping เลย  
ส่วนภารกิจก็มีให้เล่นเยอะมากมาย นั่งเล่นเป็นเดือนก็คงไปได้ไม่ถึงครึง  Ai หรือ Npc ในเกมส์ทำออกมาได้ดีมากๆ อันนี้ต้องลองโหลดแล้วเข้าไปดูเอง 
-แต่ก็ไม่ใช่ดีไปทุกอย่าง ยังมีบัคนิดๆหน่อย ฉากอาจยังทำไม่ครบ 100 % 
- ระบบการเล่นยังควบคุมไม่ค่อยดี หรือมือเราไปไม่ทันเกมส์ 
#ส่วนตัวถือว่าเป็นเกมส์ที่ดีมากๆ  อยากทำไรก็ทำ ชีวิตชิลๆ

author: {'steamid': '76561198092124483', 'num_games_owned': 145, 'num_reviews': 135, 'playtime_forever': 775, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 688, 'last_played': 1515067801}
review:
Pros

- great combat 
- there ARE open worlds in instances
- great looking characters, customization and armour 
- nice concept 
- graphics are beautiful 
- very active playerbase
- free to play 

Cons

- TERRIBLE LAG to the point where I just couldnt be bothered
- the story literally makes no sense or hard to follow
- voice acting is way off
- needs more loot like weapons and armour 
- Again I would have put in more hours if it wasnt for the LAGGGGGGGGGGGGGGG

4/10

author: {'steamid': '76561197962503074', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 36, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 23, 'last_played': 1520487328}
review:
Skyforge was the greatest thing ever to be made out of atoms or energy in the entire history of the cosmos. For a while. In a way. To at least a few people.

Skyforge has some of the easiest to grasp mechanics, some of the greatest costumes, some of the most awesome abilities. It's simple in all the right ways, complex in all the right ways, and it's damn fun.

Skyforge was a game I gladly played for years, and sunk a lot of money into.

Then I see it's on steam, and it has achievements. Awesome! I wonder how many I qualify for. A lot! Sweet.

*I can't log into a preexisting account.*

Skyforge on Steam is the worst thing ever to exist and I demand sanctions against everyone responsible for this.

Play it from the original game's launcher. Do not encourage this BS.

author: {'steamid': '76561198141687064', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 47, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 47, 'last_played': 1492308243}

author: {'steamid': '76561198030779644', 'num_games_owned': 92, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 63, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 31, 'last_played': 1500768304}
review:
Je joue à ce jeu depuis sa parrution en bêta;

Son point fort est le système de combat/classes

Don point faible est le système mise en place pour se trouver des groupes (le problème est en parti causer par les joueurs ceci dit).

Les graphismes sont incomparables et régulièrement mis à jour.

Ce jeu est gratuit, mais je conseille fortement d'avoir un accès premium; il est aussi souvent décrit comme P2W; mais ici nous parlons de Pay 2 Whale et non pas Pay 2 Win. Parce que une joueur puissant, ne veut pas dire un joueur qui est bon. Et souvent des joueurs puissants se feront déclassé par des joueurs talentueux, car payer pour être gros ne vous montrera pas à jouer. Vous pouvez mettre 5000$ pour faire parti du premier tier du serveur, certes, mais je suggère fortement de vous limiter au premium et à certain évènements ponctuels.

Je vous invite aussi à joindre la communauté suivante pour avoir accès à toute l'information pour bien avancer!

http://steamcommunity.com/groups/skyforge_francophone

author: {'steamid': '76561198047269935', 'num_games_owned': 342, 'num_reviews': 64, 'playtime_forever': 1718, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1657, 'last_played': 1492841291}
review:
tl;dr - Q U A L I D A D E  E  S I N C R O N I A, pode baixar e jogar que o jogo é bão d++++++++

Parece que eu tô jogando The Witcher 3 online no universo de Mass Effect com o combate de Devil May Cry...

Enfim, só por ser um MMORPG que não me dá vontade de dormir enquanto eu jogo já tá bom demais.

Tá bem optimizado, quando você fala com os NPCs aparece uma cinematic estilo Mass Effect e pela primeira vez você realmente lê o que o NPC tá falando ao invés de só skippar tudo e ignorar a lore do jogo.

Dá pra jogar no teclado e mouse ou no controle, na minha opinião no controle é bem melhor e mais divertido. Se bem que acho que ele não reconhece controle DirectInput, recomendo um controle Xinput de preferência o controle do X360 ou o Logitech F310. Deve dar pra usar o emulador de controle de x360ce pra quem tem controle DirectInput tho.

Você escolhe as instâncias estilo Grand Chase, muda de classe na hora que quiser, ou seja, você só cria um personagem e vai liberando outras classes conforme vai jogando.

Único problema pra quem é do Brasil é o ping, vai de 200 a 300 de ping mas por algum motivo não tá atrapalhando tanto quanto eu achei que atrapalharia.

Ainda não testei o PvP e só joguei 2h de jogo mas só de o jogo ter me prendido por 2 horas sem me fazer dormir já mostra que o jogo é bão mesmo e divertido.

Depois edito e escrevo uma review melhor, escrevi rushado isso aqui.

au revoir~~

author: {'steamid': '76561198029587022', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 6960, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 350, 'last_played': 1499637204}
review:
I'm playing it on the European server and I started in December and no, i'm not one of those that Cry already about giving Steam players the Outlaw 

-Which is either a few hours straight farming.. or 30euro if your rllllyyy lazy but well it would take normally without help of others and without god mode free - about 8-10 hours for the Knowledge + the advancement you need in the Story - Well actually more because you have to do 5mans and farm to actually be on a Level to do the next mission - No problem because someone will carry you anyway, what is of course kind but also sad, because people like me on 300m+ will just one  shot everything in the Story Missions, and it will seem boring for those players, but it is not! All those Missions will get harder with the time and are on your Prestige or higher most of the time.-

_______________________________________________________________________________

The Review starts here! xD

I think it is an really good Idea with the Outlaw, because it's the most fun Class to play Solo and also in a Team, that is something that will get the Players hooked on the spot after they have all skills free! :D 

This Game is something for Casual Players, but more for People that play something longer than just a week, if you can only play 1-2 hours a Week, it would be Kinda hard to catchup even with the Catchups tho. 

There are 1-10man Missions, most of the time you will do Squad-Missions (Up to 3-Player-Content but mostly you will Solo it) Group content - Kinda like 5man Dungeons most games have - and 10 man Raids, well it's not a 30man+ Raid but trust me, in distortions, it's hard enough to find 10 People that really understand the dephts of some Mechanics, of course their are also mechanics that are easy to understand but fun to play, so don't worry! :D

Because I'm kinda sleepy, I will end it here - It's an really fun Game where you can become a God, where you can get higher and higher like you would have an endless amount of Weed to smoke. There are a lot of helping people if you need to, but try the story as far as you can come alone, because otherwise each mission is to fast done. 

Last words: I REALLY REALLLY want to say "Go use the Que-System" but the thing is, nobody is using the Que. So if your longer in que for something than 10mins, just don't use it. xD Besides for PvP's nobody is using the Que system.

an annoying friend of me that loves PvP also said i should link this here xD:

________________________________________________________________________________
- | Join our PvP Community on the EUROPEAN SERVER| Lugran's (FFA) | Battle of Equals - 3v3's (Ranked Matches) | 5v5 Battle of Golems - an MOBA STYLE MMORPG PVP! | 10v10's |120+ PEOPLE ATM| 

We are growing steadily and do as much PvP's we can, of course not everyone can join at any time, so for 10v10's it's better at certain times to que, most fun for most are 3v3 and 10v10's tho - we started 2 weeks ago and could Gather 120+ People.

Be one of us! In 3v3 you will probably meet strong Enemies, don't lose hope, you should ask them for tips!
Ofc, some will not tell you tho, they are weak minded and think if they give you tips you will destroy them - Just observe them if that should be the case! xD 

It's not that they are unequally stronger than you in an Ranked match - All are Equal, they are just more experienced | https://eu.portal.sf.my.com/community/468374361246532388
________________________________________________________________________________

well everyone in the game knows after a few days who this friend of me is anyway xD kill him for me pls tyvm.

author: {'steamid': '76561197964827180', 'num_games_owned': 76, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 33, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 33, 'last_played': 1492236263}
review:
Manooooooooooo
Que jogo mágnifico!

Pros:
Jogabilidade:Magnifica!
Gráfico:Mano, cada detalhe na armadura do seu personagem vale os 16 gigas que o jogo vai ocupar no seu HD (Ou SSD)
Personalização: è boa, mas pode melhorar! (sou aquele tipo de player que está disposto a perder horas personalizando o personagem!)
Classes: Tem uma variedade boa de classes. Pronta para antender a todo tipo de player!

Contras
è bem mal otimizadinho, mas já era de se esperar isso né?
Bugs: Quando você vai pulando as frases o personagem buga, e só mexe a boca, mas não sai som!
Não tem tradução para o Português ;-;

================
Nota final: 9,8 
================

Bonus:
Meu pc é um lixo e por tal motivo não pude aproveitar toda a experiencia gráfica do game.
Mas mesmo com tudo no minimo os detalhes da armadura são lindos de ver!
Se você tem um pc lixo, assim como eu, e estiver realmente desposto a jogar. Baixa o game, coloca tudo no minimo, e ajustar como você preferir uma opção chamada 3D alguma coisa, não lembro o nome kkkkk
Vai ficar iguál a um Minecraft, mas se você estiver disposto a jogar, vá em frente.


Ps: Mané, você tem um pacote bonús se baixar o jogo pela steam!

author: {'steamid': '76561197983520094', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 100, 'playtime_forever': 1261, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 315, 'last_played': 1502261337}
review:
...This is one of the BEST MMO games I have played in YEARS.

I haven't really heard much about it prior this day, but it has quite some story and was previously available even on consoles. Now it is released on Steam. The game's graphics are absolutely gorgeous to look at (for a free-to-play game), art direction is somewhat unique and feels truly original. Generally, the whole thing feels fresh; and while the core mechanics are nothing new, it's still fun to play (even the typical "boring" types of quests). Special effects, animations, cutscenes, UI - everything keeps you entertained for HOURS. Well, at least for my taste. In addition, you can swap your character's class on the fly. There is a character customization. It's not on the [i]Black Desert[/i] level, probably, but it's still very damn impressive. 

In between all the other crap-looking F2P MMORPGs here on Steam, there's really no actual competition for [i]Skyforge[/i]. Do I recommend it? Hell yes, absolutely! Give it a shot.

author: {'steamid': '76561198003990852', 'num_games_owned': 256, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 6185, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 619, 'last_played': 1494418755}
review:
Skyforge is an instance- squad-based MMO with a fun combat system, great graphics and sound, with content being added at a regular pace.

Gameplay:
Featuring 14 distinct classes, the game has a decent amount to offer on that front. You can switch between all classes that you have unlocked at any point outside of combat, and if you're in your divine form, you can switch while in combat too. The game is designed around this feature, and some invasion bosses demand that players switch class in combat in order to beat them. In the beginning free players can pick of the beginner 3 classes - cryomancer (frost mage), paladin and lightbinder (priest), but can eventually unlock all of them. These 3 classes are all very strong and required in endgame. No class is behind a paywall, and unlocking classes isn't an impossible grind. It's rather easy.

I highly recommend picking the paladin as your first class. It's very strong early on, and its skills look and sound just awesome. 

Each class has 2 predefined builds - one for pve and one for pvp. There's no customization to speak of here. Customization happens through gear, and symbols, which can greatly affect how each class performs, but the basic gameplay remains unchanged. For example, you can spec your archer to deal massive damage as his first shot, but ultimately, you'll be using the same rotation no matter your stats. It also takes zero thought to figure out which symbols and divine are best for what class. There's options, but to be honest - there's disappointingly little in terms of customization. Symbol builds are all so obvious, you might call them predefined. 

The progression system is still good, as unlocking more symbols, getting more options for your classes feels great, and all symbols modify the gameplay in someway. That's not taken very far yet, but there's potential. For example, you can modify your dash to either shoot 3 energy bullets in the direction you dash in, or to leave a trap that'll slow your enemie (if I recall correctly), or to give you a shield, and you can pick only one of these three. It's a good, simple system, and unlike other games, this one doesn't try to pretend it is complex. 

The game doesn't use procedurally generated missions, instead all instances are premade, and come with a small quest. Progression requires that you repeat these premade instances. Each has many difficulty levels, but all those do is scale the enemies up. They don't change much otherwise. Most of these instances are at least good, except for the bosses which are consistently disappointing - they are all too easy and have zero personality. They're glorified enemies, often using a normal enemy model, with 10 health bars slapped on them and 1 or 2 special attacks. Enemy variety is also very, very low, and much hasn't been done to address this issue. 

The progression is broken down into some kind of "ladders" or "leagues", called invasions. An invasion is 8 weeks long event, in which one of the alien armies has attacked the world. Each invasion comes with its own special missions and bosses, but many invasion missions overlap between the different armies. However, each army comes with its own "Invasion ship" instance and its own raid boss. Those are... just fun. Also, the bosses in invasion missions are much, much better than those in the normal instances.

The graphics are good but the game is heavily hindered by being a DirectX 9 game. Fighting looks spectacular, the effects are awesome. Lighting and shadows look great on higher settings. Animations, particularly for the player characters are amazing, some of the best you'll ever see. However, if you don't run the game at buttery smooth 60 fps, it tends to glitch out and it will feel unresponsive. 

Sound is also great - all enemies sound distinct from each other, each invasion army has its own sounds. Music is also great, it changes from the normal ambient track to a combat music when you're in battle. Would be great if bosses came with their own themes, but that may be too much to ask.

It's not a perfect game by any stretch, but it is a good one that I would recommend to anyone really to at least try out. Also, it's been improving at a great pace and devs have shown they aren't afraid of completely tearing down things that don't work and building new ones that do.

author: {'steamid': '76561198111350656', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 39, 'playtime_forever': 149, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 149, 'last_played': 1492131462}
review:
Well best to avoid this mess. It is glitchy on steam and has defualts that work against you. First it will put you on a euro server instead of a U.S. server so when you notice its a waist of time. And with this euro server selection you are laggy,so either lose your charictor or live with lag. A good sign of a pay to win is how many currencies it got and this one has 20+ so far.

As for the cash shop its way to over priced. Can drop 20$ on a mount or to get a few jewels.  They carged so much and you find out its all time limited so lose the mount in 30days. Nothing is clear in the layout and forget about getting back to the main starting area. Once you leave the control room forget about going back. Even tho thats only way to access the train room to see how to unlock classes.

Over all this is a game that bleed it player base dry so now its on steam looking for more. Its pay to win in all the wrong ways like 200% just for getting premium wich they give you 3days free to hook you like any good drug dealer. Player base that would play this are those who want to buy their way thrue. But that said the player base is pretty much dead.

So best to let this rot in the ground and play the truly new mmos out there.

author: {'steamid': '76561198045381877', 'num_games_owned': 557, 'num_reviews': 2587, 'playtime_forever': 165, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 165, 'last_played': 1492138662}
review:
Skyforge, man I really like this MMO and in my opinion its one of the best free to play MMo releases in years. Top notch action combat, really unique and well done environments and art style. decent plot to top it off. I enjoyed almost every aspect of the game. I have two complaints, one of them is not really even a big deal and that is it can get grindy the deeper into the game you get, that doesn't bother me very much, just something I wish could be a little different. 

My one big, massive unbelievably large complaint is that just like the other Mycom games on Steam you can NOT use your same account, so with the Steam release you need to start from scratch. This means me as a fan am still going to use the non Steam client with all my hours and unlocks so I don't have to start over.  This Steam release is really only for players who have not yet started the game. If you are new and want to try this out, as a fan of the game and a Steam user I highly recommend it. If you are a longtime player from before the Steam launch you may as well keep using your Mycom stuff because you will have to start over otherwise.

author: {'steamid': '76561198060714315', 'num_games_owned': 347, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 1841, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 320, 'last_played': 1588055012}
review:
İlk gözlemlerimi aktaracağım:
- Kurgu fikri güzel ama işleyiş kötü.
"Haa sen ölümsüzsün! Dur seni ölümsüzlerin binasına götüreyim de ne idüğü belirsiz bir adam bile olsan bize zarar vermeyeceğine gözlerim kapalı inanayım!" hissini veren garip diyaloglarla başlıyor oyun. Konuşmalar biraz pohpohlayıcı ve yavan ama yine de bir MMORPG için "Sen teksin, kralsın, aslansın." demek yerine "Sizden çok var kardeş." demek daha hoş.  
AMA...
Steam'e gelmeden önce test döneminde öyle üstün körü bir bakınmıştım oyuna. Adamlar inanılmaz geliştirmiş. Sınıf sistemi özellikle seviye atlamış. Kafamıza göre her sınıftan olabiliyor, kostüm etc. gibi şeyleri zırtdadanak ve pırtdadanak değiştirebiliyoruz. Grafikler, animasyonlar başarılı. Arada bir erken erişim tadında garip buglar oluyor - hele ki cinematic benzeri npcnin konuştuğu, sizin dinlediğiniz yerlerde - 
Oyun genel olarak görev sistemine bağlı fakat bunu Open World değil, "Oda" sisteminde yapmış. Güzel bağlamışlar kurgusal olarak ona diyeceğim yok. Deneyin derim. Bunca Copy-cat oyun varken arada bir farklılık olarak iyi bir seçenek Skyforge.
Henüz çok uzun bir oyun süresine sahip olabilecek kadar oynamadım. Bunlar benim ilk gözlemlerim.
Not: Kısa yazamıyorum, laf lafı açıyor sürekli - kıps -

author: {'steamid': '76561198017274912', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 137, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 70, 'last_played': 1492370971}
review: This game was reviewed as part of my Steam Free-to-Play YouTube series, where I give my first impression on games within the Steam Free-to-Play category.  You can watch the full video on YouTube for my initial impression.  This developer has put a lot of great work into the game.  The game graphics are quite nice, you can customize many character features, the female characters are super hot (had to say it), and I really like how easy it was to pick up the game and play.  I really like the way that you engage in fighting where you dont just point and click to attack, but you actually can be strategic with your fighting.  This game definitely gets a thumbs up for first impressions! I have based this assessment on my initial ~25 minute game review, but check it out for yourself!
